Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Hilton
review: This was a side trip on our summer vacation.  When we arrived the clerk asked about the guests, and determined that the automatically assigned room from the website (handicapped) was going to be too cramped for us.  They recommended we wait for a much larger room.  They could have just checked us in, since we didn't book thru the Hilton website, and let us suffer thru the consequences, but instead did the highly professional thing.  They were very courteous and professional.  They stored our ridiculous amount of luggage (I travel light but my family doesn't), and we headed out.  When we got back the room was ready, and was much larger than I would expect for Boston (the rooms tend to be both expensive and small).  Throughout the stay of 3 nights, we had nothing but very…

title: Great location, spotless and comfortable room
review: Excellent experience!! The hotel staff was very friendly.  The room was clean and inviting. The outside deck had good chairs and umbrellas. The pool area was neat and clean. I enjoyed sitting out there with my book and just enjoying the sunshine!

title: Fantastic location in Back Bay!
review: I attended a conference at the convention center and stayed the week at the Hilton Back Bay. Hands down, this was the most comfortable big city hotel I've stayed at in some time. I am a Hilton Honors member and was assigned to a member room on the  9th floor. It was relatively spacious, spotless, and quite comfortable. The staff were welcoming and professional, as well as helpful in providing directions and recommendations.

title: Great Location, Restaurant, Staff!
review: I arrived, very tired, at midnight to find I was upgraded to a 17th floor room with a panoramic view- how delightful!  Great convenience to convention center, by crossing street and entering through Sheraton. Expensive rates but they were more reasonable through convention organizers.  Loved the comfort and would stay again!  Could walk easiky to see so much of Boston!

title: Family vacation
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Nice room with great location and view.
review: Second year in a row we have stayed at this hotel and have been very satisfied both times. Great rooms and personable staff. Location is convenient to get one of the trolley's for your of the city. Within walking distance to shopping and restaurants.

title: Hilton fan, but not our best experience
review: Dear Carla,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a positive review on your recent stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable experience again and that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location as well! Making the most of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.  Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location and staff
review: We stayed here during our daughter's commencement in May 2016.  Due to the peak demand, we reserved this superior corner room since July 2015 and were not disappointed.  I am an Hilton Honour members thus I can check in via app in my MP.  It is absolutely convenient.  Though a bit aged, this hotel is situated in a very convenient location in Boston, either to walk, to drive or to take the T-Line.  Their private garage is right on site with easy but safe access.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  They even allowed us to deposit two big luggages for a week while the other Embassy Suites hotel we would stay on our departure from Boston did not accept anything.  The only comment I'd make was that our refrigerator was dirty and stained with drinks.  We called the Front Desk and they…

title: Boston July 4th vacation
review: Dear Tom, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you chose the Hilton Boston Back Bay during your stay in our area and we apologize for the problems you encountered. We have fixed the refrigerator issues and have addressed the other issues with our housekeepers. We assure you that if you give us another opportunity, you will not be disappointed in the future. Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice stay, great location!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Great location
review: We traveled to Boston for some Red Sox games and to see some sights around Boston.  This was a terrific location, within walking distance to Fenway Park, Boston Public Garden,  and several restaurants and bars.  Convenient for catching the subway also.  We had a room on the 25th floor with an awesome view of the Charles River, Cambridge, Newbury Street, and Fenway Park!  Everyone at the hotel was very nice -- Paul in the bar was entertaining.  We enjoyed our stay here!

title: HOME AWAY FROM HOME
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Problems checking in. No hot shower.
review: This was my visit to Boston, which had been on my bucket list for many, many years. I had always wanted to see the Boston Pops and firework display on July 4th, so selecting a hotel that afforded a good location was imperative to me. Our room was on the 25th floor with a magnificent view of the Charles River, Fenway Park, Cambridge and beyond. Great restaurants nearby and the Prudential Center with an indoor mall was one block away.

title: 4th of July Stay!
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are glad you chose to stay with us to check off your bucket list in visiting Boston, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Ok stay until the end
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Good location
review: Stayed here for a conference.  It is conveniently located to a lot of great restaurants.  Most of what you need and will want to see is within walking distance.  The rooms need some work.  The last night of my stay the breaker in the room went out leaving me without power.  The staff then tried to move me in this penthouse meeting room that did not have a bed.  They were going to place a roll-away cot for me to sleep on in the room.  When I refused, they found another room for me.  I would have given it a higher rating but this incident negatively affected my stay.

title: College visits
review: I appreciate your candid review of your recent stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. I apologize for the issues in your room and will work with our maintenance team to ensure this does not happen again. We are very sorry for the inconvenience and do hope that the next time you travel to Boston you will consider staying with us again. Warm regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Very nice stay!
review: Stayed here in May with a couple friends, the staff on reception were very helpful and explained all the best things to do in Boston to us. The hotel is very luxury for the price we paid and the rooms provide great views over Boston. The location is ideal as not far away from anything. Loved Boston and will stay here again next time round

title: Boston tril
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and their dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed at check in. I am glad you were able to take full advantage of our convenient location as well. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit! Warm regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Convenient location, helpful staff
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Great Location and view from the room
review: Recently here for one-night business stay (thanks to Cindy for the upgrade and finding me a room for early check-in!). Room was clean, comfortable, and had sufficient desk work-space.  Internet free and sufficient for needs. Nice view of city and river. Just around the corner from the Hynes convention center, so quick walk from Logan Back Bay shuttle drop-off/pick-up (which is a quick way from airport to this part of town).  Will stay here again.

title: Good Location, Otherwise Terrible
review: We are delighted that your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay was one that exceeded your expectations. I am glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient location as well and that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality through Cindy during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon!

title: Great Location and Soft Pillows
review: Spent 3 nights at this hotel in June. Room with a view of the city was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good didn't eat in the restaurant. We took a taxi from Logan airport at a cost of $45 including the tip. However on way back to airport we took the fantastic Logan Express bus which cost $7 each and only took 20mins. You pay by credit card on the bus and the bus stops just around the corner from the hotel outside the Hynes convention centre every 20 minutes. The location and the swimming pool are the highlights of this hotel. As Hilton Honours members we had free Wi-Fi which worked well

title: Avoid all rooms on the construction side
review: Dear Jackie, I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. I am glad you found our location to your liking. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon.  Warm regards,  Dominique Marty

title: June trip

title: Some strange things missing from an otherwise unremarkable HIlton
review: Very few amenities for a Hilton. Mattresses need upgrades  Staff very helpful and polite Diamond breakfast poor with little select and no rotation of item Very clean rooms and excellent job by housekeeping

title: Great accommodations with convenient location
review: Dear Mark, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your honesty and we are very sorry you were unhappy with the mattress in the guestroom. We assure you that we will use your feedback to improve. We hope that you will give us another chance to offer authentic Hilton hospitality when you return to Boston. Thank you! Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great experience
review: Absence of a desk and accompanying electronic device outlets and such is unacceptable in a hotel brand that only business travelers would usually say at. Equally shocking was the absence of HBO (only HBO family channel was on offer), particularly egregious on the season finale night for Game of Thrones. Otherwise, the room was pleasant and the location decent at this hotel, at which I stayed for a conference for two nights.

title: Comfortable, spacious room with significant environmental flaws
review: Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. I appreciate your honesty and your feedback. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guest rooms. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future. Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Confortable business trip

title: Run from this place!   No A/C and we were still charged full price for the room!
review: I stayed at this hotel for a business trip two weeks ago. Compared to the hotels were the other persons in my party were staying. It had a great location, a good business center in the lobby and breakfast. The other hotels did not have this.

title: Back Bay Easy
review: Dear Pablo,  Thank you for writing a great review. Making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to fully utilize our amenities. Thank you again for taking the time to post your experience and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon! Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Ask for Mitchell at the Front Desk
review: We arrived to a warm room and staff sent an engineer to work on the AC. After an hour, the engineer stated that it was almost fixed and then we had to leave the hotel. When we came back 3 hours later they had a portable fan running in our room with the all the windows wide open. I immediately called the front desk from the room phone multiple times with no answer.   I finally called their direct line from my cell and it was answered on the first ring. The lady that answered quickly let me know that they couldn't fix it and when I asked to be moved to another room I was told that they did not have another room available.  We were forced to sweat through the night and then they had the nerve to charge us the full price for the room!  The next morning, the day clerk was able to…

title: Excellent location for a ball game!
review: We would like to offer our sincerest apologies that we were unable to provide you with the quality of amenities and service you expect from Hilton during your stay. I am very sorry for the malfunctioning A/C and have reported your concern to our maintenance team. We are currently updating our A/C system and don't foresee any additional issues. Thank you again for your review and I invite you to stay with us the next time you return to Boston. Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice hotel

title: Great location
review: This hotel is close to the green line T station and it is easy access to most of the Boston attractions. A good tip is to ask for rooms away from the elevator because they are quieter. The hotel has pool as well.

title: Too expensive
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you. We appreciate you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope that you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: A wonderful anniversary surprise
review: Easy access to Boylston and Newberry, two main streets for eating, shopping, and everything else. Great place to do walking tours of the North End. We were able to walk to the Boston Gardens  & Boston Commons as well as the old North Church and all of the history associated with Paul Revere.

title: Great location
review: Dear Bruce, Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here and the convenience our location afforded you. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope that you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Business trip to Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Hhonors
review: I stayed in Hilton Beck Bay for 6 nights. The hotel lobby is bit smaller than expected and is of low-class when compared to the lobby of Sheraton Hotel in the opposite street.   Room is spacious but the decoration is out-dated. There is an empty refrigerator inside the room. I try the breakfast which costs $ 26 but food choices are quite limited. The fitness centre opens 24 hours but some treadmill machines are out of order throughout my stay.   The good thing is very close to Hyne Convention centre and the complementary WIFI connection is fast for at least 3 devices.   I will try Sheraton if visit Boston next time for a similar price.

title: Great location would stay here again.
review: We thank you for your valuable feedback about your stay the the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We would like to offer our sincerest apologies for the problems you encountered during your stay last week. We care about our guests at the Hilton Back Bay and we hate it when there is ever a problem with one of our guests. We are embarrassed to have encountered such a problem with you and will do everything we can to ensure you do not come across these problems again. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location
review: The hotel is in a great location near many good restaurants, shops, etc. Rooms are very outdated and need some renovation. The service was sub-par. Overall I would probably pick a different hotel in the area if I went back.

title: Return visitor and I was pleased once again!
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the convenience our location afforded you. On another note, please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so.  Warm regards, Dominique Marty

title: decent stay

title: Hilton Back Bay review
review: Hotel was not bad overall, needed extended pool hours, a cooler hot tub and front desk staff that was a bit more helpful, but the rooms were nice and the location was perfect. There were some questionable looking people in the lobby that made me feel uneasy one of the nights we were there (rowdy and disruptive and no one asked them to stop), but other than that, the atmosphere was pleasant.

title: Perfect location for Fenway
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Stay at the Sheraton across the street!
review: Nice hotel in a great location. Overall pleased with my stay. Beds comfortable and room and hotel was very quiet which was what I was looking for.  Would recommend this hotel to friends and family.  Guest

title: Outstanding Stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay!
review: Dear Carol,  Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay and the convenience our location afforded you as reflected in the rating. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. It is important that we accommodate all your needs. We would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.

title: Downtown Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Tiring stay!
review: The hotel is in an excellent downtown location.  I was attending a teachers' conference, and therefore, did not have time to use some of the facilities.  A couple of evenings I ate dinner at the bar, and the food (sea food on both occasions0 was really good. Even though the hotel is in the middle of the city, the rooms are quiet, and I slept really well.   My only issue is the price.  I am a music teacher, and I am perfectly comfortable staying at a less expensive Hampton Inn.  For this conference, the convenience of the location did warrant paying the extra amount -- almost double the price of a typical Hampton Inn.

title: Perfect setting for a day of family concerts and recitals over at New England Conservatory
review: It was our pleasure to read such an exciting review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Thank you very much for taking the time to write a courteous review about your experience with us especially on our 40 Dalton restaurant and we appreciate your business and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location and awesome staff
review: Would not recommend this hotel. The only good thing is the location, a short walk to the prudential centre. I was on the fifth floor and was wakened very early every morning by the trains rumbling underneath! The aircon only worked intermittently and the extractor fan in bathroom never worked, engineer although friendly and responded quickly was unable to fully address these issues. The toilet flush was bee y noisy. Room service was extremely disappointing, it was clearly just a frozen 'tv' dinner/ready meal which was served in the plastic container, in a paper bag!  Swimming pool is very small and although the gym has a fairly good range of equipment, the roof started leaking badly as I was lifting weights, there was admittedly heavy rainfall at the time.  The room rate is way…

title: Boston Hilton Back Bay
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose during your stay and this review has been addressed to our Director of Engineering.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Special treat, not so special

title: A Member of the Front Desk Staff Changed Our Whole Vacation
review: We're so excited to be staying at the Hilton, always thought the top hotels in the world were the Hilton or the Ritz or the like, so was very disappointed with the standard of this hotel, the reception was very bland & unwelcoming, although the staff were very helpful & gave us an upgrade to a higher floor with a view of the river which was nice, the view was fantastic but sadly the room was very dated & decoration a bit grubby, the room was perfectly clean & the bed was nice. Didn't fancy eating in the hotel so found a nice restaurant on the main street. Boston is such a beautiful city & would defenetly return, but sadly not to the Hilton ☹️

title: Boston Hilton Experience
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Don't
review: We recently had an overnight stay at this hotel. We will be back again and again and there is one reason and one reason alone: a true gentleman named Calvin. Calvin was there at the front desk to welcome us as though we were old family friends visiting from out of town. He brought treats for our two little children, played with them, sincerely wanted to be certain that all of our needs were met and truly exuded a warmth and joy that would make anyone at Hilton's Corporate Office grin from ear to ear. This man made us love our Hilton experience.

title: Hilton Back Bay Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Calvin for his efforts. Calvin will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Noisy and overpriced
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent location
review: Must be an older building; very loud door noise in rooms on upper floors. Kept me awake. My experience witht he Hilton properties in general is that they are overpriced, Hilton and the associated hotels seem to be operating on past reputation, they are not worth the price anymore. This is the second Hilton Associated property that was very loud. (the other one was in Ithaca NY). Everywhere else I go there is free complimentary WiFI, but not Hilton unless one is a hilton Honors member.

title: Back Bay Stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to respond to our survey. I do understand your expectations for a quiet night’s sleep and want to sincerely apologize for the noises that occurred during your stay. We aim to provide you, as a loyal guest, with the best experience possible so we appreciate the feedback you have provided us. We hope that you will stay with us again and address any issues, concerns, or requests so that we can fully accommodate your needs and exceed your expectations. Your business and loyalty is important to us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Lukewarm in Boston
review: As a HH member we naturally stay in Hilton hotels whenever possible, this one in Boston is one of our favourites, the location is great with all the good Boston eateries around you Back Bay is a beautiful neighrhood and the view across Boston to Cambridge is very pretty in the higher floors.  All the usual Hilton comforts here.  RECOMENDED.

title: Terrific hotel!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are glad you chose to stay with us, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location, and good stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great hotel and staff!
review: My wife and I did a long weekend stay here over memorial day and enjoyed it. The location for walking to anything south end is very easy, and the walk to the nearest train stop is 10 minutes tops. All the employees were very friendly and I called ahead for an early check in which they accommodated.  The only issue we had was in the morning the shower was more of a luke warm then a normal hot.  No big deal really and we made due. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Back Bay Boston,MA
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for the Memorial Day weekend, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Higher expectations but not bad
review: This was our first visit to Boston - we stayed at this hotel for a 'get-away weekend' - checked in on a Friday and out on a Sunday.  The Back Bay shuttle from Logan stops at the Hynes Convention Centre which is a block from the hotel so this is really convenient.  At $5 a person, you can't beat it for transportation to and from the airport! We arrived at the hotel well before check in time and Sidneia at the front desk was wonderful !  She was very pleasant and  accommodating and was able to find us a room that was available so we didn't have to wait.  We told her it was our first time visiting so she gave us a map and a list of restaurants available in the area which was very helpful.  We had a room on the 17th floor which again was nice as the higher up, the less noise - not…

title: Don't waste your money
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Sidneia for her efforts. Sidneia will be happy to hear that she lived our Hilton Values and culture and made you feel more welcome in Boston.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your Panoramic room, sorry we weren't able to also provide you will a fantastic view as well!  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Anniversary Weekend

title: Great stay in Boston!
review: My husband and I are spending of 25th anniversary weekend at the Hilton Back Bay, although when booking the room, it indicated we would have a panoramic view of the city a new building has been built so you truly do not have that view.  We did have an amazing customer service excellence experience upon arrival back to our room we had a plate of fruit, chocolate covered strawberries and a note from the front desk staff wishing us a Happy Anniversary.  Very thoughtful!  Kudos to Mitchell at the front desk for a job done in welcoming us and providing this positive experience for us.  He truly went above and beyond and must be recognized for his service excellence.

title: Overpriced hotel
review: Congratulations again from the Hilton Boston Back Bay team to you on celebrating your 25th anniversary. We are thrilled you chose to stay with us to commemorate such an important and special occasion. Mitchell understands the importance of creating an unforgettable experience for guests staying with us and he will be delighted to hear that he was able to do so in celebration of this event. We enjoyed reading this excellent review and hope that you will continue to celebrate special occasions with us so that our team members can carry on the tradition of a memorable celebration.

title: Perfect Spot for a weekend in Boston
review: Great downtown hotel with an outstanding staff. Front-desk crew was extremely friendly and helpful during my brief stay.  Great location for business travel (near Prudential Center) and  easy access to unlimited nearby restaurants and bars.  Very likely will be my go-to destination in Boston for future business travel.

title: Red Sox anniversary getaway
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be thrilled to hear they were helpful and friendly during your stay.  I will be sure to commend them for their efforts.  We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Boston weekend
review: The Hilton Boston back Bay is a very nice hotel. So close to downtown, the Charles and of course Fenway. We had a wonderful couples weekend for my wife's Birthday. Boylston St. is around the corner with great restaurants and Newbury St. is right there with all its shops. This location is great.

title: Great location but expensive!
review: Congratulations from the Hilton Boston Back Bay team to you on celebrating your wife's birthday. We are glad you chose to stay with us to commemorate such an important and special occasion.  We enjoyed reading this excellent review and hope that you will continue to celebrate special occasions with us so that our team members can carry on the tradition of a memorable celebration. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: A very expensive closet
review: Although frequent visitors to Boston, we had never stayed at this particular Hilton before....we will again!  The location is near everything you could wish - restaurants, shopping, tourist attractions, Fenway Park, etc.  It's also ideally located to T stops that will get you anywhere else you want to go in the greater Boston area.  The hotel staff were among the most pleasant we have encountered and our room was spacious, comfortable and perfectly clean.

title: Loved this hotel!
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston. We appreciate your feedback and our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Arsenio
review: Good hotel for business or leisure. Used pool and bar and found both to be exactly what I was looking for on a short stay. Is a little bit further out than some hotels which suited me perfectly as I'd little less crowded at peak times.

title: Rethink this one, it's a work in progress...
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Graduation
review: I got a sofa bed when I got checked into my room, no way near as comfortable as a regular bed and I couldn't watch the basketball playoffs , front desk blamed it on dish...and offered me a drink... But drink was no good cause I had to work next morning...just wanted to watch the game in my comfy bed....I got neither 😠

title: Great hotel
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Unfortunate stay at Back Bay Hilton

title: A nice stay
review: No hot water for showers or bath. Reported to manager who said part was broken, but at over $300/ night, an unfortunate experience. We had previously enjoyed our stays at this hotel, but No longer recommend this hotel.  Betsy & Gerry Schroeter

title: Always a pleasurable experience!
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for our boiler system. This review has been brought to the attention of our Director of Engineering, and he has addressed the Engineering team.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations Warm Regards, Dominique Marty.

title: Great Service, poor layout
review: Stayed two nights at this property and although it is an older building with some issues inherent with that, our stay was just fine. This is a business style hotel with a compact lobby, but the location in Back Bay is great. It is a short walk to Newbury St. which is a great part of town with a vibrant dining and night life and plenty of upscale shopping. The room we had (1605) was very spacious, had a nice view, and was very quiet. The carpet appeared to be new, and the furnishings not too badly worn. The nice bonus was the huge 65" flat screen which was as big a TV as I have ever seen in a standard room. The A/C is efficient and quiet, and the towels/bedding were again above average. They have a Diamond lounge for those that qualify which serves a very decent breakfast, and…

title: Very nice hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: It's fine but not cheap
review: Great Location, Clean, Cofortable, and the Fantastic View from you Room. The tone of the trip was set, when we met Calvin Cherry at the front desk. Calvin with his bubble personality, just set the tone for a Great Weekend in Boston. Calvin is one guy that couldn't do enough for you. I wish all Hotels had a Calvin Cherry.

title: Once again, a pleasure at a Hilton
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team member for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Calvin for his efforts. Calvin will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Select Hilton Back Bay
review: I said here for three nights for business, as our business occurred in one of their many rooms on the second floor.  The hotel is comfortable, and easily accessible, but $1000 for three nights seems excessive.  The rooms are not any bigger than the other hotel, the combinations are adequate, not spectacular. For that kind of money, you should have the equivalent of fine dining.  Probably because it's paid for by corporate people, they can get away with it, but I would not go here if I was paying for it on my own.

title: Average Hilton
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We would like to apologize for being unable to fully meet your expectations. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location, very nice hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent Location
review: As a Hiton honors member, I ended up staying here using points. I was not disappointed. The location is right across from the copley/prudential area so its very convenient. The rooms were updated and very nice. We got free breakfast and appetizers with the hilton honors program. My only complaint was that the water in the shower was not hot enough. I like very hot showers but I heard someone else at breakfast saying the same thing so I dont think it was just me. I enjoyed my stay and will return.

title: The Perfect Base of Operations
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to find that our location of the property was accommodating and we greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel. On another note, we would like to apologize for the issue of hot water as this disrupted your stay and your stay was not fully satisfying. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Eve was the best EVER at check in
review: Rooms are great and the location is great for restaurants, Copley Place, walk to Fenway and easy service from the Airport using the Back Bay Bus. $5 and drops you off at the Convention Center which is roughly 1 block walk to the Hilton. A little spendy, buts its Boston and in line with city pricing.

title: Great location with regards to Fenway, McGreevy's Irish bar, and Copley mall.
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here and the convenience our location has afforded you. Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.

title: Awesome location

title: Convenient, clean, safe and comfortable
review: This is a hotel I've always wanted to check out and I was pleased with a nice room in a fantastic location right in the heart of Back Bay. It is pretty pricey (like most hotels in town) and the parking was an extra $43 per night. It is walking distance to a LOT of shopping at Copley or Newbury Street as well as the T's green line at Hines.  Close to the Convention Center if you're traveling for a conference.

title: Average Hotel Choice for the Area
review: It was our pleasure to read such an exciting review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are extremely pleased to find that we were able to meet your expectations and make this experience memorable. However, we would like to apologize for the cost of our parking rate. The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Pleasant hotel near Boston shopping
review: Stayed here for 1 week with my mum.  I do not think the reviews do it justice.  I chose the back bay due to its location and I was not disappointed, very acceesible to Newbury street, 20 mins walk to the Boston Common.  We asked for a room away from elevators and building work and were put on 17th floor- Hilton Honors floor.  The room was clean, pretty spacious and comfortable, got an excellent nights sleep. We were on holiday and all our organised bus trips picked up from this hotel. We didn't opt for the breakfast mainly due to price (I believe $26 pp), instead having read other reviews we went to Thorntons- approx 4 mins walk away.  Thorntons had an extensive menu (we only ever ate breakfast there) - anything we ate was lovely- pancakes, fruit etc. Would def stay at this…

title: Disappointed. Far better choices nearby.
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice Location for the Boston Marathon
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Family Visit to Boston
review: We enjoyed our 3 night stay During the Boston Marathon.  The location is nice being in Back Bay.  For the marathon it is nice because it is across the street from the Hynes Convention Center which is where the race expo is located.  It is also nice for spectators that are staying in the hotel because they only have to walk one block and they are at Mile 26 on Boyleston Street.  The finish line is about .4 miles away.    The staff was very pleasant and helpful.  The room was nice and spacious.  We are Hilton Honors members and were able to check in online via our phones.  By doing this we could pick our room.  We chose a higher room with extra space.  There are a few rooms on each floor that have more space because of the stairwells.  On the day of the Marathon when we arrived…

title: Comfy hotel, great employees
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, our Diamond Lounge Attendants for their dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed in the lounge. Thank you again for taking note of their hard work and dedication. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Our recent stay at the Hilton Back Bay
review: Great location!  Excellent stay here at Hilton.  Parked car in hotel garage and Walked to Freedom Trail and easy walk to Fenway!  Walk across street to Sheraton for easy access to Prudential Center and Stop on the Town Trolly.

title: Nice and plain
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great hotel, great location
review: Really enjoyable stay..nice little touches...example ...lemon& Orange water in lobby ..which was very refreshing after a days walk!starbucks in the lobby was real handy for a quick breakfast..,,the only fault I found was the price of a glass of wine...16 dollars!!didn't have a second!

title: Best of Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience and we are pleased to find out that you appreciate the amenities provided in the lobby. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: DONT!!!!
review: We stayed at Hilton Boston Back Bay for 3 nights. We had a room on the 19th floor which was really spacious with a great view of the city. The hotel is in a great location, near shops and restaurants and 15 minute walk to The public garden. The staff at reception were friendly and helpful and Cindy especially made us feel really welcome! We would certainly recommend this hotel to friends!

title: Not Your First Choice
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Excellent Choice if you can't book downtown

title: Great Location for Red Sox or Marathon
review: We wanted to stay closer to the main center of Boston but nothing was available.  This place came up and it was ideal for our second choice.  It is across from the Sheraton which is adjacent to the Prudential Center.  It also has a hop on and hop off trolley stop directly in front of the Sheraton.  So getting around by Trolley made it easy.  The room was large and comfortable.  The bathroom however was too small.  The door barely missed hitting the toilet as you go inside.  It felt too "closed" and would have benefited more by a little more room.  Evening reception was nice offering a hot dish and chips and salsa and humus and several other snacks.  Morning breakfast consisted of a continental array with a host dish of eggs.

title: Close but Away from Busyness of Crowds
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your  experience at our property but we would like to apologize for the issue you had with the size of the bathroom in your guestroom. We always appreciate guest feedback as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: nice quiet room, lobby could use some updating
review: The staff of the Hilton Boston Back Bay are first class, customer focused employees.  Everyone we dealt with greater us with a smile and made the stay extremely welcoming.  Short walk to Fenway and 100 yards to the marathon course.  Food at the hotel restaurant was average.  Rooms very clean.

title: Business trip/conference hotel.
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. title: Gold isn't worth anything

title: Business Trip
review: My biggest complaint (yes, there are several) is that the staff is not working with the same Customer Service model that the modern world is. I have a room that is a dead spot for Wi-Fi and the hotel refuses to acknowledge it or fix it. Their outsourced IT Dept has to call them to even try their "premium" connection. If course making my access faster when my devices can't even reach the router didn't help.  While the connection deficiency was (is, because I still have another night of the crap) the major pain, their total lack of ownership of the problem baffled me. I have better service at Hampton Inn in their chain and just about any hotel in others.  Great disappointment.

title: Long Weekend
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comment concerning the wifi connection and strength has been addressed to the Director of Engineering, and he has reviewed the matter to avoid this issue from ever occurring again. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Complaint Sent to Division Manager on Monday April11th to date NO RESPONSE PROVIDED
review: Had a conference in the Hynes Convention Center. This is a great location, just across the street. The hotel was clean and had great views of the city. The hotel was very full (I was there the weekend before the marathon), so I noticed that the elevators were pretty slow. Occasionally the doors would open, but the elevator was already full so people had to wait until the next one. Other than that, the hotel is in a great location with lots to see and do. We walked a number of times to the north shore (a good 30-40 minute walk), and felt very safe. The hotel staff was very friendly and I was super impressed with the online check-in the day before. I walked in, said my name, they handed me the key and I was on my way. No showing of the credit card yet. Very convenient!

title: Good Hotel near Northeastern University
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values. However, we would like to apologize for the inconvenience that you encountered in the lobby and we continue to improve our service as fulfilling our guest's expectations is our main priority. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Good location
review: I'll start with the positive.  The location was good, the staff were very nice, and the bed was fairly comfortable.  Unfortunately, the thermostat in our room didn't work.  We finally turned it off as no matter what temp we set, the room felt like a sauna.  One of the lamps was broken and the room was so small that we had to scoot around a cabinet to get into the room from the bathroom.  We will not be returning to this hotel.

title: Last minute trip
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. On a different note, we would like to apologize for the thermostat not working properly during your stay here and the broken lamp in your room.  We have brought both issues to the attention of our Director of Engineering who will have both issues resolved immediately and ensure this doesn't occur again. We hope that you will stay with us again.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: If you are  a Hilton person you will appreciate this place
review: We stayed here for four nights in March.  I booked it within a package as we were travelling quite a lot via Trialfinders.  I booked a room for three people.  Upon check-in, staff were wonderful, greeted us with a warm welcome and check in was smooth.  We arrived in our room and the room was quite small with two beds.  Also there was a constant dripping from the shower.  I called reception and informed them that the room should be able to accommodate 3 people and this room was a little too small, also the constant dripping would become really annoying whilst we slept.  I was told that the room was adequate for three but I could have a roll-away bed for an extra $100 per night, we were staying 4 nights so I refused the bed but asked if maintenance could check the dripping.  I…

title: Business Travel made personal
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comment concerning our Front Office staff has been addressed to the Director of Front Office, and he has reviewed these matters with his team to keep them more informed and avoid these issues from occurring again. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Gross. Not Hilton Standard
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Big Room-Friendly Staff
review: Room seemed ok when I first entered. However, once I went into the bathroom, that drastically changed. It almost seemed like they forgot to clean the bathroom after the last guest. Dirty tiles in the shower, hair on the floor, sticky nasty something on the outside of the tub, and a number of black hairs all over the tub and bathroom. Only stayed for one night, and that was more than enough for me. Nasty.

title: Didn't like Hilton back bay Biston
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for your bathroom not properly being cleaned. This review has been brought to the attention of the Director of Housekeeping, and he has addressed the Housekeeping team. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Like Most Hiltons, Very Solid.
review: Very nice hotel with great amenities. Small mistake with my reservation was corrected immediately and the staff was very friendly and accommodating. The guest room is large and comfortable with a perfect bed. Exercise facility is nice with numerous machines, pool, and locker room. Hotel is in a great location for sightseeing the Boston area and several places are within walking distance.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations by our staff and pleased to know that you were extremely satisfied with your stay. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: cannot turn on the air conditioning
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: HVAC issues
review: The room temperature was very warm. The staff said that the air conditioning is not on and that we should open the window. Across the street, there was a 24 hour construction project going on. Needless to say, it was impossible to sleep. There was no attempt to rectify, pacify, etc., the situation.

title: Great hotel!
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a review in regards to your past stay. I do apologize in regards to our heating. We're in the process of renovating it so I hope that you will get a chance to visit us again very soon!  Thank you,

title: Better hotels in Boston, Hilton Gold Member very dated property
review: This is similar to many Hiltons in terms of quality of rooms and amenities. If you are a Gold HHonors member, the lounge is a great benefit with a quality free breakfast and snacks and beverages the rest of the day.   However, I was greatly disappointed by the HVAC system. After not being able to figure out the thermostat and experiencing a warm night of sleep, we asked at the front desk for our unit to be checked, leaving the fan on "auto". When we returned to the room later in the day, it was still warm.  We went back to the front desk, we were told that the system either does heating OR cooling for the whole hotel. Since we were there during a mild stretch of days, and the system was still in heating mode, we were told to keep the system off and open a window. This was…

title: Good time
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the heating/cooling system issues that arose during your stay. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. Please reconsider your decision to stay at another hotel in Boston on your next stay so that we could have the opportunity to exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Property
review: The Hilton was in a great location which was walking distance to shopping, restaurants, Fenway Park and the T.  The staff were all very friendly and accommodating.  It is across from a tour stop if you are interested in the hop on or off tours.  The hotel food is very expensive but there is a starbucks inside the hotel to purchase a small breakfast.  There were plenty of places to eat outside.

title: Beautiful Hotel with great view
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Short Break
review: In the Back Bay and convenient to Prudential, shopping, great restaurants, historical sight, etc. Beautiful rooms, clean, and good views.  Semir (manager) went out of his way to make our trip wonderful.  Only complaint is parking is $43 a night but that is Back Bay!

title: Lovely staff, thin walls
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Have loved this hotel for years

title: Hilton Back Bay, Boston
review: I can't count how many nights I've spent in this hotel over the last 15 years and I always enjoy it (even through renovations). I also have status with Hilton and this hotel has a very nice lounge for Gold and Diamond levels, which is one of the many reasons why I prefer to stay here. Hotels in Boston are expensive, and sometimes outrageously so (I live in NYC and while I pay a mortgage there vs paying for a hotel room, I know what going rates are in the top US cities), which unfortunately forces me to stay at other hotels in Boston.   I can't say enough good things about this hotel and one new added value (at least new to me) is Calvin at the front desk. All employees are extremely nice and helpful, but I had the most interaction with Calvin during this stay and he gets a…

title: Get a river-facing room!
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team member Calvin will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you at our lounge and the front desk. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Staff is Amazing!
review: Great location.  Easy access to the city center, Prudential, etc.  Virtually across the river from Cambridge.  Lots of room options, very nice in building bar.  The only downside is all the construction going on around the hotel.

title: 1st stay, but not my last!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice Location, Dubious Quality
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: great experience
review: The hotel is well situated, clean, with decent rooms and accommodations.  However, after numerous issues in getting something as simple as the door locks to work, a room change, the final room's heating system being dead, and the keycard driven exit/re-entry system of the garage not working, it was evident that the hotel is in need of a general system quality overhaul that seems long overdue.  The staff was pleasant and tried to help, but as problems piled on they were as frustrated as I was.  If you can I would avoid this property for a couple of months at a minimum to give them a chance to get their act together, as the hotel itself is OK assuming that things actually work as intended.  Right now they don't.

title: Hilton Back Bay Boston
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for all the issues which occurred during your stay.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Bachelorette Party
review: very clean and well maintained. staff were welcoming and nice. the location is the best! we were visiting our student son, so we were able to walk from the hotel to the main street and to the mall without using our car.

title: Home away from Home
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Love the Back Bay Hilton
review: HVAC stuck on heat on a warm spring day, was only turned on when weather was warm.  Fire alarm literally went off for 45 mins straight, quiet for half hour then went off again, then again.  Finally got stuck in the elevator.  Staff didn't even have the courtesy to say anything.  HHonors Diamond member who will NOT be back...

title: Nice hotel. great location. friendly staff.  fire alarm an issue
review: Hello Wayne. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. I am terribly sorry for the fire alarm and elevator. Unfortunately, due to the age of the building and precautionary measures, we are very limited in our ability to resolved the issues you experienced. We work hard to overcome them by delivering exceptional guest service and ensuring our hotel is spotless. We hope you'll reconsider and stay with us again the next time you visit Boston. Sincerely, Theo

title: Great Stay
review: I am a regular guest at the Back Bay Hilton.  I love that the desk, house, restaurant, and lounge staff people know me by name.  The rooms are spacious, Internet is free (I am a Hilton Honors member.) The Back Bay Hilton is my Boston home away from home.

title: Fun Friday Night
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our staff will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel and it is always our pleasure to have you stay with us. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Average Hilton
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great location and friendly staff!
review: Rooms small but comfortable Location convenient to Hynes Convention Center Tiny Starbucks located in hotel ran out of food early Easy to take airport shuttle for $5 and cut through mall to hotel next door Food extremely expensive Really need affordable breakfast

title: Great stay!!
review: Hello EY Sandras. Thank you for your feedback about breakfast and Starbuck's. I'm glad you enjoyed our location and the room, but I'm disappointed we messed up at breakfast. With regards to the cost of breakfast, you'll be delighted to know we offer a package which includes breakfast for two. Hopefully, it'll be available the next time you visit Boston. Sincerely, Theo

title: Wonderful stay!
review: I stayed at this Hilton property many times for work and a few times for pleasure.  Upon arrival I was greeted and assisted with check in quickly.  My company worked with Lisa, sales, to negotiate a rate and she was very helpful and quick to respond if we had any questions.  She even met up with us, on occasion, at the hotel bar - great customer service!    This property is close, walk-able, to Fenway park, Boylston St., Newbery St., Prudential building, train station, many great bars, restaurants and shopping nearby.  I even found a great running/walking/biking route along St. Charles River (accessable via Mass Ave).  The hotel bar was great as well, ate there many times and the food was good.  Matt was our bartender and always greeted us with a smile, asked how things were and…

title: Great price for great location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, Lisa and Matt will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Cold Shower?  Not customer focused
review: Nice location but this is a bit of a run down hotel. Staff are nice but facility less so. Stayed for 4 nights and had to change rooms as first musty with broken air con and shower head. Second room much nicer but internet would not work. Across from the nicer Sheraton, so I could only envy from afar.

title: Location, location, location!
review: Hello David. Thank you for your feedback about your stay. I'm sorry to hear about the faulty air conditioner and shower in the first room you checked into. As for the internet, I'm not aware of it having gone down at any point this year. It is possible you were trying to watch a video or play a game online, when our complimentary internet speed is intended for checking email. For those who would like faster internet, we offer much higher speeds for $9.95/day or as an optional perk to Hhonors members. We hope you'll stay with us again the next time you visit Boston. Sincerely, Theo

title: Below average Hilton
review: The location is fine, the facility were clean.  It would have been ok ... until tried to take a morning shower.  Day 1: Cold showers.  This was an issue the front desk knew about and said they'd fix. Day 2: Cold showers... full hotel no other rooms, no offer to move to another hotel.  Day 3: Cold Showers.    This isn't a huge thing... my family is flexible; this just isn't what you expect from Hilton.

title: Pretty dull hotel
review: Hello Traveling Mom,  Thank you for your feedback about your stay. I'm glad you enjoyed our location and room, but I'm terribly sorry about the issues you experienced while our boiler broke. You'll be glad to know it's since been fixed and our General Manager would like to talk to you to see how we can convince you to stay with us the next time you visit Boston. Please contact him when it is convenient for you. Sincerely, Theo

title: Comfortable but tired place
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle.
