title: Loving Boston
review: I stayed there a few weeks ago for business. The location is super. It is located in an expensive part of Boston with a high end mall, Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs close by. Also very close is the Charlie. The staff us excellent with directions and the breakfast in the Executive Lounge was delicious with scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage oatmeal, various breads, pastries and fruit. The lounge also offered Coke products,  water,  milk, juice, coffee and snacks 24/7. In the evening it offered veges/dip, salsa/chips and horderves. The rooms were spacious and had standard amenities.  I will definitely stay there on my next visit to Boston

title: Very Close to Hynes Convention Center
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel. We also enjoyed reading your enthusiastic review about how much you enjoyed your experience at the Executive Lounge. We appreciate feedback like this and look forward to the next time you stay with us.

title: Could be a better hotel
review: Other than the room being quite small for 4 people, with 2 x double beds (2 adults & 2 children) the hotel was great, front desk staff were good and the doorman were my favourite.  Always happy and said hello every time you were near them.  Our room however had the best view - looking straight at Fenway Park (Go Redsox), which is why we were in Boston at all so that was above exciting.  For my first overseas trip this hotel was more than okay.  The kids loved the pool and spa.

title: Hotel has gone down hill
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, especially the front desk staff, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We are also thrilled to hear you enjoyed your gorgeous view of Fenway Park.  We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Stay Somewhere Else
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Great location and staff
review: My boyfriend and I stayed here for his Birthday last year, and I just got a trip advisor account and even a year later felt the need to leave this review because of the sour taste left after our stay. The room itself was clean, well equipped and beautiful. We stay in Boston frequently and have tried many hotels to find our favorite and this is at the bottom of the list. The price is expensive but comparable to other hotels in the area. Of course not complimentary wifi, breakfast or plarking. The staff is extremely rude and should not work in customer service, we were checked-in and brushed off. Once we got in the room, we wanted to nap for a few hours before going out to dinner. About 2 minutes into our nap the fire alarm started going off throughout the whole hotel. We didn't…

title: I'm extremely insulted
review: We thank you for your valuable feedback about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. On another note, we understand how frustrating a Fire Alarm evacuation can be and apologize you were disturbed.  All emergency procedures and systems were followed and in working order to ensure our guests safety.  We are pleased you were safe as well as every guest.   Our team is committed to providing great service; Please let us know of your experience at your next stay and our team will do what we can to give you the stay we deserve. We thank you for choosing to stay with us and hope to welcome you again in the near future.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location
review: I was there for 6 days, had a great stay. The staff is so helpful and friendly, my room was big compared to other hotels in the areas my colleagues stayed. Anything I needed from converter plugs, to when I was struggled to connect to the wifi and simple trying to get a taxi, the staff was ready to help.   This was also walking distance to anywhere you would want to go.

title: Great location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location Great Service
review: The hotel is located in the back bayarea of Boston and is within walking distance of entertainment, restaurants, Fenway Park, public transit,Copley Square and shopping. Not much to make it stand out from other good Boston hotels. The location will require premium room rates and parking will exceed $40.00 per night. Rooms of course were clean and comfortable. Higher rooms show off proud city views. Overall good value.

title: Disappointing Hilton
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for the weekend, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice Place that is Close to Fenway Park
review: We stayed 5 nights at the Hilton Back Bay. The Hotel is very well placed for the main attractions. The room was very clean (thanks Maria). The reason for the five star review   is the level of service we received we had some minor issues (not hotel related) and the front office manager Calvin Cherry could not have been more professional or willing to help. It made a great stay in a great city even better. It goes without saying we wouldn't hesitate to use The Hilton Back Bay again. We have stayed at many Hilton Properties this is one of the best in our experience. I think every Hilton should all have a Calvin !

title: Consistently good
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Calvin for his efforts. Calvin will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: My trip to Boston
review: Stayed at the Hilton Back Bay. Staff was friendly. Hotel was excellent and clean. Good location to Fenway, Newbury and Boylston Streets, and the Prudential Center and Top of the Hub. The Diamond Lounge for HH members was extremely nice, for breakfast and drinks.Definitely would stay there again.

title: East trip
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We appreciate the time and effort you took to share your experience at our property and for taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, our Diamond Lounge Attendants for their dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed in the lounge. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: good value...well located
review: My trip to Boston and the Boston Back Bay Hilton was a good experience. The food was good. Service was good. It seems to take too long for the hotel operator to answer the phone at the hotel. All staff seemed professional ..... except the 800-Hilton reservations department... which I previously explained was a total nightmare.

title: Great Hotel!
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you along with our delicious food. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We would like to apologize for the delay in responding to your email but we thank you for your feedback. We will forward that to the Front Office Director. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay, great location, professional service
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Typically Hilton, good location
review: I stayed there with my wife and daughter late August 2015. The location is very central, near to the largest Boston malls and to the famous Newbury Street. Staff are helpful and very welcoming. Rooms are spacious and I had very high windows so the view was great.  Dining is limited to a Starbucks that closes too early and to a decent restaurant but there are so many options just steps away that this is not really a problem . I will go back there on my next visit in Boston

title: Great Stay In Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for the weekend, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  We are thrilled to hear you had a wonderful experience and the staff was helpful. We would like to apologize for our restaurant and Starbucks cafe not meeting your expectations. Our Director of Food & Beverage is reviewing your comments with the chef to ensure that our culinary and restaurant team are aware and strive to avoid such impressions but our team members will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great stay
review: Stayed here at the end of an organised tour. It was up to the usual Hilton standard, good rooms, helpful professional staff.  There's some significant construction work going on just across the road at the moment. We were on the 8th floor and you could hear the work but it wasn't load enough to be a problem. It's a good location for exploring this lovely city

title: Overnight date night 9 miles from home
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay but are pleased you still enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your business and loyalty. At your next stay, please let us know and we will be sure to give you the stay you deserve. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Excellent

title: Nice hotel
review: Very comfortable hotel in a good location. Front desk (particularly Edgardo) exceptionally competent and welcoming. Delicious breakfast in exec lounge.  Room 2603 was quiet, nicely decorated, with super comfortable bed.  Nice location for walking and a T station not far away.  Thoroughly enjoyed my time at this Hilton.

title: Beautiful rooms, good location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, especially Edgardo, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that he was instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We are also thrilled to hear you enjoyed your breakfast in our Executive Diamond Lounge. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay Boston
review: I stayed here for a couple of nights for a business event.  The hotel is very nice, a great location within walking distance of some great Boston fun spots like Boylston and Newbury St. and also it was very clean.  I was in on site meetings all day at the hotel and unfortunately the food provided was not good at all, but I guess business meetings don't typically offer good food.

title: gave away 2 reserved rooms
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We appreciate you taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We are sorry to hear our food did not meet your standards but our culinary chef and Director of Food and Beverage value your feedback and will take your comments into consideration as they continuously strive to improve the menu and our guests' experience. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back to our prime location and exceed your expectations.  Warm Regards,	 Dominique Marty

title: Family Wedding Stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Treated us Like Family
review: Hilton Back Bay location is convenient to many interest to visit to eat. Transportation is easy to get to from the airport. The shuttle takes you to within easy and short walking distance and great location to pick up and take the shuttle back to the airport.  The Hilton Back Bay lobby is spacious and provides seating to meet up with others or a place to "hang-out". Room and amenities provided are great. A mini fridge to store food, drinks. Coffee and Tea maker. Rooms spacious and view of the city is really nice. Room is clean, bed is comfortable, bathroom is spacious. Carpets are dark in color to hide the dark. Would not recommend being bare feet.

title: Excellent Location, Excellent Service
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our amenities in the lobby and room. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Convenient, clean, good service
review: Enjoyed a 3-day weekend. The manager, Michael O'Connell greeted us warmly every evening. His professionalism, knowledge of the area and friendliness are beyond compare. The concierge, Josh advised us on where to eat and sightsee and called us the next day to see how our day went. Our room was spacious, spotless, and quiet. We had a gorgeous view of the Charles River and the sunset. The housekeeper, Lucia couldn't be nicer or more efficient. All staff members were very helpful and welcoming. We enjoyed many delicious meals at the restaurant. The New England Clam Chowder was the best soup we had in Boston. All of the restaurant staff made us feel at home. A fantastic weekend in a great city.

title: Two visits within in a week
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and commend our team members.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Michael, Josh and Lucia for their efforts. Michael, Josh and Lucia will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: nice stay but spoilt at the end
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Safe, central and relaxing.
review: I stayed at the hotel 4th-8th september,checked in online and when i went to the room it was already occupied by someone else. I spoke to reception and they then gave me another room, when i checked out they gave me a bill for $855.66 for that room.Told them to sort it out because i refused to pay it and was told that it is held and if they take it then they would refund it. Unacceptable, it spoilt what was an enjoyable stay, nice location for bars and restaurants. Staff were generally nice and friendly.

title: Park your car and enjoy your stay
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for originally placing you in an occupied room. We would also like to apologize for any errors with your bill. Please call the hotel directly and ask for the accounting department if there is any issues still not adjusted properly. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in the city so that we can make it right for you. We would love for you to stay with us and would be happy to work with modifying your reservation to your needs. Please call our hotel directly at 617-236-1100. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Had a wonderful stay here
review: Looking for a safe place and a central base in the middle of Boston from which to explore.  This hotel was wonderful!  Great breakfasts and the perfect launching point for Fenway, Freedom Trail, restaurants and more!

title: Excellent service and very clean
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our convenient location to all the local attractions. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Second stay and will return
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Absolutely horrible room service
review: After a long hot day of moving a student the Hilton was a welcome respite.  The room was immaculate, spacious and well appointed. Hotels in this area are expensive but this was not the most expensive by far. The building of the new Four Seasons Hotel right next door makes for early morning noise, even though we were put in a "quiet" room. Another year until the construction is to be completed, so beware.

title: Excellent location
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear we met your standards during your stay and the room was accommodating to your needs. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused from the construction across the street. We thank you for your business and loyalty and look forward to your next visit. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location for Berklee
review: The hotel looks nice and is convenient but the parking rate is $43 a day! But the reason I give if 1 star is because their room service is HORRIBLE. Very, very limited options and then it is delivered in a paper bag! At least they provide the "fancy" silver colored plastic ware. And the food was very disappointing. And this isn't because it's late or the hotel is under renovation-this is their actual every day room service. I've never seen a hotel of this level have such horrible room service. Go next door to the Sheraton

title: Very functional hotel
review: First and foremost, thank you for taking the time and effort to write us a thorough review on your stay with us.  We understand your room service experience at our hotel did not exceed your expectations and would like to apologize for that. We appreciate your feedback as we are continuously striving to improve our guest service experience. Our Director of Food & Beverage is reviewing your comments with the chef to ensure that our culinary and restaurant team are aware. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice but very expensive
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Very handy location
review: When you add the cost of the room and the guest parking, you are paying way too much per night for one person.  The hotel is clean and well kept, but it's not the Ritz Carlton.  The location is good, within walking distance of the Fenway.  Parking for guests should be free.

title: Terrible Exec Lounge
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our convenient location.  On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: UNACCEPTABLE
review: Friendly, helpful staff and elegant hotel.  Accommodation was excellent.  Handy location for tourist bus route and "T" station.  Some reasonable restaurants in the vicinity and handy for the Prudential Centre which can provide some retail therapy if it's required.

title: Highly recommend
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. Our staff has enjoyed reading your enthusiastic review and hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect hotel for your Boston stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Anniversary Weekend at Hilton, Back Bay
review: One thing I love about this hotel is the design; no matter what your room # is, you are close to the elevator. Yet the design of the elevator waiting area makes every room a peaceful one. The bedding is always comfortable and I have stayed in a lot of different rooms at this hotel, plenty of toiletries provided, the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, safes, and nice work desks. The executive lounge has a great variety of food and drinks; even free Starbucks coffee in the morning.  There is some construction across the street so sometimes it is difficult getting into the front door, but the side door on Dalton is every bit as convenient. There are several good and several fast food restaurants within close walking distance.  I've eaten in the hotel restaurant and always been…

title: Not good.
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We appreciate your business and your loyalty to the Hilton Boston Back Bay. Our staff will be thrilled to hear you enjoy the comfortable rooms and the amenities through the hotel. We would like to apologize for all inconvenience the construction across the street causes. Please let us know upon your next return if there ever is anything we can do to make your stay more enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Big rooms
review: Hotel was clean, but dated.  No bar/lounge available in lobby.  Breakfast buffet was cold.  Room was clean and bright but bathroom was dated and in poor working order.  Bathroom required two calls to engineering to resolve.

title: Good place to stay
review: First and Foremost Happy Anniversary from the Hilton Boston Back Bay Team. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  We are thrilled you chose to stay with us to commemorate such an important and special occasion. We appreciate your feedback as we are continuously taking comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  We are in the process of updating the rooms and we are sorry to have put you in a room that was not yet updated. At your next stay, we will be sure to get you in an updated room. We would also like to apologize for not properly giving directions to our in house bar and lounge. We have a bar in the lobby and are sorry you missed it during your stay. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location but tired
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Barton's review
review: I took my daughter to a convention at the Prudential Center for the weekend. We found the hotel quickly right off of Route 90. If u park at the Prudential Center, you will save $3 a day over the "discounted" price at the Hilton of $43. It' s a bit of a hike but we only had carry-ons so it was no problem. The entrance of the hotel was dirty and and cramped. We walked into the lobby and it was clean but seemed worn. Check-in was fine but the clerk never told me that the breakfast vouchers(I am a Hilton member) were good for the adjacent restaurant 40 Dalton and not just the Diamond Lounge. The choices would have been much better than the lounge. The lounge also had a fancy Starbucks machine. Great. It literally took 15 minutes of standing on line for my "free" cup of coffee.  Our…

title: Didn't even have to stay here to have a bad experience!
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We are sorry for the misunderstanding of the breakfast coupons, we appreciate your feedback and will use this opportunity to know to be more clear in our explanation to improve our guest's experience.  We appreciate all of your feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve and update our hotel.  We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay with another hotel at your next visit to Boston because we are dedicated to Making it Right and would love to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Just atrocious!
review: the holet and everything else was great.  However, when I checked out I was asked if I wanted to receive my receipt by e-mail.  I didn't receive it and neede it so I went to the Hilton Honors site.  I was unable to locate anything so I called one of the numbers suggested.  that was a scam trying to give me gifts on invitations to participate in a contest.  When I telephoned the hoel, the person on the other end was very helpful and I received my e-mail message with the receipt attached, immediately,.

title: Boston Escape
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We would like to apologize for you not originally receiving your receipt at check out as promised. We thank you for calling the hotel directly and are thrilled to hear we were able to help Make it Right and send you the receipt. We hope you have the opportunity to stay with us at your next visit to Boston. Your business and loyalty is important to us and we would be thrilled to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Poor value for money
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Ideal place to stay
review: The staff need training in how to look after their guests. From the moment we checked in they were very unfriendly, apart from one of the concierge staff members (Josh). The hotel is also poor value when compared to the adjacent Sheraton and the Copley Plaza (Fairmont). The one positive was the nearby 'Summer Shack' that is excellent value for money and the staff and food are fantastic.

title: Weekend in town to see the SOX
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We have forwarded this comment along to management to insure this issue is resolved immediately. On another note, we will be sure to commend Josh for his efforts. Josh will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Comfortable hotel in great area--somewhat pricey
review: We stayed here for four nights on the first leg of our honeymoon in the States.  First of all, Back Bay is such a nice area to stay and the hotel is in a quiet part. The T line is a 5 minute walk away, but we walked most of the time. The staff at the lobby were very helpful when we asked for directions,  We stayed up on the 18th floor (out of around 26) in a king size room with panoramic views - so worth it. The room had been quite recently renovated, and the standards of cleanliness were excellent.  Apart from the high standards at the hotel, one of the best things for us was the complimentary wifi in our room - it was much more convenient than having to sit around downstairs in the lobby to contact family and friends back in the UK.  Overall we were 100% happy with our choice…

title: Outstanding customer services,
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are glad you chose to stay with us during such an important and special occasion.  Congratulations from the Hilton Boston Back Bay team on your honeymoon. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your room on the 18th floor along with your complimentary W-Fi. Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: great option in convenient location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. title: Excellent Family Stay
review: We were passing through Boston and needed just one night's hotel stay. Our room was on the top floor (26) and had an amazing view. The staff of the hotel were incredibly friendly and helpful -- including front desk, housekeeping, bell captain, and valet. The hotel is a short, three-block walk to Newbury Street (world famous shopping) and close to Fenway Park if you want to see the Red Sox. We arrived hours before our room was ready, so they gave us a key to the 7th floor pool and workout area. We were able to hang out, relax, shower, and then go about our day until the room was ready. The only negative I would say is the rollaway bed. We had to pay $25.00 for it, which seemed a little silly, and it was like a medieval torture device.  I could feel every single metal coil of the…

title: Red Sox game
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We appreciate your feedback as we are continuously striving to improve our guest service agents. We are sorry to hear our roll-a-way beds were not to your standards. We hope you have the opportunity to stay with us at your next visit to Boston to take advantage of our prime location. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Hotel, Ace Room, Out of this world Staff
review: Our family of four stayed for two nights. It was excellent. We stayed here primarily because of its proximity to Fenway Park (Red Sox Baseball). Perhaps because of its appearance and because some reviewers talk of it having a conference-type reputation we thought it would be a bit dour and formal. It absolutely was not. It is surprisingly luxurious with great rooms, staff and facilities. Pool nice enough but a bit cold. A very pleasant surprise. Highly recommend it for travellers.

title: Excellent Location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our location and amenities throughout the hotel. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Wonderful experience for concert and visit to Boston
review: I attended a conference at this hotel and for a Hilton was extremely disappointed.  First upon check in.  My husband as to have come along but due to a problem could not.  I had asked at the front desk to have my name on  the invoice.  I was told this would be done.  My first room was in a part of the building behind the elevator bank.  I had no sleep all.  The noise was similar to an airplane flying over the building ever 30 seconds.  Also about 5 am the site next door was under construction so the noise came right through.  I went to the front desk and they apologized moving me to another room and giving me access to their member's lounge.  Ok  go to move into the second room and maintenance staff in there repairing 'this and that'.  Leave stuff, attend conference, and at the…

title: Great Location
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comments have been addressed to the Front Office Director to review with his staff. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location!
review: Our visit was exceptional.  In town for the James Taylor concert at Fenway Park.  Hotel very convenient to venue, parks, and restaurants.  Staff very helpful and efficient, especially the concierge.  Room was clean, large, and quiet.  Overall, a great experience.

title: Enjoyable but expensive stay
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location, neighboring Fenway.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for your next event. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: James Taylor at Fenway Park Stay
review: We arrived at the hotel tired after a long trip and were greeted by a bright and friendly man on reception who made us feel very welcome.  The room was beautiful and the bed one of the most comfy we have ever slept in. We had requested adjoining rooms to our teenage sons which we were allocated . Both rooms were large and bright with a very high standard of decor. The concierge was wonderful and gave us great advice for seeing Boston which we found to be a wonderful city to which we hope to return. Two days just wasn't long enough. We purchase a ticket through the concierge for a trolley bus hop on hop off service, a river cruise and a trip to the Boston Tea Party, all of which were fantastic. The Boston Tea Party being a real highlight.

title: Average Hilton hotel, noisy building work at present, expensive breakfast
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. Thank you for the gracious compliment on our rooms. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Very average Hilton
review: We stayed at the Hilton Boston Back Bay last week. We were in town from NY to see James Taylor at Fenway Park. The hotel is about a ten minute walk from Fenway and that is the main reason I selected it. The doorman was very helpful when we pulled up letting us know where to park and how to get to Fenway by foot. Check in was a breeze after selecting our room online earlier in the day. The room was a nice size and clean.  One negative was the in room wifi fee. Free in the lobby? Who wants to sit in the lobby and read their email? I think charging a fee for in room wifi in this day and age is nonsense. Being an Honors member should count for something. After the show the bar and restaurant staff were overwhelmed. A large portion of the guests staying there were at the concert and…

title: Fantastic......great location!!
review: The hotel was beautiful, the staff amazing and warm.  I will definitely come back to this hotel again.  The view from the top floor was well worth the trip.  The staff were attentive and made me feel very at home.

title: Lovely
review: Thank you for the kind words about the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and the staff upheld their Hilton Values with their warm hospitality. We thank you for choosing to stay with us as there a number of great hotels to choose from in Boston. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location and Staff
review: We spent two nights at this great location in Back Bay. This hotel has clean rooms, friendly staff and is in an excellent location. Close to everything.  Everything like Fenway, Boyleston and Newbury St shopping etc are all wishing close walking distance. Great cafes and restaurants in the local area. Would stay here again for sure!

title: Good service and Experience
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff and amenities throughout the hotel.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next time you stay with us. title: Nice hotel in good location
review: Stayed at Hilton Boston Back Bay for a couple of nights.  Very conveniently located in Boston.  Clean and quiet.  Staff was very kind and polite.  We enjoyed the location and the fitness/pool.  But I don't understand why the aircondition needs to be that cold in the lobby.

title: Great base to explore the city
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  Your comment concerning the air conditioning in the lobby has been addressed to the Director of Engineering, and he will resolve the issue. We would like to apologize for the temperature being set too low during your stay. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: The Hilton Difference
review: This hotel is very conveniently located within walking distance of the prudential centre, boylston street , Newbury street and even Fenway. There are lots of restaurants nearby. The Boston sightseeing tours stop just outside.  Checkin was very quick and efficient and the room was comfortable and clean.  The concierge was very helpful.

title: Great Boston Stay
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. title: Great hotel
review: This hotel has a smaller and more intimate feel than the other major competitors in the area.  As usual for the Hilton brand, it is staffed with helpful staff, the rooms are comfortable and well-maintained, and the amenities are Hilton quality.  One aspect that is worth noting, however, is that there is one small restaurant in the hotel and the hotel is not connected to the Prudential Center or Copley Place.  Because of this, the traffic through the hotel is much lighter than at the Marriott or Sheraton hotels.

title: Nice Hotel , Location Not Great
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be pleased to hear our hotel lived to the Hilton Values and Standards. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Everything done right!
review: Nice and clean hotel. Great location near Fenway park, nice and quiet. After a long day on the run it was great for the kids to relax in the pool. Nice terrase just outside the gym. Hotel staff friendly and helpfull.

title: Great location and Quiet, clean and roomy rooms
review: Thank you for all of your kind and thoughtful compliments on the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and the enhancements throughout the hotel. Our staff will be pleased to hear they lived through their Hilton values. Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel as there are a number to choose from throughout Boston. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back at your next visit to our beautiful city to take advantage of our prime location. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice place
review: This Hilton rates at the top for customer satisfaction. From Hakyung who greeted me with a warm smile at the front desk to Tony who brought me breakfast with his " you have a great day." I was impressed with everyone I met during my 4 day stay. I was conducting a 3 day management / leadership class and Mikel from banquets was in charge of my training room and he was outstanding. He quietly took care of my participants needs the full three days of training.   The Details The room was wonderful. I needed a feather free room and it as ready when I checked in. The head housekeeper and Hakyung called me to make sure everything was perfect. I had a king bed and plenty of space and hangers in the closet. They even gave you a large bathrobe to use ( that was a nice treat). In the…

title: Started out so terrible...
review: Thank you for sharing such kind  and thoughtful words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, especially Hakyung, and Mikel, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We will also be sure to inform Tony that you enjoyed his service and let our chef, along with his culinary team, know that the lemon chicken, the steak and your CP Express Order you had was amazing.  They will all be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: terrific location
review: Just at few step if the Fenway Park, this hotel is  complete, pool, restaurant. Staff was very carefull and at checkin the guy speak with us in French. Room was very clean and bathroom was very good. Parking was also very easy. Also a Cafe inside the loby where they sell starbuck cofee.

title: Perfectly ordinary Hilton in good location esp for Fenway
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff and amenities throughout the hotel.  Our guest service agents will be thrilled to hear that they were able to provide you with excellent service that exceeded your expectations.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: July Visit to Boston
review: I stayed at this hotel with my family for a couple of nigths.. The experience was excellent the room was huge , clean and very well equiped. The location was very convenient as it was very close to all the places we wanted to visit. The staff very cooperative and well disposed. Definitely would recommend.

title: West Coast to East Coast
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Easily a 5 star in other countries
review: There was nothing difficult about this hotel.  The bed, linens and especially pillows were totally amazing.  Staffing was available and accommodating.  The only issue is getting a cab to go anywhere and house keeping knocking on door in the early morning (they were totally sold out).  I wish I had more time and would go back.

title: Doesn't get any better than this
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We would like to apologize for the disturbance in the morning from our staff. We understand a quiet night's sleep. We are also very sorry to hear you were unable to get a cab from our hotel. At your next stay, we will be sure to have a doorman assist you with the cab.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Time and Good Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great service and convienent to Fenway!
review: We stayed at the Hilton Back Bay from July 16-July20th. The hotel itself is a nice and clean property with very friendly staff. Having the Starbucks in the lobby is a huge bonus. There is construction going on all around the hotel, however there is construction going on all around Boston, so there is nothing to be done about this. The workers didn't start working until about 7-8am and even then if you are on an upper level floor the sound is blocked out.   Perfect location if you are taking in any event at Fenway, or if you want to pub hop down Boylston Street. Newberry Street is just a short walk away for shopping and the hotel itself is about a 10-15 minute walk from Boston Commons, or an $8-$10 UberX ride..   We would definitely stay at the Hilton again, the staff and…

title: Best hotel experience we've ever had!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Helpful Staff, renovated rooms... throughly enjoyable stay
review: My sister and I had been planning a trip to Boston for a while and booked this hotel because of its location in regard to Fenway park.  We stayed for two nights and were extremely happy with the experience.  Benjamin at the front desk bent over backwards to make sure we had a room next to our friends, he was more than willing to accomodate all of our needs.  Paul at the bar provided us with tips for our stay and made delicious cocktails too.  We would definitely go back to the Hilton Back Bay Boston.

title: Good Location, Great Rooms
review: We enjoyed reading your enthusiastic review about how much you enjoyed your experience at the Hilton Back Bay.  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a thoughtful review commending Paul and Benjamin for upholding their Hilton Values and exceeding your expectations.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Not what I expected from a Hilton
review: First of the staff. They are excellent. Very helpful and very courteous. From the bellman,concierge all the way to front desk. No complaints whatsoever about the staff. Even the Starbucks staff in the lobby are excellent. The location: Very good not great. This property is located at the end of the Newburry street. So it is quite a walk to Boston common Park.  We did not have problems with this, we enjoy walking. But there maybe some other travellers that do not like to walk. If that is you, we suggest you book other hotels such as Taj or Mandarin Oriental. The quality of room itself is slightly above average. It is not bad, but not great either. You can hear people flushing and taking showers from next door. And yes, Boston is quite expensive. Hotel this caliber in Washington…

title: Great rooms with amazing city views, top-notch staff, next to Fenway Park!, great concierge lounge
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. It is unfortunate that your stay with us was not exemplary, as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We hope that you will stay with us again and address any issues, concerns, or requests so that we can fully accommodate your needs and exceed your expectations. Your business and loyalty is important to us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect location for Fenway weekend
review: I was attending a conference at the next-door Sheraton but missed out on their $229 rooms so I ended up at this Back Bay Hilton literally across the street at $400 per night. I was supposedly 'upgraded' to a room on the 24th floor, a 'corner room'. It was very average; your standard king bed, desk, small couch, bureau, flat screen. The bathroom was small with a step-in-tub shower (with water pressure strong enough to take your skin off). I figured as a high-end expensive hotel, certainly they'd have a mini-bar; I was wrong, and after a 7 hour commute from LA, I wanted a drink. So, I headed to a nearby bottle shop. When I looked for a glass upon my return to the room, I discovered that all they had were two of those tiny ultra-flimsy clear plastic cups wrapped in plastic that…

title: Friendly Staff, but dated rooms
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Convenient location in Boston!
review: Clean and quiet.  Great location for walking downtown and to Fenway.  The room with the two doubles is a bit small, but super comfortable and clean. Staff are very helpful and provided great directions and site seeing tips.

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: Thank you for sharing the kind words about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear you stay exceeded your expectations and the location was affordable to your trip. We are sorry the size of our double bedroom was not up to your standards but we are delighted it was the right level of comfort. We are thrilled the staff was instrumental in providing you with a positive stay.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back at your next visit to Boston to continue to build on your trust and loyalty.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location
review: Stayed one night while picking up my daughter at Boston Conservatory.  Traveled with my mother who uses a mobility scooter and requires a handicap room.  From the minute we pulled into the driveway we were greeted by the doorman Vernon, who made us feel so welcomed - he was great in helping us maneuver her scooter in / out of the car.   And was the source of good conversation whenever we left the hotel.  Check in was expedient and the entire staff was welcoming and very accommodating.  Our room was small but had a great view of the river and Fenway park.  The room was handicap accessible - with the bathroom fully equipped.  The only complaint had to do with the bathroom.  The shower drained slowly which resulted in the water to expand across the bathroom floor (it was a handicap…

title: Best hotel and service in Boston proper
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are sorry our bathrooms has some issues causing to make it more difficult in use. We will share this information with our Engineering Department to ensure these issues are resolved to improve our guest service experience. Thank you for also commending Vernon for his efforts. He will be proud to hear he lived through his Hilton Values throughout your stay. We hope you will stay with us again at your next visit to Boston, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great family stay!

title: This place really grew on me
review: The Hilton Boston Back Bay provided a great experience for our first Boston stay.  The location was great, near the mall and train station, right down from Fenway and plenty of dining choices.  Front desk very accommodating, room clean and quiet, and the terrace a great place the eat our take out lunch.

title: Great location!
review: Thank you for sharing your stay at the Hilton Back Bay, we are so happy to hear it was one that exceeded your expectations. We are delighted to hear the hotel in a convenient location to all the Boston attractions and restaurants for your family stay. Thank you for taking the time to commend the Front Desk staff for efforts and hard work. It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back again at your next visit to Boston. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: ...Meh..
review: At first glance I went go "hmmmm," but at the end of our six-day stay I looked forward to going back to this place every day.  It's relatively small and triangular-shaped and it's alongside a one-lane street and overshadowed by the bigger Sheraton across the street.  But the staff was always helpful, the elevators were always there despite some groups being in the hotel and while the room wasn't the Ritz, it worked great for us.  Ours had a king bed and plenty of room.  There was only one sink, but we managed.  One stupid thing I really appreciated:  they apparently gave up on maintaining the mini-bar, but kept it in the room.  We were able to buy stuff at the nearby Star Market and keep it refrigerated.  Turns out the location is great for Back Bay:  within walking distance to…

title: Perfect Location, Messy Service Administration
review: Thank you for sharing you stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay, we are delighted to hear it was one that exceeded your expectations and left you with positive memories. We are thrilled to hear the location was convenient and accommodating with your vacation and you enjoyed the amenities throughout the hotel like the mini fridge. On another note, we would like to apologize for you room not cleaned on time two of the days during your stay. We will pass your comment along to the Housekeeping Team again in aim to prevent this from occurring again. We hope you will stay with us again at your next visit to Boston to continue to build on your trust and loyalty.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Boston trip
review: Recently stayed in Boston for three days, two nights.  The Hilton Boston Back Bay is a great location--close to Fenway park, a block from the Prudential Center and close to the "T".  There were nice amenties in the hotel--the lemon and orange infused water was a nice touch.  Also a Starbucks is located it the lobby of the hotel. Would recommend staying there and am looking forward to my next stay in Boston.

title: Quality declines for profit
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We are delighted to know you enjoyed the Starbucks and other amenities in our lobby. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect Getaway!
review: Hotel very convenient to walking to baseball game and prudential center. Used Charlie to tour Sam Adams brewery,hotel service people very helpful with that experience and directions to brewery. I would probably stay in that area again.

title: Very Convenient Location
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service; We are happy to hear they were able to help make your trip easier and more memorable. We are delighted to hear you will visit Boston again, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Loved It
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent Stay!
review: We stopped in Boston for a couple of days before heading to an event in Providence, and I really wish we could have stayed. We arrived late and check-in was quick and friendly. The room was clean and modern and there seemed to be good views in every direction.   Two staff members stood out. A concierge (I think his name was Josh), who was really knowledgeable and is just a genuinely nice guy.  A server in the restaurant in the morning (Grace), who brought a pancake with a candle in it for our daughter who was celebrating her birthday that day. We were impressed with all the staff there.  The hotel is in a great location and has a nice pool and a well-equipped fitness centre. Restaurants, shops, attractions and more are all a short walk away. I would recommend the Hilton Back Bay…

title: Clean, and close to everything
review: It was our pleasure to read such an exciting review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and the staff was instrumental in that. We are thrilled that your daughter enjoyed celebrating your birthday with us and will be sure to inform Grace that she surpassed your expectations.  Our team members continuously strive to create memorable experiences and will love to hear that she went above and beyond. We also thank you for taking the time to commend Josh for his informative efforts. Thank you for taking the time and effort to write this review.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again and hopefully you'll be able to have a longer stay :) Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great visit
review: It was my birthday weekend and I have always wanted to go to Boston.  Since my husband travels so much for work, he accumulated enough points at the Hilton for us to stay using our points.  I am so glad we picked this hotel!  The staff was friendly and ready to answer any and all questions we had.  Because my husband is a Diamond Honors member, we got to eat the free breakfast in the Diamond Lounge every morning.  It was considered "continental" but I'd say it was more than continental.  They had cold cereals, muffins, pastries, fruits, yogurt, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, oatmeal, bagels and breads, juices, coffee and tea.  Plenty for the $0 pricetag.  Our room on the 16th floor was clean, as was the bathroom.  The pool was located on the 7th floor, as was the gym and sun…

title: Superb hotel! The staff was excellent. Location perfect.
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such kind words about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are more than thrilled you enjoyed your first time in Boston and thank you for choosing to stay with us as you celebrated your birthday. Our team members will be more than happy to hear they were instrumental in providing you with a memorable experience. We will be sure to commend Vernon, Josh and Jasoda for their efforts and living through their Hilton Values. We love the picture of your son and Vernon :)  We also thank you for taking the time to share your experience in the Diamond Lounge. We are happy you enjoyed our delicious breakfast buffet. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel at your next visit to Boston.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Back Bay Hilton
review: We absolutely loved staying at Hilton Back Bay.  The service was top notch and all of the employees were so kind and generous.  The room was very comfortable for our family of 4 and we greatly enjoyed the fitness room and pool as well.  We would definitely stay at this hotel again in the future!

title: Great Stay!
review: Thank you for taking the time to share a cheerful review about the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are absolutely thrilled you had a positive stay and loved your room and the fitness center. We are happy to hear the staff was helpful and informative. Thank you again for taking the time and effort to share your experience. It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back to build on your trust and loyalty. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Decent Location
review: The hotel, staff and location were perfect! We were in the heart of the city and our stay was perfect! The staff recommended activities, restaurants and great travel options. The beds were to die for and the rooms were extremely clean. It's a bit pricey for a long stay but worth the indulgence!

title: Great attitude and service!!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to share such kind words about the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are absolutely thrilled you had a positive stay and loved your room. We are happy to hear the staff was helpful and informative. Thank you again for taking the time and effort to share your experience. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to build on the trust and loyalty we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay decent for short stay
review: Enjoying our stay here. Excellent location for shopping and restaurants. Clean and comfortable as Hilton is. Only complaint is that double beds have king pillows which makes it difficult for two to sleep in one bed with these huge pillows.

title: Amazing location, friendly staff, clean facilities
review: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay in Boston and our hotel was conveniently located for you. We are pleased to hear our rooms were comfortable and up to your standards. We thank you for the feedback on the pillows and will take that into consideration as we strive to improve your experience. We hope you will visit us again soon; it would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Conference Visitor
review: We stayed at the Hilton Back Bay the weekend prior to July 4th for 3 nights, review highlights & improvement areas:  Positives: Location, the Back Bay area is very nice and the hotel is located in the heart of it, just off the main streets, which is good for access to the shops, neighborhood, & noise outside the hotel. Accommodated request for very early checkin @10am, the staff was friendly and helpful Small lobby, easy parking, and no waiting for cabs Rooms are quite large for the smaller sized rooms of comparabile hotels in the area A lot of grocery/convenience stores and restaurants nearby Nice pool, whirlpool, and workout facilities on the 7th floor  Improvement areas: Very noisy on the honors 6th floor, due to triangle shape of building, heard the elevators all day/night…

title: Central location for shopping & touring
review: Thank you for sharing your feedback about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear the convenience of our location afforded you and the staff was instrumental in providing you with a positive stay. We are pleased to hear we lived our Hilton Values with you. On another note, we understand the importance and value of a quiet nights rest and we would like to apologize for the elevator disturbance during your stay. We would also like to apologize for the ice machine being broken on your floor. We have spoken with the Director of Engineering and all ice machines have been repaired. We are also sorry for any issue involving getting a cab from our hotel. We have reviewed your comment with all management and guest service agents to prevent that from occurring again. We hope you will consider staying with us again at your next visit to Boston so we have the opportunity to exceed all of your expectations.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: There are mixed reviews for this property, ours is very high!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Not Impressed!
review: I recently read reviews on yelp and was taken back. We are HH members and have been for years. We have stayed in many Hilton brands and locations. Many have far greater locations than this, but there is a lot to consider here. We live South of Boston, so to drive here is the easiest, Mass Ave exit, and a very direct route, just off from Mass Ave. it is directly across from the Sheryon Hotel, which directly connects to the Hynes and the Prudencial Center and Mall and Mall and Mall. They connect to Back bay station and the Green Line subway stop. Beside the Pudential Center there is Boyston Street and Newberry Street shopping. It is just outside of the Theater District. There are sos so so many things near including just a short walk to a Red Sox game and a very direct drive to…

title: Great Location
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to share such kind words about your experience with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience and greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to continually stay at with us at Hilton locations. It is through guest feedback such as yours that we strive to improve our guest experience. We will also be sure to commend our team members for their efforts. They will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton values and culture and were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. It would truly be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect July 4th Visit
review: We were so disappointed with not only our stay at the Hilton but also with how our concerns were handled by staff (when issues occurred), the front desk (via checkout), and Sharon Reid (via a follow up email).  We stayed at the Hilton on Valentine's Day and were immediately very surprised by the unfriendly nature of front desk staff upon check in.  After checking in, we left for our dinner reservations.  Boston was experiencing the start of what would turn out to be a blizzard, and hotel staff did a very nice job of mopping the lobby to keep the floor dry and prevent guests from slipping.  After our reservations, we had a drink at the hotel bar.  The bar did not have Riesling or mint for a mojito (or its own bathroom...guests need to use the bathroom in the hotel lobby).  We…

title: Great location- easy to walk to everywhere
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We are sincerely sorry about the maintenance working through the night and disrupting your stay. We have discussed this matter with their Director and we ensure you, this will not occur again. We are also sorry we were unable to provide you with all of the amenities and drink selections at the Forty Dalton Bar. We change our drink options seasonally.  We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Shower
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Business Trip
review: Hilton hotel is always helping us for staying in foreign countries especially Hawaii. The most impressed thing is 2 nights stay and another one night free! We had been in Boston for three years and now my daughter will enter a high school in New England and we hope sometime visit this area in the future. Everything was OK except shower. It was raining when we stayed the hotel and we hoped we could reach to shopping mall without umbrella like Sheraton Hotel. Coffee shop was really helpful for us. Building itself is now under constructions and we hope entrance and parking approach will be better. On my business, I spent a lot of time in Hilton and last May, I stayed Denver Hilton and could enjoyed staying. Next trip is Frankfurt and Paris in Next month and I will check a Hotel of…

title: We had a great experience
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to write such kind words about your recent stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We appreciate guests like you and are truly thrilled to learn that Hilton is consistently exceeding your expectations and creating memorably positive experiences for you and your family. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. However, it is unfortunate that issues with the shower arose during your stay. This is certainly not the type of service and experience we wish to provide our guests. We would like to apologize for any discomfort and inconvenience this may have caused. Your comment has been reviewed by the Director of Engineering and all maintenance issues have been resolved. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope you will give us the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: I know it's Boston but for that price?
review: Great Location. Walkable distance to Fenway Park. 10 mins taxi to The Garden. Next to Haynes Convention Center. Mall around the corner. Great Restaurants at walking distance. 45 mins driving to the Gillette Stadium

title: Great Customer Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent experience with us and found the location of our hotel convenient. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We hope you will stay with us again for your next visit; it would be our pleasure to welcome you back.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: 5 nights -  Average hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Over the TOP customer service
review: Location is great.  10 mins to the Tube, walk through sheraton hotel to Prudential center with shopping and resturants within reach. Rather disappointing under the Hilton brand.  The room is old but clean, housekeeping is clean but inconsistent in delivering water and amenities.  I only get my bottle water and shower gel on the last day and my colleague didn't get any throughout his stay.  We requested for shower gel at the reception on thr first day and we were told they don't provide.  :(  Coffee machine is provided but no kettle.  You have to use the coffee machine to boil your hot water.   Hot water is fast at the shower and great that you don't need to run cold water, which is always a plus. They don't provide toothbrush , not too sure if this is a norm in the states.   I…

title: Construction a cross the street from Hotel
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We are sincerely sorry for replenishing all amenities in you and your colleague's room. Your comment has been addressed to the Director of Housekeeping; He has reviewed this matter with his team to avoid this issue from occurring again. We hope you will visit us in the future so that we may have an opportunity to make it right. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect stay
review: We spent one night at this Hilton before a trip abroad and visited a local friend. First off we arrived at 1030am from Logan, fully expecting to just dump our bags and start exploring the city but the friendly professional staff stated she had a room already available!..Great news!  Everyone from hotel to cleaning staff to restaurant employees just over the top helpful,friendly and professional.  Puts customer service to a new height as a frequent Marriott customer the have NOTHING on this Hilton team.  TOP drawer!

title: None
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend our team for their top drawer service! They will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty
