title: Our Opinion of this HIlton Grows!
review: I've been there multiple times with my family.  This place is awesome great staff. Great location. The pool and jacuzzi is awesome . Rooms are beautiful.   I will definitely go back a thousand times more.

title: Hilton Oversell = Unhappy Family
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing exceptional experiences for you. We are thrilled to hear always enjoy your stay and the amenities throughout the hotel. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your continuous choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Please let us know if there is ever anything we can do to make your stay above and beyond.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Not a typical Hilton
review: This is at least our third stay at this Hilton.  And I'd have to say that this was our best experience thus far.  It continues to be at an excellent location - even with the construction going on across the street, we were able to get to everything quite easily.  Just two short blocks south on Belvedere, you reach Huntington Street, where there is public transportation - both the bus and the subway (T).  The Back Bay train station, a grubby minimal station, is nevertheless just a short taxi ride away (we could've walked, but our luggage would've made that a challenge).  And Boylston Street and the heart of the very engaging Back Bay neighborhood is just a couple blocks north.  This time we even had a room with a view, to the north of the Charles River, the Back Bay, and Fenway…

title: Not great for business, but well located across from the Sheraton
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and location made it an even better stay! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the many attractions around the Back Bay area and the convenience of the public transportation to get you around to more great places in Boston. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We look forward to your next stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city to take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Do not give your credit card at check-in
review: This hotel didn't live up to the hype at all. And we are Hilton Diamond members. My husband got VERY sick while we were staying there. We kept waiting for him to get better, and I didn't want to leave him so both the room service people and the restaurant people couldn't just make me a simple sandwich. Finally the grill/bar place did after I had been given the run around for awhile. Since he eventually didn't get better, we knew he had to go to the hospital. When I first called, the woman at the front desk offered us a ride to Boston Medical. By the time I called back 2 mins later she had left for home without us. So we had to take a cab. After a four hour ER visit, they wouldn't pick us up either so we had a hard time getting a cab at 3:30 am. We switched to a different Hilton…

title: OVERPRICED AND HOTEL STAFF WAS VERY UNPROFESSIONAL!!!
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we hope your husband is feeling better and we greatly apologize for not reaching your expectation with our service. We have forwarded your concern to the Food and Beverage Director who will ensure this does not occur again. We apologize for the confusion on our behalf and will be sure the team provides our guests with better service. We would also like to sincerely apologize for not taking the proper actions with your husband's need for a ride. We have brought this comment up with the Guest Service Agents to explain this is unacceptable behavior. We are sorry to hear you left our hotel to stay at another property in Boston. If it is not too late, we would love to have the opportunity to make it right with you and your family and rebuild your trust. Thank you again for being a loyal Hilton member.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Location Perfection!
review: They misused my credit card They had payment dispute with booking agent I stayed in oct 2014 and they charge heavy amount daily to my credit card in December2014 When information was given to them they stop replying my mails

title: Great location!
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize any issues that arose on your credit card throughout your stay. This review has been forwarded to our Accounting department and they would love to review with you any charges that were put on your card. Please call the accounting office directly at (617)867-6002. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in the city so that we can make it right for you. We would love for you to stay with us and would be happy to work with modifying your reservation to your needs. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: lousy location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Convenient location
review: on very busy street.no valet parking. construction site next door.ordinary lobby.rooms a little worn. close to good shopping,dining along boylston and newbury streets.construction at prudential center messes up access to shops there.if you want to buy any groceries,drinks.go down street behind and past pru.there is great star market

title: Excellent room, disappointing WiFi
review: Thank you for taking the time to rate your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay, as exceeding our guests’ expectations is very important to us. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the construction at the front entrance to the Prudential Mall. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. We are also very sorry our lobby was outdated, We are truly sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to your expectations and have taken your review into consideration. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Comfortable and convenient!
review: The hotel was well staffed with friendly personnel throughout. You can ride the Logan express bus from the airport to the hotel for $5.00. It's also on the olde towne hop on hop off bus stop. It's withnin walking distance of many beautiful parks and historic places. I really enjoyed the public library by Copley square where the John Adams presidential library is located. It's beautiful! Also, there are many restaurants you can walk to as well as the prudential center that has some nice shopping, restaurants and an observation deck. The restaurant is very nice too. The rooms are larger than normal. They serve a nice breakfast buffet and during the week they have a light appetizer selection with beer and wine to purchase. If you are a diamond member there is a separate room for…

title: Incredibly Chill! THANK YOU!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  We are happy you enjoyed the many attractions throughout Back Bay. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. Our Diamond Lounge Attendants will be thrilled to read such an amazing review about their dedication to our guests. They strive to make sure you have  everything you need in the lounge and they will be honored to know that didn't go unnoticed. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Adequate
review: The initial room had housekeeping issues with a dirty loo and hair on the bed - this was changed on request  The other room had a great view but terrible noise issue from the lift shaft and external construction  Conveniently located with pleasant staff though!

title: Good location but would not stay again if something else is available
review: Thank you for taking the time to provide us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your thoughtful feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and consistently take comments into consideration in efforts to exceed expectations. It is always a pleasure to hear that our team contributed to making your stay more enjoyable. However, we are truly sorry to hear about the issues with your hotel room and would like to apologize for any inconvenience and discomfort this may have caused. We also understand your expectations for a quiet night’s sleep and would like to apologize for the elevator noise and the construction across the street. Our aim is to provide you with the best experience possible. At your next stay, please share with us your past experience and it will be our pleasure to make it right. We look forward to your continued business and loyalty on your next visit and providing you a positively memorable stay. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Love the Back Bay Hilton
review: Decent location (had business at BWH), clean room, nice bed.  On the flip side, amenities are pretty Spartan and decor is dated.  Price is high for what you get, but that's standard in Boston.  Friendly staff.  At the end of the day, though, nothing remarkable about it.

title: Tired hotel needing upgrade
review: We appreciate the time you took to talk about your recent stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. It is our pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay, as it is our goal to ensure that every guest has a positively memorable experience at the hotel. We are truly sorry to hear that the hotel amenities were not up to your expectations and have taken your review into consideration. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location.  Inconsistent service
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: GREAT SERVICE
review: I stayed at this hotel twice a month this January, February and March.  Each time checking in was a different experience except for the question 'Have you stayed with us before'?.  Obviously their reservation system doesn't allow them to access this type of data and greet their repeat guests.  Most of the time they forgot to give me breakfast vouchers and I had to ask.  As a Honors Gold member, I was never offered an upgrade, even if I chose my room on-line.  The location is great, for restaurants on Boylston St and shopping in the area.  The restaurant in the hotel is nothing special.  Parking is expensive and the garage next door, by the bowling alley is a bit less and very close.  I consistently chose this hotel for the price, compared to other hotels in the area, it was…

title: Good choice in Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your couple past experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear you enjoy the hotel and continue to be a loyal guest. Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback to help them continue to proudly uphold the Hilton Values and provide our HHonor Members with the greatest experience.  We look forward to your next stay with us to take advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Back Bay Stay
review: i really love the whole experience. Rooms were clean and fresh.  From the time of arrival was treated with respect.  the staff especially Cindy was very kind and courteous and answer every question we had.  Even help us to find a good place to eat. for dinner that first night.  the cleaning lady, Winnifred was very nice to, made sure we had want we needed for our rooms when we ran out.

title: Excellent location, great staff, easy parking, very clean
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Cindy and Winnifred for their efforts. Cindy and Winnifred will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience from time of arrival and throughout your stay. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: A very good hotel and good location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: A wonderful stay at a comfortable hotel.
review: I have stayed here twice on the last ten years. The hotel has not changed much. Service is still good. Self parking is right there next to the front entrance. Just drive right up to the door and forward is the parking. The rooms are not big but nice enough with coffee supplies and a small fridge. The cleanliness is good. Bathrooms are tiny. Staff is well trained and there is almost goodly number of staff at the lobby. For loyalty status guests, the executive breakfast room is small and oddly configured. The breakfast offering is good. There are better hotels in the Back Bay but this is smaller and less bustling.

title: Can't give it more than a three...
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review about your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear your stay exceeded your expectations and our staff was instrumental in providing you with that exceptional stay. We are also thrilled to hear the breakfast in the executive lounge was up to your standards. We hope you will choose to stay with us again at your next visit to Boston. We would love to welcome you back as we continue to build on your trust and loyalty.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Well maintained property in Back Bay
review: We arrived at the Hilton Back Bay Hotel at 7:00 AM after a red eye flight from Phoenix. Our reservation was for two rooms.  One for my wife and I and the other for our adult kids.  When the front desk lady said both rooms were ready I was elated.  I though we were going to have to roam around Boston that day like zombies because of no sleep.  In stead we all took a four hour nap in our pleasant rooms and our vacation was off to a great start.

title: Full Service, Aging Hotel, Good Location
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton by name, only
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Pleasure
review: First point of contact disappointing, open your own doors, lug your own suitcase to your room, no bell boy, no offer to send luggage up.  Please note major construction site happening right next door, easily heard at their 6am start each morning from 13 floors up, sound proofing of windows non existent.  Room services less than basic.  Plastic cups, wow they've thought of everything..... Went to reception to enquire about some wine glasses and a bottle opener, good God you can't bring your own wine to a hotel, it's against Massuchusetts laws ..........Oh but would you rate me a 10 or no less than a 9 for my assistance?  Duh. I am trying to help you help me and you want a rating Before providing a solution.........is this customer service.?  I am sure that one day the cleaner…

title: Nice enough
review: I  appreciate the feedback you have provided your review. Please accept my deepest apologies for failing to meet your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We are beyond sorry about your first impression upon arrival. We should of had a guest service agent there to greet you and carry all bags to your room; If I may ask, did you arrive by the Dalton street entrance? This comment has been addressed  with our guest service team to avoid this issue from ever occurring again. We would also like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  The wine situation was poorly handled, no matter what the local regulation is. Our new initiative, CP express, replaces room service. We certainly appreciate your comments on the matter. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Should you wish, I would be happy to call you at a convenient time to discuss your experience. Sincerely, Dominique Marty

title: Poor Experience at this Hilton
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel while in Boston. The staff was was attentive and helpful, and our room was very nice. We were able to walk to Fenway Park to watch the Red Sox play and it only took about 20 minutes to get there. Plan on walking around Boston a lot so wear comfortable shoes.

title: Not Great, Not Bad
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations Our staff will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back with your walking shoes. :) Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Solid Choice in a Good Location.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Two nights at the Hilton in Back Bay Boston
review: The Hilton Back Bay is a mid-level Hilton property with decent rooms and great location.  I was given a complimentary WiFi password for free, which typically costs $15/day.  The front desk was very helpful - they told me they are doing a complete gut of the property in the next year.  It could use a spruce up but not bad for the walkable location.

title: Decent Stay
review: Thank you for posting such kind words about your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: May visit 2015
review: Attractive building with comfortable dining room. Staff very approachable and especially helpful . Only wished we had chosen a more central hotel. Beds fabulous but size of pillows was awful. I questioned these with staff and was informed they were 'Hilton pillows'. There were two pillows allocated per double bed, hence one pillow for each guest. The problem with this was the length of the pillows, each pillow, side by side, overhung  the edge of the bed by at last 12 inches each side. Not at all comfortable. We would not have wanted to spend more than two nights wrestling with these pillows. Hilton group should review use of these pillows on double beds as they are far too big.

title: Can take a reservation, but doesn't understand how to HOLD a reservation!
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  On another note, we would like to apologize for our pillows not meeting your standards. I will bring your comment to the attention of our Director of Housekeeping and see if there is anything he can do to resolve this matter. Certainly, we want our guests to be at their highest level of comfort during their stay. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Totally average
review: The Hilton Boston Back Bay is in the perfect location for touring all the fabulous sights in Boston.  Fenway Park is within walking distance (a must see), as well as many restaurants, shops, and tourist attractions.  Tour buses depart right outside of the hotel entrance.  Rooms were spacious and clean, and front desk personnel were friendly and helpful.  A prime example of Hilton hospitality...

title: Horrendous.
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you and commend our Front Desk Guest Agents.  We are absolutely thrilled they lived their Hilton Values and were instrumental in your positive stay. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Worst Stay Ever
review: The hotel is clean and the staff is friendly.  There was nothing about this hotel that made it stand out from others in the area.  The room service is very expensive and the WiFi is not free.  The bartender, Paul, is pretty awesome.

title: Excellent stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team member for providing you with excellent guest service.  We will be sure to commend Paul for his efforts. On another note, we would like to apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: So so...

title: Good deal, good location
review: Very nice people working there! Answers and solutions for every question, always with a smile on the face! But... Kind of old at the lobby. Breakfast could improve! Noisy 'cause construction beside... Rooms and cleanness ok! Location could be better...but not that bad... That's about it!

title: Pleasing
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel and our team members. We would like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations upon your next return. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Fantastic staff!
review: I had a very good deal booking this hotel. The room was spacious and neat. The location was excellent, just across the road to Newbury Street or Hynes Convention Center which was connected to Prudential Center. It's a much cheaper with relatively similar quality choice then Sheraton right opposite to Hilton.

title: Great Experience
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our centralized location. We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Lodging in Back Bay
review: The Hilton Back Bay in Boston is situated in a pleasant location, close to shopping, Fenway Park and lots of restaurants covering all ethnicities and price ranges. It has courteous staff and the amenities are excellent.

title: Amazing
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff and amenities in the lobby.  We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location for restaurants and somewhat close to financial district.
review: Stayed at the Hilton Back Bay, expenses would not allow a rental car, so there is a lot within walking distance of this hotel. Staff is great. You are close to Fenway Park. I walked to a different restaurant every day for three weeks. (four days per week.) Nice views from the upper floors as well.

title: Everything is grand but the food service !
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton good news

title: Changing Hoteling - Well done!
review: We stayed at the Hilton Back Bay and was very pleased with the hotel.  The service,  room, and amenities were good.  The location was great.  Walked home from Fenway Park,  and walked often to all the places we wanted to go.  It's a great place to stay if visiting Boston.

title: Pleasantly Surprised!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience and are delighted to hear you enjoyed the service and amenities at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great girls trip
review: I didn't want to stay in the Back Bay.  Its no where near our offices.  But I was pleasantly surprised.  I received a welcome email before I arrived.  I was warmly greeted at the desk and was able to get a quick bite at the bar with a fantastic bartender.  The room was spacious and comfortable.  I got another email the afternoon before my departure showing me what my bill would likely look like.  Two small nits.  Its hard to get Uber to know where to pick you up because of the construction and the barista at the Starbucks borders on unpleasant.

title: Met expectations
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. On another note, we would like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your Uber ride was complicated. We would also like to apologize for the service provided at Starbucks. This has been brought to the attention of our Food & Beverage Director and he will ensure this does not occur again. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: It was fine- standard Hilton
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. title: Central location decent accommodations
review: It was clean, the staff was very friendly, it's a great location. As many have said before it's exactly what you would expect, not a lot more and nothing less. Try for the high floors as the views can be spectacular, one of our rooms had a gorgeous view of Fenway Park and the Charles River

title: Good price, good location
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff and gorgeous city view.  Our staff will be thrilled to hear that they were able to provide you with excellent service.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good base for Boston holiday.
review: I lived in Boston in the late 70s early 80s but as a student never had the opportunity to stay at hotels. This past week I was there on business and my company put me up at this Hilton.   I'm a Hilton Honors Diamond member and have stayed at Hiltons all over the U.S. and the world.   This Hilton was nice. Loved the location. Right off Boylston street with all the cool shops and restaurants. Walking distance to Boston Commons. And the metro is right next door and can take you anywhere.   Room was nice and clean. Comfy bed. Small fridge which is always nice. Did not eat at restaurant but seems nice. There is a Diamond Member room that offers snacks and beverages 24/7.

title: Hilton Back Bay Hotel
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are thrilled you had time during your stay to enjoy the Diamond Lounge and took the time and effort to share your experience. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Boston Back Bay Hilton, Mass.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great location. Nice amenities. Dated Hilton atmosphere.
review: Good central location, walk to T, next to the Prudential Center Sky Walk Obseervation and Pru Shops Room clean, refrigerator, very comfortable king bed-Hilton never disappoints. Downside, overnite parking expensive $43 but prob. in keeping with the other nearby hotels. Parking in Boston expensive

title: Disappointing, and a terrible value for the price
review: Thank you so much for all of your kind words about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are excited to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location afforded you. We appreciate your compliments on a wonderful service. On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Expected more
review: I loved staying here for the location and the HHonors Diamond amenities but couldn't help feeling envious when looking at the interior of the Sheraton across the street or the rooms at the Colonnade just a block away. This should be on Hilton's list for a remodel ASAP. That said, the service was excellent from the front desk to the maid service to the Diamond Lounge free food and free beverages. The room was very clean and well maintained with an excellent king bed mattress and pillows. The corner room was very roomy with a nice view of the Back Bay but just very plainly decorated.

title: Stay Elsewhere
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff and amenities in the Diamond Lounge. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: #Awesome Stay

title: Enjoyed our stay
review: Where do I start! Overall we had a great stay at your property. Okay let's getting started. The Front Desk staff was great. Emely was the agent that checked us into the hotel, she was awesome very helpful and friendly during the check in process great Welcome Smile and willing to help to make our stay more relax. Her first impression during the check in process was outstanding. Kevin or Paul at the Bar was awesome. The Hotel was very clean. Everyone that we encounter was awesome. Great Hotel to stay at. The mall is right across the street.

title: Average throughout
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Emely, Paul and Kevin for their efforts. Emely, Paul and Kevin will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice hotel. Friendly staff
review: Good choice for our first trip to Boston excellent location. Our room was on the 18th floor and had a good view. Beds very comfortable and room quiet. Coffee machine and a handy empty mini fridge in room. The star market was just around the corner for drinks etc. Check in staff helpful. Didn't eat at hotel however Thorntons is across the road and do a good breakfast excellent pancakes.

title: Hilton Backbay for Boston Marathon
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for your first visit to Boston, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  We are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location, nice hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good
review: Stayed 2 nights in a corner room at 19th floor with a view of the bay. Location was good with lots of restaurants around.  Check-in/check-out were quick and efficient, the receptionists were helpful and kind.  Parking was available but very expensive.  A small Starbucks was available at the lobby to have a fast breakfast with limited choice, rather than paying for the more expensive alternative in the hotel.   The room was very big,  quiet and clean,  the bed was very comfortable to have a perfect sleep.   Bathroom had an adequate size, but I did not like the idea of having shower curtains instead of a more modern style, which would be more clean and hygienic. The toilet was not the ideal one either, you had to flush it several times to make it work.

title: Excellent service and location
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We thank you for your feedback on ways to improve our hotel and our guests' experience. We will take them all into consideration. On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect stay
review: I'm a die hard Hiltonian and am biased towards the Hilton chain.  But even this one surpassed my expectations.  Great staff very attentive, I feel like they looked out for me and went the extra step to take care of things.  Location is an A.  Prices are affordable.  Ask the staff for recommendations on where to go. They are knowledgable and fun to talk to with good stories and humor.

title: Great location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great for your visit to Boston
review: I had booked the reservation on line a few weeks in advance. Then realized I had to add a night on the front end because of another meeting.  When I tried to edit the existing reservation it wanted to up the room rate, so I did a separate reservation for the extra night and would get them combined at the hotel at check in.    when I arrived the desk told me they could not combine the bookings because my first night was opening night for the Red Sox and rates were higher for that night.  I was there for meetings, not a ball game. I now have to explain in my expense report why one night is more expensive than the others.    I was surprised to see paper receipts under my door, and no express checkout.When I went down to check out there were about 20 people trying to check out. I…

title: nice but warm
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We would like to apologize for the issues which arose from your two reservations. For your next stay, please call in advance and our reservations center will be happy to help you revise your reservation to make it easier for you. Your comment concerning our check in/out process has been addressed to the Front Office Director and he will review the matter with his team to help find ways to improve this. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Not a good experience
review: Just completed a nine day vacation in Boston, staying at the Hilton Back Bay.    The cost is competitive with other similar properties in the area.    The staff at this hotel was excellent.   Good service with a pleasant approach to their customers.   We only used the on site dining area for breakfast, and it was very good.   The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.

title: Nice hotel and good location.
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for your vacation, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: a must when visiting Boston

title: Very good, but with some flaws
review: At the Back Bay Hilton we had a comfortable, quiet and clean room.  the staff was very friendly, competent, and helpful at all times.  It is in a great location for catching the "T", walking to the BSO or Fenway Park, dining, shopping and many other historic Boston sites.  We would stay there again.

title: Covnention Hotel, Alright for Tourists
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We are also pleased to hear you enjoyed our comfortable King Corner Rooms with the spectacular skyline view. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Very average Hilton
review: I stayed here on a recent business trip. The hotel is very clean, and the area attractions are very good, with the Prudential Center nearby offering lots of shopping and restaurant options. It's a relatively easy walk to most places from here, and even places like the aquarium can be walked to in less than an hour. The major problem I have with the hotel is that amenities that should be included when one is paying this much for a hotel room, such as continental breakfast or easy to use Wi-Fi, are not included. The next time I stay in Boston, I will likely look for a different option.

title: The Hilton of Awesome
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to write a review on your recent stay with us.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  We would like to apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is greatly appreciated. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay with another hotel in Boston and allow us a chance to Make it Right and exceed your expectations. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Hotel but not a Nice View
review: Very good location to underground, restaurants and shopping area. Very comfortable corner room with a limited view of the bay from 19th floor. Starbucks in the lobby is an alternative to breakfast at the hotel. 43$ overnight parking is expensive.

title: Very decent hotel
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location and pretty view.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Pleasure trip to Boston
review: The hotel is well located next to Berklee Music School, metro, Prudential Shopping Mall, and many restaurants. The hotels in Boston are vey expenses, Hilton is not an exception. Furthermore parking rates are sky high. We managed to benefit from free wifi  since there was a promotion. At the lobby there is Starbucks with not an extensive choice of dishes, nevertheless a good alternative to 25$ breakfast. We had corner room, it was ver comfortable, the room was clean, but despite corner room at 19th floor, there is not a good view of the bay. Overall, good hotel.

title: Very nice hotel in the heart of the Back Bay
review: Thank you for your considerate review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and found the location convenient. We thank you for your feedback as we are always trying to improve our guest's experience. We would like to apologize for the cost of our parking as it can get pricing in the city. At your next stay please ask our Front Desk about Parking Packages we offer to cut the cost down significantly. We hope we can welcome you back to the Hilton Boston Back Bay at your next visit to Boston to build on your trust and loyalty. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location, simple hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Executive lounge, older hotel but otherwise nice
review: I stayed here for 4 nights as I was attending a meeting in Boston.  I am a Hilton Honors member and check in was smooth. I arrived early and the reservations desk was very helpful to find me a nice room that was ready. Also, I was treated to free breakfast, compliments  of Hilton.  The room was nicely and simply furnished, clean, with good amount of drawers, a desk, and a comfortable upholstered chair.  The bathroom had modern fixtures; the shower had plenty of hot water and pressure.  BTW, the TV did not have any pay-TV or movies. This Hilton lobby is not very fancy and it has some sitting areas and free to use computers.  The breakfast, which is on the lobby floor, not the usual concierge level, is pretty basic.  In fact, the breakfast reminded me of the free breakfast at the…

title: (9/10) Paid internet somewhat ruins the experience... Back Bay, you were almost at 10!!!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We understand your dining experience  during breakfast did not exceed your expectations and would like to apologize for that. Our Director of Food & Beverage is reviewing your comments with the chef to ensure that our restaurant is always wowing the guests and there is plenty of variety. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location but some issues
review: The short--I was in town for a meeting at the convention center (CC) for 8 days.  I am a diamond member and chose this hotel since it is a Hilton and is close.  It is an older hotel, close to the CC, had an executive lounge, great gym, overcharge for parking, and they gave me a nice room.  I'd come back again.  As a diamond member, when I look at a Hilton (or Conrad, Doubletree, etc) I look for free meals in the executive lounge.  This place delivers big time.  They always have snacks and drinks there 24/7, plus afternoon hot snacks (buzzword is O'Dourves if you want to sound official).  I don't drink alcohol and for those who do, not sure about such options.  The other con is the lounge is on the 2nd floor--come on guys, put it near the top--the view is part of the fun.  The…

title: Little pricey but great location
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and was pleased with your room and the Diamond Lounge. On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We are also sorry that our Wi-Fi service was spotty. We have addressed this with the Director of Engineering and he will resolve that matter immediately. Also, we understand how frustrating a Fire Alarm evacuation can be and apologize you were disturbed.  All emergency procedures and systems were followed and in working order to ensure our guests safety.  We are pleased you were safe as well as every guest. Our team is committed to providing great service. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: A NIGHT AT THE SYMPHONY
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Nice small hotel near Prudential Center
review: Location is key if you are going to the symphony.     This Hilton gives you the ability to check-in on line the night before you arrive so that you can change your room location.   I did this and ended up with a nice room on the 11th floor.   We booked this room with points and we picked out the executive room with the beautiful view looking out over the Church and Symphony Hall.   It was quite spacious as well.   We went to the executive lounge to have a drink in the evening before dinner but they did not serve alcohol.   They had some snacks there but the seating was at a large shared table or a couple of smaller tables and it just didn't look very comfortable.   So we just went to the bar to get a drink.    The next morning we checked out the executive lounge again for…

title: NIce accomodations, quiet, clean
review: Thank you for sharing about your experience with the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and it exceeded your expectations. We are excited to hear you had the opportunity to use the new e-checkin and found a room that worked with your visit. Thank you for sharing your feedback on the Diamond Lounge. We are thrilled you had the opportunity to enjoy our breakfast in the morning but would like to apologize for failing to meet your expectation with not serving alcohol in the lounge. We appreciate your feedback and will value it as we strive to constantly improve our guest experiences. We thank you for choosing to stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay as there are a good number of hotels to stay at in Boston. We hope to welcome you back in the near future at your next visit to the Symphony Hall to build on your trust and loyalty. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Spring Break Trip
review: I love this hotel for the location and the size.  Not too small that you feel it is a motel and not too large that you are overwhelmed on where things are.  The hotel is situated just blocks away from the Prudential Center, which means there are both great shopping and dinner spots, whether you want something formal or informal.  The on-site restaurant also offers a nice selection, so if you are tired after a day of meetings, there is no need to leave the building.  My only concern is the price.  I stay on business and so it doesn't hit me as hard, but if traveling with a family, you probably want to find a site that offers good hotel deals.

title: A nice place to stay for a short weekend
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are thrilled you had the opportunity to dine at Hilton's Forty Dalton Restaurant and enjoyed your meal.  We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: EB2015

title: Could offer more with what you are charged
review: The staff were very good and professional, very efficient in dealing with all aspects of my stay.  The only concern I have is that when I checked out, at 3:00 AM for an early flight, I didn't have access to a final bill because the accounting system was updating.    Other than that, it was a very good hotel and excellent staff.

title: Good location, grubby offering
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  On another note, we apologize on the bad timing on our behalf with the accounting system. If you call the hotel directly, we will be happy to email or mail you a receipt if you have not yet received one (617)236-1100. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: need for improment
review: My sister and my two teenage kids stayed here during the Anime Convention this weekend.  We had booked one room two double beds months ago, got there and they said they did not have that room available but were going to give us two smaller rooms with panoramic windows, that was fine.  They charge you $15.00 a day for Wifi, I was needing to do a lot of school work while I was there and was not able too.  Got code once I was willing to sign up for Hilton rewards, then did not get wifi until next morning.  They could also offer continental breakfast, i am no cheapskate but with what you pay a night for these rooms throwing a banana and a bowl of rice krispies your way would make it a little better.  I did not hate this hotel and will stay again for Anime Convention because it is so…

title: Convenient and comfortable
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your review on the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased that you chose to stay with us during your weekend in Boston attending the Anime Convention. We first would like to apologize for your requested room not being available at check in; we hope you still enjoyed your two panoramic rooms. Secondly, we would like to thank you for signing up as a Hilton Honors Member during your stay. We thank you for your loyalty but we would like to apologize for the Wi-Fi not working on your first night. We are glad it was up and running the next day but we will direct this issue to our operation team to ensure it doesn't happen again. We thank you for all of your feedback, we continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We hope to welcome you back again next year to the convention! Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: CONVENIENT FOR CONVENTION SITE
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Lovely night in Boston
review: Just spent one night attending a convention at the hotel across the street, Sheraton Back Bay. It had been fully booked with conventioneers and others. The Hilton was familiar to me and very comfortable. I arrived early and was given a room on the 4th floor as that was available before the normal check-in time of 3:00pm. This worked out well and I was also able to make use of the free computers in the lobby...rather than pay the $14.95 per night to have Wi-Fi access in the room. When I returned later in the day, the snack bar was closed unfortunately. It re-opened in the morning for my $5.00+ Starbuck's latte. Free newspapers, the Boston Globe, USA Today and Wall Street Journal and I was set to start my work day.

title: Best Hilton in Boston
review: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and we were able to accommodate all of your needs throughout your business trip. We would like to apologize for the hours of our Starbucks cafe. We had shortened our hours during the winter season but will be expanding our hours as the warmer season approaches us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location
review: The hotel is good, but needs to be updated..........slightly lower standard than some other Hilton Hotels we have stayed in.  Staff very helpful and friendly.  Only stayed one night unfortunately.  Close to everything in downtown Boston.

title: excellent customer service
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again on your next visit to our beautiful city so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Thank to someone who helped me so much
review: Hilton has a nice option to check in a day before you arrive which allows you to see what room you are assigned to and you can change the location, much like the airline check-in.   In doing so I was able to have our room on the 11th floor instead of the 5th.    Much nicer view.    We had a corner room with a panoramic view of the back bay area, looking forward the Church and Symphony Hall.     Executive lounge was okay.   No liquor.   Some food.   But the chairs/tables were cramped and uncomfortable.   So we went to the bar to have a drink before going out to dinner.   While we waited for the drinks someone at the bar had ordered dinner......Well let's just say it went straight back to the kitchen.   It was some fish dinner and it was the worst smelling nasty fish I had ever…

title: Buffet
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to stay in our Panoramic Rooms. We are happy to hear you are satisfied with the new Hilton e-checkin.  Your comments concerning the dinner served in Forty Dalton and no liquor being served in the Executive Lounge has been brought to the attention of the Director of Food & Beverage. He will be reviewing this with our Executive Chef. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Thank you for  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: A great stay! Highly reccomened.
review: I just want to express my deepest thanks and gratitude to   Mr. Benjamin Walsh, Supervisor in the reception of Hilton Boston Back Bay, for helping me after 2 days flying from my homeland to attend a convention in Boston and found my reservation through booking.com 147994546 had been canceled for unknown reason, where he fixed a wounder full room for me, I had been in so many hotels in my life round the world but such professional handling was so special to me, so thank you Mr. Walsh and thank you hilton.

title: Your will not be disappointed on any level
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Benjamin Walsh for his efforts. Ben will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Why the 52nd Ranked Hotel in Boston?????
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Excellent location, rooms, service... Hidden phone charges in check-out
review: I don't know what people want out of a hotel...  -Hotel is pristine Cleaned to perfection. For those complaining about room size, have you ever stayed in Boston or NY? For those complaining about fees, again, that's to be expected for big city hotels. Gym is very solid, as is the pool.  Staff is excellent Had very little interaction, but they were on the ball.  Location Here is the real kicker.  This is walking distance to Fenway, Copley, Newbury, etc.  GREAT location.  Even if you plan on going to the other side of Boston (the Garden), it's only a $15 cab ride.  It's only a 10-15 minute drive, but you'll pay as much for parking as you will for the cab, so why not keep your car secure at the hotel?  All in all...great hotel and I can't wait to go back!

title: Great Stay, Expensive Parking
review: Thank you for taking the time to share such thoughtful and kind words about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. Thank you again for sharing your review. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great staff but a little off
review: I visited this Hilton a month ago, the hotel has a great location, near malls, public transport, restaurants, all by walking distance. The rooms are clean spacious and look brand new. Another good point is the breakfast, full service buffet for less than 30 USD. You may wonder why I put a 2 star grade... Well the whole experience was quite good (with the exception of the reception service, always too busy to show a smile and be attentive), however when I made the check out I discover that I got charges for phone calls of over 130 USD. This was because I dialed a number several times... yes DIALED. Believe it or not this Hilton charges you if you dial numbers!! almost 14 usd per call made, it doesn´t matter if the other person doesn´t answer... This is the first hotel in my whole…

title: pretty much what you expect!
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. We would like to apologize in regards to your comment concerning the charges on your bill due to phone calls. We have a listing in every room next to the phone detailing our charges.  We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Service, service, service
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Recommend
review: This hotel has a service culture, the fact that the doorman remembered me, although it was a year since my last vist, the reception staff are so attentive and eveyone checks to see that your stay is up to standard. The rooms are getting a little tired but they are clean and spacious.  For a convention the Hotel is perfectly situated close to the Hynes Convention center and the shops. Good breakfast although the buffet is a little over priced, better to eat a la carte. Will still be my go to hotel in Boston

title: Very Pleased
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, especially our doormen, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Business trip
review: I would highly recommend this hotel.  Staff was very helpful.  Great location-you can walk to the mall, convention center, and lots of restaurants.    My room was very clean and nice.  It was also nice to have a mini fridge in the room.  Thank you for a great stay!

title: Great proximity to conference center
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Multi-level Disappointment
review: I was pleasantly surprised to find out that the hotel was directly across the street from the convention center.  It is within walking distance of many restaurants and a large shopping center.  Trader Joe's is also close.  The hotel was clean and modern.  It has a nice exercise room and pool.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Convension ceter close
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and are thrilled to see it exceeded your expectations. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: My home away from home in Boston
review: Stayed here in Feb 2015 for business. I don't ask for much; primarily safety and comfort. My room was on the sunny side of the building. I was working out of my room. Noticed it was getting hot and the climate control was not working. It was 81 degrees in the room. I took a pic of the thermostat. Called down to front desk and advised of the situation, and was told that the climate control is shut down in the winter time. I said, "You're kidding." I showed them the picture of my 81 degree room and asked them for a solve. I was advised that I should open the window and they could get me a fan. It was 20 degrees outside. So, the answer was for me to open and close the window to manage the temperature in the room. I asked them if this property was a youth hostel, and if I should…

title: College Trip
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the heat control in your room. It is most unfortunate that this issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. He has met with his team of engineers to work on resolving this maintenance issue with our heating system. Please reconsider your decision to stay at another hotel in Boston on your next stay so that we could have the opportunity to exceed your expectations and make it right for you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Disappointing for Hilton
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: A place to stay
review: My husband is a Hilton Honors member and loves the brand, I myself am partial to the Hampton Inn and must admit I have never had a bad experience at one. We went with this Hilton because is was centrally located and offered panoramic views of Boston at a reasonable price. Unfortunately everything about this Hilton was a disappointment. The staff is either under trained or incompetent, I got a "panoramic" view on the 4th floor? Looking over a dirt pit below, I thought no way, I'll ask for a change or room. I was accommodated after 35 minutes of waiting. The room was perfectly nice and had a nice view, but the ice machine was broken and there were no glasses in the room, and they wouldn't send us glasses (Mass state law, really?), and then come to get my bill and was charged and…

title: Good location for a Boston getaway
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose throughout your stay. Thank you for letting us know that the ice machine is broken, we will be sure to have the Director of Engineering fix that immediately. Thirdly, we would like to apologize for the cost of parking. Parking in the city can be expensive so we do offer Parking Packages to help cut the cost significantly.  We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Please call our hotel directly if you have not yet received a refund from the Front Office Manager, (617)236-1100. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great hotel for a Eskimo
review: Not the fancy of hotels that I've been in. Parking is much too over priced. There is no free wifi. Just a place to stay in a pretty good location. I guess why it's a lower rate than most but I guess that's what I'd be willing to pay for this hotel.

title: great trip to Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to write a review on your recent stay with us.  We are thrilled that your recent stay with us exceeded your expectations and would like to apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly. Your business and loyalty is appreciated, we hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Location is good.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Horrible customer service.
review: The location of this hotel is very good (near Prudential sta.). And the service is also good. There was Starbucks in the first floor. And you can get a taxi when you want. However, the cost is a little high.

title: Very good location but choose well your room
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. On another note, thank you for your comment regarding the price being too high. We are always trying to find ways to be within our guest's price range for being in a downtown Boston location. We have numerous packages that will help alleviate from the cost and we hope next time you stay with us you are able to partake in those packages. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect Stay
review: My husband and I booked a weekend visit to this hotel, and were very excited about our trip.  Needless to say, we left disappointed and upset with the Hilton brand, and we won't be staying at Hilton properties in the future.  We arrived at the hotel on Friday evening, and upon check-in, we asked the front desk clerk about the weather update for the weekend, given Boston's historically snowy February.  His snippy response?  "As if I haven't been asked that questions a million times today."  Wow, okay.  People staying at hotels are often from out of town, and after traveling, might like an update on the local weather.    We decided to brush off his rudeness, and went to our room, which was fine.  Pretty standard hotel room, the bed was comfortable, the linens were nice, but the…

title: Perfectly placed hotel, parking expensive
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comment concerning our lack of customer service has been addressed to the Front Desk Director, and he has reviewed the matter with his Front Desk team to ensure this issue from ever occurring again. I do understand your expectations for a quiet night’s sleep and want to sincerely apologize for the noise from other guests. We aim to provide you, as a loyal guest, with the best experience possible so we appreciate the feedback you have provided us. We are sorry to hear Hilton Customer Service has not gotten back to you with your refund request. Please call the hotel directly and we will try to help you with the process, (617)236-1100. We hope you and your husband will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty
