title: Nice location
review: The hotel functions well as you would expect from a major brand. What makes the difference is the quality of the service from the staff, which I found to be excellent. I would single out José and Gloria who serve breakfast with a smile and lightning fast efficiency.

title: Good Staff.  Very Accommodating
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our Diamond Lounge Attendants will be thrilled to read such an amazing review about their service.  Thank you very much for taking the time to post such great compliments about our team, in particular, Jose and Gloria for their dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed in the lounge. Thank you again for taking note of their hard work and constancy.  We enjoy your business and look forward to continue building on the trust and loyalty we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Top Notch
review: Visited with my husband for the weekend. We had requested an upgrade  to a superior room with panoramic view but it was not available at check-in. We had a panoramic view from the 18th floor which was nice. The room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. We did not have any issues with noise. My only compliant is the $14.95 charge for internet which seems excessive as other reviewers have mentioned.

title: Solid Hilton, great neighborhood, noisy elevator
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for the weekend, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your Panoramic Room but would like to apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: There is more to life than location!
review: Josh and Benjamin went out of their way to book me into a panoramic room on the 21st floor.  The view was absolutely amazing.  Benjamin followed up with a phone call minutes after I got to my room to ask what I thought of the view.  The personal touch sets this hotel apart from many others I've stayed at.  Will definitely be back.

title: Nice small floors; good executive lounge
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Josh and Benjamin for their efforts. Benjamin will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice hotel Great location Hotel breakfast A+++ and Service
review: This hotel is run down and not well serviced.  They offered only box lunches for room service and the hotel restaurant is way overpriced for a few limited choices.  There is a charge for WIFI and the TV reception goes out with the weather.  There are no pay stations, no movies, really no entertainment if you plan to stay in your room.  The "business center" is far from that.  Nice location for people staying for medical reasons....but not a luxury hotel by any stretch of the imagination.  Worst Hilton I have stayed in.

title: Clean, friendly, good location
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize lacking your desired TV channels and movie offerings during your stay here.  However, we are currently updating our channels for our guests’ viewing pleasure.  We would also like to apologize for our business center and room service meeting your standards. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Thin Walls
review: It is a Hilton, so you know it is relaible, not trendy,sizable and in a good location. Back Bay is a charming area. Pool is a little small, but not crowded. Close to transportation and many, many shops and restaurants.

title: Convention Center Access is a Plus
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience of our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton hotels are not what  they used to be
review: My experience with this hotel was awesome.  The staff was great and helpful.  Very easy check in and check out.  Room had a decent view and the location of the hotel was great.  My only down fall was the walls were so thin and the location of my room.   I can hear every time my neighbor flushed the toilet, use the phone or even just cough.  My room was located right near the elevators so I can hear that all night along with people getting ice from the ice machine.  But other then that it is a great hotel and I would definitely recommend it.

title: Not so hidden cost
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for all noises that arose during your stay. It is most unfortunate that the noises had disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. He will meet with his team of engineers to find a way to resolve this issue. Thank you for taking note of our staff's hard work and dedication.  We enjoy your business and look forward to continue building on the trust and loyalty we have with you. Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Early check in saved my day
review: Great hotel and close to Newbury Street and many great restaurants and shops. Our room was louder than the usual hotel in regards to noise from other rooms/guests. Staff was very friendly and accommodating.

title: Location and little more
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional stay. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: service
review: I flew in that morning from Israel and arrived at the hotel at 10am with a splitting headache. Was certain I'd have to pay a surcharge for an early checkin. The receptionist said there would be no charge and that it would just take just a few moments. Indeed 5 minutes later I was resting in the room -  thanks you Hilton Back Bay, you really made my day!

title: Great service and value
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  We are thrilled to hear your stay exceeded your expectations and we were able to save your day! Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice Boston Hotel in Central Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent stay
review: Great location with easy access to attractions, shopping, dining, and the T (green line). Breakfast in the Diamond lounge for Gold and Diamond members was very nice. Never got the chance to stop by in the evening, but the lounge had a very modern feel to it. One negative is that the hotel's climate control system could only be heat or A/C, which would have made it warm for sleeping. Fortunately the hotel sent up a fan without hesitation, which made the room more than comfortable for sleeping.

title: Poor hotel in great location
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. On another note, we would like to apologize for the heating control issues that arose during your stay. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. He has met with his team of engineers and all maintenance issues have been resolved. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: You get prime location but average service
review: Spent 2 night here and enjoyed the stay. The rooms are comfortable and spacious and well appointed.   Have dinner in the bar and found the service and food to be of a good standard without being over priced.   The pool, whirlpool and gym are all well equipped with plenty of space.   Not close to downtown, but lots around to try.   Will return.

title: Boston best service
review: We enjoyed reading your enthusiastic review about how much you enjoyed your experience at the Hilton Back Bay and our restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We are pleased to hear you loved our spacious, comfortable rooms and amenities throughout the hotel. We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great service, amenities and location

title: Exceeded our expectations!
review: I stayed here earlier this month while in Boston for business. I'm an HHonors member, so usually will stay at Hilton properties and this hotel had a great rate for a Monday night. I also like the location, convenient to walking to Commonwealth and Mass Ave, or getting to the T.   The staff was very helpful and friendly, my room was comfy, large and had a nice view of the city, and their common areas rounded out the great stay. For my fellow runners and exercisers - their fitness center is amazingly well-stocked with equipment, with plenty of room to work out with free weights, cable systems or on a treadmill, elliptical, bike or rowing machine. It's on the 7th floor and adjacent to their pool and jacuzzi...and there's a sauna too!

title: Love the Breakfast
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service. We are pleased to hear you had the opportunity to enjoy our well equipped fitness center and pool.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Better than expected!!!
review: We were in town for a show at the House of Blues.  We loved the location of this hotel since it was within walking distance to the venue (a little less than a mile), easy access to the T, and close everything we wanted.  It was easy to get an extra rollaway bed into the room (at no extra charge).  The staff was EXTREMELY accommodating and friendly.  The room was clean and comfortable.  We were able to check in around noon which was a nice surprise that we did not expect but were very appreciative that a room was ready for us.  We will certainly be back when we come back to Boston.  The staff deserves a raise.

title: A great little getaway
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We will be sure to commend the Front Desk Clerks for their efforts. They will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Very Convenient to Boylston/Newbury

title: They don't honor free parking
review: Booked a Superior King Corner room for a night out in Boston. Very big room on 24th floor (2405) with view of top of Boylston Street, Back Bay, Charles River and Kenmore Citgo sign/Fenway Park. Very pleasant staff who delivered a small collection of deserts to celebrate a special occasion! Very nice surprise. Price was among the lowest I could find for a Friday night in a name brand hotel and location was great. 200 feet to the top of Boylston Street with easy access to great restaurants, bars, etc.

title: Overwhelming Hospitality!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are glad you chose to stay with us to commemorate such an important and special occasion.  Our team members understand the importance of creating an unforgettable experience for guest staying with us and will be thrilled to hear that they were able to do so in celebration of this event.  We enjoyed reading this excellent review and hope that you will continue to celebrate special occasions with us so that our team members can carry on the tradition of a memorable celebration.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Nice hotel
review: I booked this hotel through Trip Advisor and free parking was advertised as a special promo. When I got to the hotel to check in, they said they don't do free parking unless you book the package through the hotel. When I showed them the advertisement for free parking on my reservation confirmation and on the Trip Advisor site, the manager said he would look into it. When I woke the next morning, they had slipped a note under the door saying it would be resolved on my card, and they actually charged my card for the parking. When I checked out and asked about this, the front desk said they would zero out the additional charge. This doesn't fix anything- they charged me again and zeroed that out. They said I would have to take it up with Trip Advisor since they don't do free…

title: Excellent customer service
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for all excommunication about parking packages.  We would be happy to talk more with you about your parking charges if you  call our hotel directly at 617-236-1100. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Not impressed
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Very nice staff and location
review: I was doing a 3 city break and booked the Hilton in every city as I was hoping the standard would have been the same throughout all Hilton Hotels.  How wrong was I, after arriving from Washington and the hotel being superb there I was most disappointed in the Hilton Boston.  From arriving as the side entrances we were greeted with buckets of water in the foyer catching drips, the foyer just looked rundown and tired.  We then went to check in the staff were very uninterested, check in took an age and then we were told that you had to pay for wifi, even although I am a Hiltons Honour member, the girl on the desk just said. Not very helpful or a nice welcome to Boston,

title: good hotel in backbay
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. A 3 city vacation sounds like such a fun idea! Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comment concerning your check-in experience has been addressed to the Front Office Director, and he has reviewed the matter with his team to avoid this issue from ever occurring again. Your business and loyalty is appreciated and important to us.  We hope that you will stay with us again to your next visit to Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hospitality and location
review: Overall the staff was very nice and extremely helpful! The pool and jacuzzi was also very nice and clean. There were a few things that were a little poor.  The bathroom shower curtain smelled like mildew, so I had to wash the tub with good smells to make the bathroom smell nicer. The door had someone's hair on it which was a Alittle gross but it there's than that the room was clean. If you are a light sleeper being something to help you sleep (loud elevator noises,etc) we asked about the fan setting in the room but they could do nothing about it since it is winter; or the fact that the heat couldn't be controlled well (our room was high 70s the whole visit) but overall was an OK visit and great location with good staff other than the room attendant knocking once the door an hour…

title: Good family stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We are sorry the bathroom wasn't to its cleanest potential, certainly guest comments such as yours are important to us. This has been reviewed by the Director of Housekeeping. He has met with his team of housekeepers and all maintenance issues have been resolved. Please reconsider your decision to stay at another hotel in Boston on your next stay so that we could have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: BREATHAKING VIEW!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Second Home in Boston
review: When we checked in, we were upgraded to a panoramic suite on the corner facing the Prudential Tower. WOW! 2 walls of window surrounded the room making you feel like you were sleeping in the clouds.  Parking was a little pricey and you had to be out by 10 am but other than that we didn't have any complaints. Everything was clean and neat. Once again, the view was spectacular. Will come back again.

title: Not bad but nothing to shout about either
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our breathtaking view and amenities in the room.  On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to welcoming you on your next stay with us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great place no wifi, what is Hilton thinking?
review: My son attended college in Boston. This hotel is convenient to his apt and convenient to much of what Boston has to offer. The Museum of Fine Arts is nearby as is Fenway Park. Many great restaurants are in walking distance and the T station is nearby for longer sojourns. The hotel rooms are large, comfortable and well appointed. The service is good in the restaurant, lobby and at the door. The city views from the upper floors are magnificent.

title: VERY close to Excellent!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay while visiting your son. We a happy to hear the convenience of our location afforded you as you explored our beautiful city.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to your son and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Business trip ruined
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Beautiful, comfortable place to stay
review: We were a group of five people attending a nearby conference. We had booked six rooms as we needed an extra for business meetings (bookings made through Hotels.com). Upon arrival, the first of us was informed that he did not have a reservation. Presentation of reservation details were discarded by the desk staff. When two others of our group arrived three hours later, one had the complete set papers for the whole group's reservation. Presentation of this 'evidence' induced some effort from the desk manager who dug up the reservation for the first arrived. He informed us, however, that one reservation was canceled and that one did not exist at all.  In the end, we therefore had to place one colleague at a nearby hotel (at a steeper price), and forget about our meetings room.…

title: Quick trip to Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms throughout your stay. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose concerning your room reservation. In the future, may I suggest calling the hotel directly in advance whenever booking through a third party. It is always safe to make sure we have your reservation and it has not been cancelled.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: I'm Mixed….
review: Visited during the week of Christmas, so it wasn't very busy, which was nice, but still fully staffed and everyone very friendly.  The lounge off the lobby was quite comfy and had free wifi. Afternoon/evening treats in the lobby were a nice touch, and included free beverages such as citrus-infused water and hot apple cider.  Very inviting.  Great area, within walking distance to nearly anything you want to see. Loved it -- will return.

title: A Christmas to forget
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing with an exceptional stay and memorable holiday week. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfect Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Simple and basic Hilton, good location
review: The Hilton brand delivers again. Great accomodations, but better yet, great staff. If possible, get a corner room for a great view. Perfect location - close to great shopping, close to the T for access to anywhere in Boston. And short walking distance to Boston's tourist sites.

title: Nice Comfortable hotel
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Our guest service agents will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton attempted to overcharge me by 70% and the condescending staff who almost made it happened
review: Stayed in this hotel with my wife during our winter vacation. The hotel is simple, the service is ok, no problems everything went well.  Location wise, for the offered price, is very good. Just a cross the street from Sheraton that connected to the convention center, prudential mall and the legendary Bolyston street.  If you go to the other side, there are starbucks and other simple restaurant for quick bites and easy breakfast.  will I go back, sure.....   cheers,

title: Staff has no idea ....
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  We are glad you chose to stay with us during your winter break, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you.   It would be our pleasure to welcome you back on your next visit to our beautiful city.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Constant Pounding Due to Construction
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Nothing fancy but good location.
review: There is construction (pile driving) right adjacent to the hotel, which means there is Non-Stop Pounding.  The noise was clearly audible -- to the level that it disturbs conversation -- in my room on the 20th floor.  It is constant throughout the day, but fortunately ends at 5:00pm.  There is no warning of the construction on the hotel's website.  The front desk says it will be going on for a long time.

title: Decent Location, Clean Rooms w/ a Great Value
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the construction across the street from our property. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Please let us know upon your next return, and we will do everything we can to ensure that you have a stay that you deserve.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to make it right and exceed your expectations.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location and decent room
review: It's not a fancy hotel. Very simple. Service was great. What bothered us was someone else's room service tray sitting on the floor from the time we checked in (3pm) to the following day! Pretty gross to see a tray of half eaten food on the floor for over a day. I've stayed here twice to catch Celtic games (great location to T) and right near Prudential Center shops and restaurants. But there's a much nicer Sheraton across the street.

title: OK but factual shortcomings
review: Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the convenience of our location afforded you. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We would like to apologize for not picking up the tray left on your floor.  This review has been brought to the attention of Food and Beverage Outlets Manager, and he has addressed the Room Service team.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again. Go Celtics!  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Pretty good for quick stay

title: good location, but a number of problems
review: We are from Boston suburbs and stayed in this hotel for one night as we were in the city. We had high floor with wall-to-wall windows. The view was pretty nice, although Boston cityscapes are not very exciting, and room we stayed in was facing away from downtown, onto Huntington Ave and Northeastern campus. I would not be surprised if it is one of the best in Boston because of the city structure. Other side of the hotel windows are facing Charles river and some Cambridge views, but those are just regular rooms (not wall-to-wall windows).  Service was good, as a Hilton gold member we had free wi-fi and free breakfast which was very nice, although the Diamond lounge definitely needs more space. The only semi-negative thing about the service is that room thermostat was off and when…

title: Pleasant stay
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We would like to apologize for the issue with the thermostat. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit into the beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.

title: Chaotic front desk
review: We spent New Year's Eve here to be close to a party we were attending. The first problem we encountered when we arrived at about 5:30 was a sign saying that the parking lot was full. (He explained that there was a NYE celebration going on and that there should be more spaces when we returned. He was right, but as a Diamond member I expect the hotel to better manage parking for guests.  not just for folks attending a party.) We chatted with a doorman and he suggested that there might be a few spaces on the roof. There were, but it was awfully chilly up here, and the elevator doesn't go above the 5th floor, so we had to walk two levels to get to the elevator. Our room on the 17th floor was spacious, and the  bath was good (great water pressure). When we returned form the party we…

title: From bad to worse
review: Steve, Happy New Year! Of All the hotels to chose to stay in Boston, we thank you for choosing to stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your spacious room and the water pressure in the bath. We would like to apologize for your early check in process. In the future, May we please request you contact the hotel directly to guarantee we have the room available that you have requested.  Secondly, We would like to apologize for all issues we were unable to fulfill during your stay with us.  I hope you will have the opportunity to stay with us again so we can make it right and build on your trust and loyalty.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Experience! Good location for me
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: HILTON HAS NOT AC/VENTILATION
review: This was a great trip!   My husband and I were celebrating several big occasions, and chose to return to Boston, where I went to school, so that I could show him around. We chose this Hilton based on location, being near the Prudential Mall and several T stops.   We rode the T the entire time, never took a cab or UBER, and managed just fine. It was a close walk to the Prudential Stop on the Green E, or the Hynes Stop on the Green B,C,D. It was also about a 5-10 minute walk to Back Bay on the Orange line.   The room was a decent size for an older hotel in a big city, and the hotel was massive. The staff was accomodating, and even went out of their way to help us celebrate some major milestones.   The restaurant on site was a decent size, and the food we had was GREAT! We had…

title: Wouldn't be first choice again
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Happy Holidays  Dominique Marty

title: Great Place
review: Hilton RUINED my Christmas by offering me a deluxe "city view" room in Back Bay, Boston but failed to tell me that those rooms have ZERO ventilation or ac.  I sweated my balls off all night and woke with a ferocious migraine.  Nothing like paying to sleep in a suffocating coffin.  Shady move Hilton.  How can you have an outdated hotel in this day and age?

title: Terrible first impression, but excellent last impression (9/10)
review: We are sorry we were unable to provide you with the quality of amenities and service you expect from Hilton. We apologize for your issues regarding our ventilation system. We currently use a two pipe system. We appreciate your time and input on our property layout and amenities and we will use your comments as we look for future refresh options. We hope you will return to stay with us the next time you are in the area so we may show you the quality and value you expect from our brand.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Drastic Decline in Quality
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Pleasantly surprised
review: Our previous stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay three years ago was exemplary in every regard, and my glowing previous five-star review reflected that experience. Unfortunately, our most recent stay was nowhere near as satisfactory. Any one of the problems we encountered would have been no big deal, but all of them added together would seem to indicate that this property is nowhere near as carefully managed and maintained as in the past. Here is just a partial list:  Housekeeping has become sloppy and inattentive. Toiletries and room supplies were not replenished when needed, and we found a towel had been left on the hallway floor.  High-speed wi-fi Internet service was lightning fast at off-peak hours, but slowed to a crawl during late afternoon hours, presumably with a lot of…

title: great experience
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.We appreciate your time and input on our property layout and amenities and we will use your comments as we look for future refresh options.  Secondly, we would like to apologize for all the issues that had arisen during your stay.  This review has been brought to the attention of all of our department heads. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Happy Holidays,  Dominique Marty

title: Thank you!
review: The hotel lobby is not very impressive, with minimal Christmas decoration, so we didn't know what to expect.  The check-in staff and door-man were very friendly and helpful, and we were upgraded to a room with panoramic view with king-size bed.  There was construction noise during the day, but we were on the 17th floor, so weren't bothered by it.  I agree with previous comments that plastic and paper cups in the rooms was surprising but made up for by the superior soaps,etc. provided.  The room was very clean and the housekeeping staff did a great job.  The towels were infused with a subtle almond scent which left one feeling clean and fresh after a shower.  The cost of Wi-Fi for a room is $13.00 if you're not a Hilton loyalty card member, but there is free Wi-Fi in the…

title: Christmas?
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members,will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel. I apologize that we did not follow through with a wake up call but I am pleased to hear that our staff were able to make it right for you. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Happy Holidays,  Dominique Marty

title: Convenient location
review: This is our third year at the Back Bay Hilton. We love coming here for the views, comfortability of the beds and linens and the fabulous location. We had another couple stay this year and they were equally impressed. The waitress Gloria, remembers us and is so happy to see us for breakfast upon each visit. See you next year, if not sooner.

title: Impressive staff and the perfect location
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, Gloria for her dedication to our guests and making sure you enjoyed your time in our Forty Dalton Restaurant. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it. I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston for the 4th continuous year.  Happy Holidays, Dominique Marty

title: Great Experience.
review: Nice general Hilton hotel in good location. Walkable to Newbury street and the subway. Nice comfortable rooms with good beds and great view. Gigantic flat screen TV.  No restaurant on the premises only Starbucks. Free internet in the lobby but not in the rooms.

title: Best Staff In Boston!
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. I would like to apologize for our staff not informing you about our Forty Dalton Restaurant which is located on our ground floor. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location and our Forty Dalton Restaurant.   Happy Holidays,  Dominique Marty

title: Very Cold attitude in the cold city
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good location, decent stay
review: Stayed here in the second week of Dec 2014, the staff had no clue at check in and gave me wrong keys to the wrong room. The rooms don't have proper Glasses and you have to manage with thin cheap quality plastic cups. when requested the lady operator said they only give champaign glasses if requested. No worries I bought two glasses from the local market but now the ice machine on 18 floor wasn't working.  the area outside is dull and boring, Sheraton bang opposite had some nice lights which I enjoyed from my room. There is a very good sea food restaurant next to the hotel which in fact made a big difference to the lousy hotel.

title: Room Stay Experience
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. It is unfortunate that your stay with us was not exemplary as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We hope that you will stay with us again and address any issues, concerns, or requests so that we can fully accommodate your needs and exceed your expectations. Your business and loyalty is important to us.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Relaxing restaurant experience
review: We stayed at the Back Bay Hilton for two nights.  The best part of the hotel is the location - well-located in the Back Bay and walkable to Copley and Newbury St.  The room was a bit cramped, more so with the crib which we requested.  Otherwise, our stay was comfortable enough, though we left with the impression that there was nothing particularly special about this hotel.  Oh, and don't shop in the snack bar near the front desk if you can avoid it - everything is outrageously expensive.

title: A very acceptable hotel
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  I do apologize for the room seeming cramped. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is something we strive to achieve. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Oasis of sirences
review: It is the first time I lived in a hilton brand hotel. It is comfortable and quite. I have a sound and nice sleep after a hot bath. The front desk and waiter are all very friendly and warm hearted. The last night bill saves a lot of time and I enjoy the stay.

title: Nice add in's for being Hilton Rewards member
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations! We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Happy Holidays,  Dominique Marty

title: Best Choice for a Branded Property in Boston
review: Apart from the near continuous silences of ambulances, fire department and police, the hotel is an oasis of silence. Excellent spacious room with view over the Charles River Bassin. Nearly drowned in the spacious kingsize tub covered with it very comfortable duvet. The internet connection is fast and did allow me to work at the odd hours. Personnel is very friendly and welcoming. Roomservice is efficient and quicker than announced, and the food was well presented and tasty. But then again it is called the "Hilton Burger". The Starbuck's lobby allows for coach potatoeing and meetings, while being saturated with espressos that approximate tasteful coffee. Breakfast buffet nurtures the one in need for a more balanced diet in the space of the overweight that seems to be the…

title: On my recent stay to see Cat Stevens with my daughter
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel and we enjoy hearing that you enjoyed our fitness gym so much! We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Pleasant staff, disappointing room

title: Lovely place with ease to go anywhere
review: I got in late and my room was a disappointment.  For whatever reason I was provided a handicap accessible room - I am hoping someone else didn't need the room.  The room had issues.  It was worn down, the tv wouldn't turn on - I had them replace the remote, the hvac was inconsistent, the outlet near my bed didn't charge my phone overnight, there was not a full size ironing board, and the shower setup, which is probably good for anyone that needs help in the shower, did not do anything to stop water from going all over the bathroom floor.  The other annoyance was the checkin staff did not follow my request for charging a certain credit card.  The positive with this hotel is the politeness of the staff, particularly in the morning, and a good executive lounge.  The other Hilton in…

title: Awesome Hotel!
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose concerning your room reservation. This review has been brought to the attention of our Revenue Analyst and will be review with the Hilton reservation center. I would like to hear what room you were in so that I can ensure that all the problems that arose can be fixed properly for our next guest. Please feel free to give me a call when you have a moment at 617-236-1100.  We would love for you to stay with us and would be happy to work with modifying your reservation to your needs.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay
review: Stayed in this hotel while visiting MIT and Harvard. The location is great, close to shops and public transport. The room is big and nice. The area is nice as well. Only cost $15 to go to the railway station to NYC. Recommend this hotel.

title: Great stay, great location...
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Excellent management
review: Right in the middle of the best neighbohood in Boston the Hilton provided us a short walk to shopping, dining and entertainment The hotel itself is so nice you do not have to leave it to enjoy yourself.  Good food and facilities and friendly helpful staff will help anyones stay be all you could ask for.  I wish we had more time.

title: Our favorite hotel with the best location in Boston.
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and we greatly appreciate your business and loyalty. We hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Back bay Hilton
review: We stayed at this hotel in June on the Hilton honors floor. Our room had great views. It's a good hotel in a great location. Rooms are very big and clean.  Unfortunately my infant daughter had an accident on the cot/crib. Staff were quick to come to assist. Thanks to all the housekeeping staff who had to clean up all of the blood. I did leave a note to say thank you.  This issue has been dealt with very professionally by the general manager Dominique Marty. He was genuinely concerned for my daughters well being and took all steps to look into this matter. This is exactly how all Hilton and hotel staff should be.  My faith has been returned to Hilton

title: Nice hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment our staff for their dedication to our guests! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you and your daughter back to Boston soon!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Back Bay Bountiful

title: Couple of nights in Boston
review: Several weeks ago my husband and I, on a business trip, had what we thought was the bad luck of having to stay at the Boston Back Bay Hilton again for the umpteenth time.  Imagine our surprise to be assigned to the 22nd floor, a Gold members floor, which I guess it was determined we were since we've stayed there off and on for the last 30 years and had signed up for the program.  Our room was the most magnificent room we've ever enjoyed, with a panoramic view of Boston, incredible king-size bed, flat-screen TV, large closet and spacious bathroom.  When we signed in, I simply asked for a view and, voila, wow, and super cool, we ended up with Cinderella's castle chambers!  So score A+ for the desk service - number one. Number two, in the lobby there are folks who will help you…

title: 2nd stay just as good as my 1st one!
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for your business trip, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Service
review: Scaffolding all over the front of the building, but we were warned about this before we travelled and the rooms were so large that we didn't mind.  Good sized bathrooms and bedrooms with excellent in-room facilities.  Slept well and really dinner here - we walked out of the hotel to the local bakery for breakfast which suited us better (2 minutes away). Lovely helpful staff, very welcoming and we would return.

title: Excellent location, pool
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Wonderful

title: Not impressed
review: All that you would expect from a Hilton and more.  As a gold Rewards member you get complimentary breakfast and 24 snacks plus free wifi.  Everyone gets treated well.  Coming off the elevator in the morning one is greeted by a smiling face with a try of sample coffee.  Two days we had delightful caramel lattes.  What a way to start the day! And finally a hotel with ample plugins!  What a treat! The drawback - its pricetag.

title: Better than the reviews but fairly expensive
review: I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. Your many wonderful compliments of the hotel are sincerely appreciated and I am thrilled that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality with our Staff in the lobby! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: What fantastic service!
review: Stayed here on business November 11-13. We were able to check in early which was great. Front desk staff were helpful and friendly. The room was clean and the bed comfortable; also, I totally want that chaise longue! Negatives: the view from the room (1106) was a huge piece of machinery on top of a parking garage. And the Citgo sign. The control for adjusting the room temperature was very hard to use; I had to call maintenance twice. And here's what was really super fun - getting wet in the shower and having the water cut off. I learned that due to construction across the street, the water line is occasionally damaged with no warning to the hotel staff. That should be addressed. Fortunately I didn't have shampoo in my hair yet but I had to get out, dry off and get dressed so as…

title: Not what I expected, for the price...
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose during your stay.  This review has been brought to all our department heads and it's being addressed in all departments.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Let's talk comfort
review: Booked a double, but was given a single king bed. They said they were overbooked on doubles due to a conference. But I booked a double in August for a stay in November. While they provided a roll-away it seems silly that I paid over $250 a night to sleep on a cot.

title: Boston Stay
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose concerning your room reservation. This review has been brought to the attention of our Revenue Analyst and will be review with the Hilton reservation center. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in the city so that we can make it right for you. We would love for you to stay with us and would be happy to work with modifying your reservation to your needs. Please call our hotel directly at 617-867-6100  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay Staff :-)
review: My wife wanted the pillows from the bed.  She said she had the best night sleep there.  The bed was pretty nice too.  Had a great room with a view of the bay.  Oval window was something different.  Walking distance to the mall and a bit of a walk to Fenway but not too bad.  Top notch in my book.

title: Round 2 - a little better
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. I am thrilled that our Pillows allowed your wife a perfect nights sleep and as a result made your stay an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Very disappointing for the value
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Short break
review: The first time I ever paid 70.000 HHonors points was at this hotel and I just felt totally ripped off!  Yes, without a doubt this is probably the best location in town (I used to live nearby until about a year ago and loved the area). But I just didn't feel I got anything special for the amount of points.   What upset me the most was that the staff couldn't care less about my Diamond status and 1) - my room wasn't available at 3:30 when I arrived and the staff wasn't helpful at all. And 2) - the room I got was on a low floor and had almost no view. This was the most disappointing treatment I've gotten at a Hilton property in a long time. Last time I was in Boston I stayed at the downtown Hilton and had a much better experience, although that property has faults of its own.  …

title: Room was perfect, everything else... not so much.
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. Your comment concerning your Check In time and Room  has been addressed to the Director of  Front Office, and he has reviewed the matter with his department team to avoid this issue from ever occurring again. We hope you will reconsider your decision to stay at a different property on your next visit to Boston because our team is dedicated to make it right for our guests and would love to have the opportunity to do so.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: So close to perfect but with one BIG flaw
review: Stayed for 3 nts recently. Hotel is of high quality in good location. Staff were friendly and helpful we had an upgrade free with a view of City. It was very busy but never congested. Room temperature was always perfect

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay Stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for three days, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Come on Hilton you can do better
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good location in back bay, but not as nice as other Hilton's
review: We got to the hotel about 4 pm. or a little after keep this time in mind as we go. After getting out of the self serve parking garage (no Valet) to the front desk. I guess not thinking did not go to the Honors window but realized that it didn't matter. The girl didn't say a word while I stood there and she looked up and say "hi" I replied the same. She looked new and kept trying to figure out where my reservation was. I explained I was with a conference and try that. She got a little pissed that I was getting agitated I guess for standing there like I was trying to get a room with no reservations. She then called over the supervisor which knew what he was doing then said thanks for being a gold member so forth and so on. She had not said a word I guess she didn't know because…

title: Bang for your buck
review: Thank you for taking the time to wright a review following your stay. I apologize that we were unable to meet your needs during your stay. Since we are continually working to improve our on property experience, I would like to hear more regarding your stay so I can ensure all challenges are addressed with the appropriate department. Please contact me by email or phone at your earliest convenience should you be willing to discuss these with me.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Centrally located
review: Overall a decent stay.  It's located right off boylston, which means its close to Hynes convention Ctr and shopping on Newbury st or prudential Ctr.    Rooms are decent.   The building looks a bit worn out.   And service not as good as I'm used to.

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay, Good Location
review: We are thrilled to hear that the convenience of our location afforded you.  Since we are continually working to improve our on property experience, I would like to hear more regarding your stay so I can ensure all challenges are addressed with the appropriate department. Please contact me by email or phone at your earliest convenience should you be willing to discuss these with me.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Good and close to city
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great hotel, location, service
review: Stayed one night at Hilton Back Bay, quite basic hotel but location is great. Comfortable bed, clean room with great coffee machine in the room. Within 10-15mins walking distance to city centre and Boston Public Garden. Not too bad for single business traveller.

title: Perfect
review: I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Awesome Staff
review: My wife and I had never been to Boston so we wanted to find a good location within walking distance of restaurants, shopping, and other activities.  We love this place.  Great location, hotel and room, but what stood out was the staff.  They were genuine, competent and seemed to enjoy what they do. The staff from the valet to the maids were nice, caring people.  I had a minor problem getting the room safe to work and the guy who came up to fix it was awesome.  Very human.  Not robotic service if that makes sense.  This is a reflection of good employee selection and training by management.  Which gives me more confidence in recommending this hotel to my friends and family.

title: Great location
review: Thank you for taking a moment to complete a survey following your stay with us. I am very happy to see you were able to experience true Hilton Hospitality however, should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston in the near future!  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Okay, but not my favorite stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Just Right
review: I stayed here for four nights and although I requested a King Bed as a single business traveler, I was given a handicap room with two double beds that was an oddly shaped corner room. I should have spoken up and asked to be moved, but I was exhausted after a long day of cross-country travel and just settled in the first night - the room was cramped, the shower was terrible (not at all workable for someone 6'1" as the shower head was merely 4 feet off the top of the tub), the A/C didn't have a setting to run all night on a constant setting (I need white noise to sleep well), the curtains not really black out. Essentially I didn't sleep well and couldn't groom well, which are my two primary needs when traveling. On the upside the staff was nice whenever I encountered them, the…

title: Great Location in Boston Back Bay Area
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service but I would apologize for the issues that arose concerning your room reservation. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in the city so that we can make it right for you. We would love for you to stay with us and would be happy to work with modifying your reservation to your needs. Please call our hotel directly at 617-867-6154.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Shop around, there are better options
review: The staff are exceptionally professional, very impressed.  Didn't experience anything like some of the other reviewers.  The gym and pool made my day after a long flight.  Great location. I'd go back just because all these reasons. One more, it's very close to Cambridge.

title: Hilton Back Bay
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and I'm thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our fabulous Fitness Gym!   We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Nice Hotel Near Prudential - Pay to be a Hilton Honors Member
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Vern the Doorman - Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: I recently stayed here for three nights over Columbus Day weekend with my ten-year-old son.  The hotel is in a nice, safe area very convenient to Prudential and Copley for shopping and dining.  We were there to see The Lion King at the Boston Opera House and just explore the city.  We were upgraded to a corner room so it was very roomy but I suspect the others are a bit smaller.  The room had a mini fridge and plenty of storage for our things.  The beds were very comfortable and I was pleasantly surprised at how quiet it was.  We never heard a person or car the entire time we were there.  As Hilton Honors members we were able to go the club lounge for snacks and drinks (M&Ms, pretzels and a snack mix during the day with small sodas, juice and water plus fresh fruit).  Breakfast…

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to review on TripAdvisor following your stay with us. I am very happy to see our staff took such great care of you. You and son taking advantage of our amenities is great to hear too! I am sorry to hear that we didn't inform you of all the options of food choices by the Opera House. Should you have any questions or concerns regarding your stay, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Amazing stay, gorgeous room, awesome staff !
review: As they say, you only have one chance to make a first impression.  I been traveling for over 35 years and I have never met anyone more helpful and attentive than Vern the Doorman.  What an ambassador and a face for Hilton!   Vern's demeanor set the bar high for each of his colleagues to follow, and the great service followed suite with everyone at the Hotel. A very pleasant surprise!  We will be back. God Bless Vern

title: Great location but needs some updates
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Vernon for his efforts. Vern will be happy to hear that he/she lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Very good hotel near Prudential Center and Copley Place
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Appearances are nice but just not up to par
review: We enjoyed three nights at the Hilton Back Bay.  We had an upper floor room that was spacious and well-appointed--appeared to have been updated recently.  I stayed here a couple of years ago and thought it was a little dated, and I was pleasantly surprised this time.  Breakfast buffet is good, although a little over-priced--if you are planning to eat breakfast here, see if a package is available when you book.  Good beds, relatively quiet for a city hotel.

title: A bit average for this grade of hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are happy that you found our recent renovations to your liking.  On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of Breakfast.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Breakfast Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great Birthday Stay - Amazing Bar Service at Forty Dalton
review: We stayed 2 nights and were disappointed.  The hotel has been redone recently (I have stayed here before) but it just seemed to be lacking a lot.  The bathroom is poorly designed, it didn't have any towel bars and the shower only had a small tray that was missing a slat so shampoo and soap fell through.  The customer service and housekeeping were average at best.  When we were in line to check in someone blatantly stepped in front of us and the staff just waited on him and made no acknowledgment of us.  There was no backup toilet paper in the bathroom and the shower didn't get cleaned.  There was no notepad or desk.  Other small things just left us feeling the hotel was not up to par.

title: Nice Hotel, Poor Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stays with us via TripAdvisor. We appreciate your time and input on our property layout and amenities and we will use your comments as we look for future refresh options. We hope you will return to stay with us the next time you are in the area so we may show you the quality and value you expect from our brand.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Did not meet expectations
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: The only good thing about this hotel was the location
review: For over $300 a night I expected a better hotel experience.  Parking was an additional $43 per night, it would have been nice if the Manager Tommie had given me a break in the rate for parking, but he wouldn't budge.  It didn't help that one elevator wasn't working on Sunday morning when many guests were leaving with their luggage and had long waits at the elevator and when I made the mistake of leaving my phone charger in the room and called the hotel upon returning home to report this, the charger was no where to be found.  Disappointed, yes, I was very disappointed.

title: Comfy beds -kind staff
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We would like to apologize about our Elevator not working. Our Engineering Department has since fixed the issue and I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Regarding the Parking, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon. I would like to hear more about where you last placed your charger as well as what room you were in so we can get to the bottom of this matter. Please feel free to call me at your earliest convenience at 617-236-1100. We hope you decide to stay with us again so we can prove how great of a hotel the Hilton Boston Back Bay can be.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: As a Gold member I have enjoyed the opportunity for upgraded rooms.  The only thing I assume this room constituted as an upgrade was for its size.  Though the furnishings are nice the decor is dated as far as what we have experienced at other Hilton properties.  We are just finishing up a 6 night stay at this hotel.  Towards the end of our stay I noticed the floor next to the bed was soaking wet and the bathroom floor was wet.  After reporting it to th hotel staff  a note was  left that  it was fixed.  My carpet the next morning was still soaking wet, and the bathroom floor still has a puddle.  I reported this to the housekeeping at 4pm and the only thing they did was  to try to fix a leak which never got fixed.  It wasn't until 9pm that they sent a maintenance person upstairs…

title: Poor service, unpleasant staff & messed around
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the leak that arose during your stay. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. He has met with his team of engineers and all maintenance issues have been resolved. Please reconsider your decision to stay at another hotel in Boston on your next stay so that we could have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great Location, great staff...

title: Great Location
review: If your child attends Northeastern University or Boston University, this is the place to stay if you're visiting them.  Convenient, clean and superior service.  This hotel is located near great restaurants, in a nice area, close to the T and walking distance to Fenway Park... Love this place

title: Perfect!!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you choose to stay with us during the times when you visit your child at Northeastern, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Stunning  pool and work out area sets this hotel apart
review: This was my first time in Boston and I spent 5 nights at this hotel. The hotel is very centrally located and within easy walking distance of most things worth seeing. I can't fault the service or the staff as everyone was very pleasant and very helpful. I must admit my first impression on entering my room was the place looked tired and a little dated. However, this didn't detract from my stay as the room was clean and tidy and provided everything I needed. I'd happily recommend this hotel to friends and family and would certainly return here if visiting Boston again. We were located on the 26th floor which had great views over the city once the mist had lifted..!

title: used to be great .. not so much now
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty
