title: Great room good facilities and helpful staff
review: This is a typical corporate hotel that lacks any distinctive character. I've been in Hiltons before where there was something unique about it, but not this one. It has little atmosphere and seems rather sterile.  The elevators are slow although the rooms are in good shape and spacious enough for a city Center hotel.   The fitness centre here was pretty good, although it lacked good air conditioning. The staff were excellent and made up for any deficiencies elsewhere. Great location.

title: If conference
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service. I am also thrilled that you were able to use our Fitness Center. I would like to apologize for our elevators not being up to your standards. Due to the size of our hotel and the number of floors in can take a while for our 3 elevators to make it down to lobby during the busy periods. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Awesome location!
review: High floor with a lovely view, well located for boyleston and Newbury streets, perfect for all the sights and attractions in Boston. We loved this hotel, especially after switching here from a terrible hotel at short notice, the staff were super and really accommodating.

title: Great Customer Service
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel after a bad experience at another hotel in the area.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Spectacular view, very clean, comfy beds!!!
review: I have traveled to Boston on several occasions for work/pleasure.  This hotel is the best for activity if you are visiting Fenway, TD Garden.  Staff is friendly and very helpful.  Many excellent food choices within walking distance.

title: Excellent location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members,will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Ideal location and friendly staff
review: My bf and I booked through Priceline.com and got a great deal $, but never expected it to be so nice!! We had a panoramic view from our room, very friendly front desk attendants, water and coffee in the room, mini-fridge, Hilton's best hotel beds!, great location close to subway and short walk to many restaurants. I would absolutely stay here again.

title: Great room, not such a great bed
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one  that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend our entire staff for their efforts. Our entire staff take pride in in living our Hilton Values and culture for each and every guest!  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Good Location for Touring

title: Great housekeeping manager and staff
review: If you are looking for a good location within walking distance to lots of Boston's historic locations, Hilton Boston Back Bay is a very good option. The major downsides: $43 per night for parking (no valet); no free coffee as with other Hilton brands; rooms need updating. Upsides: great location to Fenway Park, Boylston Street, shopping, and restaurants; trolley stop right across the street at Prudential Center. Overall, a good choice if you are touring Boston.

title: Pleasant stay - but in need of refurbishment
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  I am thrilled that you found our location to your liking! On another note, we would like to apologize about the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly.  I  also see that you mentioned the fact that we don't have complimentary coffee. Although we have a Starbucks in our hotel lobby that does cost we also have complimentary coffee in all of our rooms and our Housekeeping department replenishes it daily. We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Generally good accomodation
review: On a recent stay at the Boston Back Bay  Hilton, I forgot some valuable jewelry and some other items in my room. My initial worries were unfounded as their housekeeper manager, David Reyes not only immediately retrieved the items, but secured them until I could pick them up one month later. My thanks to Mr. Reyes for going the extra mile and to all his staff for their efficiency and professionalism.

title: great location
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend David and our Housekeeping Department for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend David and his team for their efforts. David will be happy to hear that he lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: As expected
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Really dissapointing
review: Friendly staff, reasonable size room, the bathroom was very small in comparison, but functional.  The bed was quite comfortable. Breakfast was ok.  It was busy when we stayed with most patrons appearing happy.

title: good location, ok standard
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback like you expressing the size of our bathroom and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  We constantly live by our Hilton Values and strive to create memorable experiences for all our guests and we hope that you will stay will us again so that we can give you a five star stay!   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Underwhelmed
review: I just stayed at this hotel last week. I was there for work and couldn't change my dates. We all know that Boston is very expensive, so probably I should not complain if I paid 330 € per night ! (checking right before my stay it went up to 520 €) But at least you should expect a good hotel room also as per the Hilton standards. Well, the hotel needs a good renovation, the common spaces are run down and the same is with the rooms furniture  that need to be replaced, all looks old style. They also need to improve the cleanness in the room and the bathroom was really small. At last,  the fitness center: half of the treadmills did not work and were dirty as if they had been used for ages.. I am a Hilton member and in addition to the room charge I need to extra pay for the internet…

title: Friendly staffs and good location but little bit boring...
review: Thank you for taking the time review our Hilton Boston Back following your stay with us. It is through such feedback that we are able to continually improve our property to meet and exceed the needs of our guests. I understand that you were not satisfied with the cleanliness of your bathroom and Fitness gym. I sincerely apologize for this and assure you that this area is of great importance to us as we ensure the comfort and satisfaction for our guests. Our Engineering Department took a look at our Treadmills and they are all now working properly. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and hope that you will decide to give us another shot the next time you visit Boston.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Average hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: The hotel was decent- nothing above average to offer here. The cable signal kept cutting out every few hours for about 20 minutes per issue.  The doorman Vernon was extremely personable and I hope the management appreciates him. He engaged us in conversation every time we ran in to him. Very helpful.

title: Great Stay In Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our Vernon for providing you with excellent guest service.  We will be sure to commend Vernon for his efforts. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and would like to apologize for the cable disruption that arose during your stay. It is most unfortunate that those issues disrupted your stay, and your stay was not positively memorable. Guest comments such as yours are important to us and have been reviewed by the Director of Engineering. We would like to hear what room you were in to see if there is anyway that we can resolve the issue. Please feel free to contact us at 617-236-1100 and we hope that you will decide to give us another change for you next stay in Boston so that we could have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: NEVER again...
review: We stayed at the Hilton Back Bay hotel in August and had a wonderful stay.  The hotel was very friendly.  The staff were very helpful.  The rooms were a good size and spotless.  The bathroom was large and well equipped (lovely soap!) All the attractions were very much at hand and the trolley bus stop was just across the street.  We would highly recommend this hotel for convenience to all the tourist locations and beautiful parks.   Good restaurants were just a stroll away.  We felt very safe in this area at night too!

title: New England / Canada Road Trip
review: We enjoyed reading your enthusiastic review about how much you enjoyed your experience at the Hilton Back Bay.  Thank you so much for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service. We are happy you found our location accessible to all of Boston's attractions and felt safe throughout your journey. Thank you again for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Nice stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Enjoyed our stay
review: great location,very, very clean room. Walking distance to many tourist locations and some wonderful dining. The staff was super professional and accommodating to us.  Concierge was great in arranging dinne reservations and making suggestions for things to do. This place is just super!

title: Average hotel, great staff
review: I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. Your many wonderful compliments of the hotel are sincerely appreciated and I am thrilled that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality with our Staff! I consider myself very fortunate to work with a bunch of true professionals. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Great downtown hotel
review: We stayed two nights here as we went to Boston to see some of the sights. Linda asisisted us at checkin in a most friendly, and helpful way. Our room was clean and quiet, no street noise at all. The location is great as it is very close to Copley Square, the Public Library and within walking distance of Fenway Park.  Taxis hang out at the hotel across the street and there is not usually a Hilton person to hail one so you have to get their attention or walk across the street. The wifi in the room is at a charge unless you are a high ranking Hilton Honors member but is free in the lobby.

title: Great place to stay
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agent, Linda, will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as she continues to proudly uphold our Hilton Values. We are also happy the convenience of our location afforded you. We are thrilled you enjoyed a quiet night’s sleep over your two nights here. We welcome you back anytime you visit Boston.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Bed and bedding leave you feeling like you slept and a cloud.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Served a purpose
review: Loved our stay at the Hilton. Can't go wrong with the location. The decor from the lobby to the rooms is beautiful. Hilton bedding has me hooked... One of the best night sleeps I've ever had. Came home and bought 2 pillows from their home collection so I could capture that same experience at home. Staff was warm and welcoming. Loved the coffee pot with coffee/tea in our room, and small fridge to keep our things. Price... What can I say, it's Boston.

title: Great staff- good location- average room
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are pleased to hear we were able to provide you with a warm welcome to make you feel at home. I'm glad you enjoyed our comfy pillows, they really are so soft. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Weekend stay
review: Stayed in Boston a few times at the Lenox and Sheraton and I'm afraid to say the Hilton is a long way behind, room and bed are fine but bathroom was pretty shabby. I told them the shower head was broken and to get a half decent spray I had to insert a biro pen into it, I did report it but when we left on our last day (5th) it was still not replaced. Had breakfast at the hotel, more for convenience and it was very poor and expensive, at the end of the day we didn't spend much time in the hotel so it didn't matter. Boston is a fantastic City but the hotel is more for people there on a business trip.

title: Great Location
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for your bathroom issues.  This review has been brought to the attention of our engineering department, and we would be thankful if you let us know what room you were in so we can fix the issue with the shower head. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Standard fare

title: Delightful staff
review: Not a bad place to stay although a little far away from mid town. The advantage was that a hop on hop off bus operated from outside the front door. The staff were helpful. Really good service on the hotel restaurant / bar with Matt being very engaging and helpful with advice. Overall an ok place to stay.

title: Close to touristic attractions
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. I am thrilled to hear that Matt took such great care of you and that our location afforded you. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great trip
review: The staff of Boston Back Bay Hilton is delightful. They're always going out of their way to make your stay pleasant in this unique footprint hotel. The pool, hot tub, and fitness center are excellent.

title: Bar Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and all of our staff will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  I am also thrilled that you were able to enjoy our excellent fitness gym and pool! We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good hotel, disappointing internet link
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Great base for Boston sight seeing
review: Good hotel. Efficient staff. Great location in downtown Boston. Lots to see and do close to the hotel. Only criticism is the internet access. If you are on a business trip, considering one has to pay for this access, it was frustrating and disappointing. Tried to resolve it with the tech guys, but eventually was told that hotels have bad internet and not much they can do. However, considering the price of the hotel, this is not good enough.

title: Great location, not great for small children
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to write a review on your recent stay with us. I would like to apologize for the connection to our Wi-Fi. We have excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton. We're also in the process of upgrading our connections in our rooms. Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we hope that you will decide to stay with us again!   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Perfect Hotel for Fenway Visit
review: My mother, age 84 and I, age 62, stayed here for several days in early July 2014.  Our favorite feature was that we could get on the Old Towne Trolley right outside the hotel door, with a ticket that allowed 2 days of riding.  We could get on and off the trolley any time we wanted to visit one of the many historic sites.  At the end of the day, the trolley delivered us right back to the hotel.  It was all very simple but great for sight seeing.  There was good dining and many interesting things to do within walking distance of the hotel, too.  The hotel was comfortable and pretty, the staff accommodating and gracious, the views out our windows were interesting.  The rooms are typical of big city hotels in that they are not large, but they are very nice.  Room service was good,…

title: clean and helpful
review: We are thrilled to hear that you and your mother enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your Trolley experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: I expected more...
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: A really good Hilton - modern and clean, good service
review: Great location, but not thrilled with the room. Very small room, but nice view. Bellman was amazing and recommended restaurant for lunch. Great choice, we went because room was not ready. I pre-ordered items for the room and nothing that I asked for was there. I was disappointed with this stay.

title: Great Location
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. We're thrilled that our Bellmen treated you well. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Average hotel, good location
review: We stayed two nights at this hotel. It was a very good experience and I would definitely stay here again.  A modern and clean hotel, within walking distance to the main shopping and restaurants in Boston. Close walking distance to Fenway Park for the Red Sox.  Our twin room was large and comfortable. The breakfast the next day was very good too.  A well equipped gym and swimming pool which I would recommend using.  No hesitation in staying here again.

title: Lovely hotel on a historic site
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We greatly appreciate such high praise for our Fitness Gym, and Pool.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Best hotel for a long stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: We had wonderful 10 days at Hilton Back Bay hotel. Our son was going to Northeastern University as a freshman so we wanted to be in a walking distance hotel to the NEU. Boston has a very functional "T", so you do not need to rent a car. Our stay was wonderful, because our room was at the 26th floor with a Charles river view. I also have to mention the delicious full buffet breakfasts. If you have the Hilton Honours privilages, wifi is fast and free. If not... I must also mention Ms.Mariah Miesel who helped us for our reservation. Benjamin was so helpful when we arrived to the reception from a 10 hours transatlantic flight. Concierge suggested us to take the double decker, two day Boston tour, which was also wonderful. Very nice hotel to stay...

title: Good stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for ten days, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members, especially Mariah and Ben will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and we will be thrilled to welcome you back again when you visit your son at Northeastern University!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great location to see it all!
review: This Hotel provides great service. The staff is extremely attentive and made us feel right at home. The room was beautiful with great views of the city. The beds were very comfortable. We would certainly stay here again.

title: Location and Staff are great!
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment our staff for their dedication to our guests! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston!   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: GOOD LOCATION, COULD DO BETTER
review: Was only in town for one night because I had Green Monster seats at Fenway. This hotel is perfectly situated in the thick of Copley/Newbury/Fenway/Kenmore area, which is why I chose it. Front desk very helpful and accommodating. I asked for a late checkout on a Saturday morning and without a flinch was given it. My room had stunning views of the Charles River and Kenmore Square and was very clean and quiet - two musts.    I was on foot though, Boston is not a driving city for many reasons. Amtrak to Back Bay Station and walking, though the T had I needed it was also fairly accessible.

title: Bar Staff Excellent
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed your one night stay while rooting for our Red Sox! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great place to stay
review: This could be an excellent hotel, but is let down by little things - a corner room was spacious but had no desk, a must for business travellers; housekeeping was inconsistent; and the restaurant/bar is dreadfully dull and cannot compete with the attractions nearby. That said, it's a great location and is clean and friendly (with a very good concierge service).

title: Hilton Back Back is EXCELLENT
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Panoramic view is a must
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great, central hotel
review: This is a great hotel in a great location.  Staff were friendly.  Our room was clean and we loved the automatic curtains and panoramic view of the city.  Will absolutely come back here in the future.  The T station is close by at the Prudential Center which gives great access to the city.  This is a safe place near Copley and there are a ton of restaurants and bars within walking distance.

title: Very good stay....
review: Thank you for leaving us such an approving review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff Panoramic views of Boston in our newly renovated rooms! We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Very Nice Stay
review: Nice staff at a great hilton property with convenient access to Back Bay, Newbury Street, the Prudential Center and the South End. Close to nightlife and some of Boston's best restaurants, I recommend this hotel. The only thing lacking is a good lobby bar.

title: Great location
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton.  As you said, making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. I do see that you mentioned something about us having a bar. We do have our Forty Dalton Restaurant and bar located on property. We hope that you will be able to enjoy that the next time you come to our Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Treated like family!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. title: Good Hotel
review: Since our son started selecting and then attending college in Boston (he started this fall), we have been traveling from upstate NY to Boston and this was our third stay in the Hilton Back Bay. The first time we picked this hotel because of its location and the fact that as Hilton gold members we often get extra amenities at Hilton properties. Also, we have been to many Hilton properties in Europe and have come to expect consistent first class service. We were not disappointed and we could not wait to come back for our second and third visits (we have stayed a total of 10 nights at this property since October of 2013). We have been royally and professionally treated by Antonina Radetska, a Journey Ambassador at the Hilton. During two of our visits we had requested a roll away…

title: Great Location. Decent Hotel.
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, Antonia, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that she was instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit for your son, and we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you again.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great location. Other than that...
review: We have had a good experience staying here and found the staff to be of professional standard and helpful. The room was clean with quality bed linen a fridge, coffee maker and enough space to move freely. Bathroom was good size and had plenty of toiletries etc nice. Position of hotel is easy for walking to attractions but there is a car park attached so was easy to use the car as well. Parking is expensive but all over Boston is the same. A Starbucks is located in the foyer for a quick fix.  The hotel is a little dated but I'm more concerned with clean! It was peaceful and quiet for sleeping. Its time WiFi was free in the room or at least more reasonable in charges.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location with friendly, personable service
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Very disappointed with my stay!
review: We stayed for 2 nights in the Hilton Back Bay at the end of a 2 week holiday travelling up from New York to Maine and then finishing in Boston. We chose the hotel on the basis of past Trip Advisors reviews and its location near my favourite Back Bay area’s (i.e. a short walking distance to Newbury Street with all its boutique shops and restaurants).  We had arrived slightly too early for check-in and our room was not ready, but the front desk staff were incredibly friendly and we were allowed to check-in and store our bags. I asked whether it was a ‘coffee wait’ or a ‘lunch wait’ and the guy at the front desk very honestly suggested some lunch and some places to go. The warm, personable service from the front desk staff was exceptional throughout our stay from our experience at…

title: Nothing wrong with this hotel
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our entire staff will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you during your two week vacation! We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: A Decent Stay!
review: I am absolutely not happy with my stay at the Hilton Back Bay.   I had booked 3 rooms, two prepaid for the 15-18 July for my guests and one post paid for 15-19 July for myself. I received an email about my bookings and had replied that we will only arrive on the 16th and had asked that the hotel checked us in since we will be arriving early on an overnight flight and needed the room when we arrive. Tommie, the Front Office Manager, acknowledged that they did receive my email but guess what?  When we check in on the 16th we were told that there were no rooms for us, and all rooms were sold out the night before. Huh? Sold the two rooms that were pre-paid? Why? It was an embarrassing moment as my guests had to wait while I deal with the reservations. Tommie did offer us…

title: Great Location
review: We appreciate the feedback you have provided the Hilton Boston Back Bay with your review. Please accept our deepest apologies for failing to exceed your expectations during your stay with us. We always strive to uphold the Hilton Values and culture and regrettably did not do so during your stay with us. I have spoken with our Front Office Managers and stated that they're in contact with you after you left. Please contact  BOSBH_FO@HILTON.COM or our hotel directly at 617-236-1100 to resolve further issues.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Couldn't ask for a better location - within walking distance of Fenway
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great location and service
review: We stayed here during a family trip to Boston.  It is within walking distance of Fenway Park.  Near Prudential Shops, several nice restaurants, and a few museums.  Several of the sightseeing tour trolleys stop right in front of the hotel.  And there are always taxis either at the hotel or at the Sheraton directly across the street.  We ordered room service during our last stay and it was one of the best meals we had in Boston.  The morning complementary Honors room downstairs was really nice.  Concierge was very efficient and polite.  We had one issue with our room with a very squeaky door.  We mentioned it on our way out one day and by the time we returned, it was repaired.  My kids enjoyed the pool on a lower/mid floor.  And my husband enjoyed getting his morning coffee and…

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are also thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time in the Diamond Lounge as well as our pool. Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your experience at our property. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: Perfect back bay location and service up to the best hiltons ive ever been to. The rooms and common areas are well kept but getting old. Parking is $50 for the night. The Wifi is terrible, slow and constantly gets disconnected

title: Great Location and Wonderful Staff
review: Thank you for taking the time to rate us with 4 stars at our Hilton Back Bay! Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are always taking comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. We would like to apologize for the service of our Wi-Fi and the cost of parking.  The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel to help cut the cost significantly. We would greatly appreciate it if the next time you stay with us you would provide us with some feedback so that next time you decide to stay with us you will give us 5 stars.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Wonderful honeymoon hotel
review: Great hotel for the location. Walking distance to Fenway Park, lots of great bars, restaurants, and shops. Under some construction currently so a bit noisy in the morning but doesn't start too early which is nice. Staff is extremely helpful and friendly!

title: Great location- Friendly staff- Terriffic amenities
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: External architecture a little bland and slightly disappointing foyer but nice rooms
review: What a wonderful hotel!  We were lucky to be upgraded for our honeymoon to a large room with a river view on the Hilton Honors floor.  The reception staff were extremely friendly and sent us up a cheese platter upon our arrival.  The location was also excellent just near to the Prudential Center making transport, shopping and our walk to Back Bay train station very convenient.  We would thoroughly recommend this hotel to any couple or family looking for a break in Boston.

title: Irish Couple Boston
review: Congratulations again from the Hilton Boston Back Bay team to you on celebrating your Honeymoon.  We are glad you chose to stay with us to commemorate such an important and special occasion.  Our team members understand the importance of creating an unforgettable experience for guest staying with us and will be thrilled to hear that they were able to do so in celebration of this event.  We enjoyed reading this excellent review and hope that you will continue to celebrate special occasions with us so that our team members can carry on the tradition of a memorable celebration.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great option when in Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Business Trip to Boston
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Back Bay hotel.  The check-in was fast and easy. We had a panoramic view room the the very top floor. The view from here did not disappoint, it was simply gorgeous. The room itself was large, very roomy for the two of us. We had a kingsize bed that was very comfortable, providing us with a great nights sleep. The large LCD TV had great reception and HD with plenty choices of channels. We had a in room coffee maker with really nice coffee. The added touch of take away cups for your coffee is a great idea. The shower was also great, with plenty of hot water at full pressure. The in room safe was large enough for a laptop. We found the room clean and modern, with a really comfortable ergonomic chair and an equally comfortable chase. My only…

title: Nice but needs upgraded (and wifi in rooms)
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us , as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon. Regarding WiFi, we have complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us  Best,  Dominique Marty

title: Great location
review: I arrived Aug 19-22 at the Hilton Back Bay Hotel. The whole experience was very easy. They went out of their way to make sure I felt at home. Paul and Thomas (bartenders) really exemplify what the Hilton hotel stands for. They go above and beyond knowing the customers and making sure you are treated well. They greet you by first name and make you feel like you already know each other. It makes for travelling that much easier when you have employees like this. Way to go Paul and Thomas.

title: Good, but payment issues
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend Paul and Thomas for their efforts. They both  will be happy to hear that they lived our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great location and central to all that is Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great hotel! Good staff, good rooms - could not ask for more
review: This is a great location hotel, period. Close to all that Boston has to offer and very close to all kinds of transportation, activities and food. As a Diamond ember there is a great executive lounge that serves full breakfast and all the goodies that go along with it. Would be nice if they had more selection of appetizer in the evening with drinks. Our room for a family of 4 was neat, roomy and relaxing. Good wifi and the staff is amazing. Very convenient to subway, PF Changs and Cheesecake Factory and about a 10 minute walk to Fenway for Red Sox games and 5 minutes from trendy shopping around the corner at the Prudential building and upscale avenues. Great trip and very much enjoyed.

title: Great stay!
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us with your family, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Friendly, courteous staff
review: Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights whilst site seeing. The staff are excellent, very friendly, and always willing to help with a smile. Rooms are very clean, spacious, and very comfortable beds. Location of hotel is very safe and good for shops/restaurants of Back Bay and Copley Square. If you are visiting downtown Boston/Aquarium/Harvard - then this hotel is a little further out, however don't be out off by this, the Subway is easy, cheap, and very quick to get you to these places.

title: great place, lovely staff
review: We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Not up to the quality of a Hilton

title: Location not worth the horrible service.  Don't waste time or money.
review: We stayed at this Hilton recently for a fun getaway to see a Red Sox game - ideal location for Fenway Park- $5.00 cab ride or 20 minute walk--- that's the positive. We arrived after a long 6 1/2 hr car ride looking forward to resting before dinner. I have some special needs for cleaning and had called the hotel two days before and again the morning we left (I leave nothing to chance). We arrived and after a fairly lengthy wait to check in went to our room and found nothing to be to our specifications. They showed us another room which was worse. I came down to speak with the manager which took 15 mins for her to finally speak with me. She assured us that everything would be fixed, saw copies of my phone call and told us it would be ready in 20-25 mins. Was nice enough to seat us…

title: UMass Amherst Reunion Trip
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. I sincerely apologize for all your issues at our property and appreciate your feedback. My number one priority is the health and safety of our Guests. Please contact our Front Office Director directly at 617-867-6095 so he can speak directly with you about this issue.  	 Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great Location
review: I am a longtime Hilton Honors member but clearly that means little to this hotel.  Having requested an early check in I arrived at 7 am having flown all night from Los Angeles only to find that the hotel had oversold by four rooms. (why a hotel books more rooms than it has is still beyond me)  The night clerk took my number and told me to wait in the lobby to be notified.  I fell asleep and awoke two hours later to find a new clerk who had no idea who I was or why I was there.   Apparently the other clerk had left and did not notify anyone I was waiting.  I again gave my number to this clerk and then waited another hour.  I began to notice guest after guest checking in and went back to the desk to ask if there was a room for me only to be told that my room was not ready.   I…

title: Nice hotel...location is key
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for your sheets not being replaced.  This review has been brought to the attention of the Director of Housekeeping, and he has addressed the Housekeeping team.  Third, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose concerning your check in and incorrect room rate. This review has been brought to the attention of our Revenue Analyst and will be review with the Hilton reservation center. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Would recommend it!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: So far, so bad
review: Stayed there in november 2012 and really liked it. We stayed in a triple room and it was spacious and clean. The service was good and the location also. The hotel is near to restaurants and stores so you can walk around - no need for taxies.

title: The good bad and the unattractive!
review: Thank you for the great review. I am glad you found our location to your liking. We hope to welcome you back to Boston soon, maybe even for November 2014!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty General Manager

title: Great Service
review: Waiting to check in. Room not yet  ready but to be fair, we are a bit early. Parked car, but had to take stairs 5 floors with three young kids because elevator out of service. Couldn't get food or drink because grill closed. Can't get a drink at Starbucks because even though menu has wine and beer, they don't sell it.

title: GREAT Experience in our Hometown!
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for your room not being ready at your time of arrival and our elevators not working. Although our check in time is at 3 P.M. we try to accommodate any early check in's as best as we can. I am interested in hearing more regarding your Starbucks experience, we serve beer and wine no matter what time of day. Feel free to contact me personally if you would like to share more regarding your stay. You can reach me at 617-236-1100.  We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Our stay was average. .
review: My family stayed at the Hilton Back Bay July 28-August 1st. I used trip advisor as a guide. We are Hilton Honor members. We booked two adjoining rooms 2606   & 2607 with beautiful views of the city. We had a fantastic stay! The rooms were good. Housekeeping was exceptional. Our housekeeping attendant was Xiomara. She was great! She was on it if we needed anything.   The only negative thing I have to say is about the hotel is the Starbucks which is  located in the hotel lobby. They just could not get our drinks right even on the second try.   We had such a fabulous stay that I wanted to make sure to thank the general manager of this Hilton Dominique Marty and also thank Tommie Brunson for keeping this hotel staff so motivated and friendly! You are doing a wonderful job. I have…

title: good hotel good location
review: First and foremost WOW! Thank you for taking the time to post such a detailed positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay as well as the city of Boston!  We are glad you chose to stay with us for such a long period of time, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston. Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon to our property!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Terrible for business travel
review: I would like to start off by saying that this review is overdue.  My family and I stayed there two years ago and we decided to stay there based on reviews.  The people at the front desk were rude and our experience there was not great. The rooms were average.  We have two small children and we felt as if we were a burden there due to arriving with 2 children under the age of 5 years old. My family and I took another trip last spring to Boston (my husband is a red Sox fan) and we decided to stay at The Colonnade instead, which was a beautiful hotel! I will be writing a review for that as well.good luck!

title: Great trip to Boston
review: We would first like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.   Since your stay two years ago you will be happy to know that we have renovated our Panoramic Rooms, Diamond Lounge, Parking Garage, Meeting Space, as lastly our pool and fitness area. We hope that you will reconsider your decision on staying with another hotel in Boston because we would love to have the opportunity to make it right for you. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and welcome you to stay with us again.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Wonderful place to stay in Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Tourist Hotel/Not as much a Business Hotel
review: We just came home after spending a week in Boston at the Boston Back Bay Hilton.  We were in room 2203 and had a good view of the city.  Our room was very spacious, very clean, and when there was an issue with the plumbing in the bathroom, it was resolved quickly. We had breakfast in the executive lounge each morning and had snacks and cokes each night when we returned from our tours.  The people who worked in the executive lounge were very nice and helped us when we asked a question.  The only thing I would change would be to change the breakfast as well as the snack items each night for variety. No problem with the room and the beds were so good....plenty of towels and shampoo for all of us to use. Loved the location of the hotel.  Nice to be right by so many upscale shops and…

title: Delightful
review: We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with us and that you enjoyed your vacation here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Hilton Back Bay
review: This hotel has easy accessibility to the T subway system, Prudential Center/Tower, and central to everything.  It was great for the recent vacation with family (diamond lounge on first level, ok pool on 7th floor.....however, no outdoor pool like the other nearby hotels).  It has some limitations for the business traveler (lounge off lobby and not on preferred floors, no business center outside of the common computers in the lobby).  Also the hotel elevators are extremely slow and are too few in number for such a tall hotel.  As a result, traveling between lobby/diamond lounge and your floor can take 5-10 minutes during high traffic times such as early AM and check-in/check-out timeframes.  The concierge was amazing as they sent up a special amenity to celebrate my nephew's…

title: Location was great, service was too!
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents and concierge staff will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as they continue to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  I do apologize for our elevators, as you stated, during busy times our 3 elevators are in full use and sometimes can take longer than our guests would like. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location for seeng Boston.
review: it's a great location for the red soxs game and exploring the city. Hotel was clean and staff were friendly. If your a Hilton honour member you get access to the lounge with free snacks :) rooms are large and the shower is good. The buffet breakfast is pretty big to

title: Location, location, location
review: I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. Your many wonderful compliments of the hotel are sincerely appreciated and I am thrilled that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality with our Staff! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.   Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Everyone smiles!
review: Stayed for four nights and had a two bed room shared by three people. Room clean and well looked after. All the staff we met were friendly and helpful. The beds were standard size which meant two people were a little snug but still comfortable. Don't expect massive beds though. Reception offered a roll out bed for an additional $25 but we chose not to take it. As others have said, no free wifi in the rooms but it was free in the lobby as was access to the web via a Mac or PC. If you logged on in the lobby I found my iPad would stay connected in my room for about 30 minutes until the system 'found' you and kicked you off. Had breakfast at Thorntons a few minutes walk from the hotel. Good food at reasonable prices served by staff who have a different view of what good service…

title: Fenway close
review: Thank you for writing a great review. As you said making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. I look forward to welcoming you to Boston soon! I would like to apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Nicely located
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Mixed Feelings....it was OK.
review: stayed here for a business trip that I combined with pleasure. Very expensive rooms, but what isn't in Boston? Close to Fenway and a T-line stop, walking distance to Newberry St and a lot of restaurants, this hotel is in the heart of what you want to do.  The room was okay. Just okay. very little area other than the bed.  A couple of nights the weather was questionable and we were tired and wanted to just stay in and watch some TV - The choice of channels was terrible - no HBO or any movie channel. And the local Red Sox game wasn't even available. The A/C sounded like a freight train when it started up and ran for a long time. And the comforter was so heavy with nothing else but a sheet, it had to be run. The shower pressure was the worse. Water was nice and hot, but it was like…

title: Well situated, well run hotel.
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. On a different note, we would like to apologize for lacking the cable channels you wanted during your stay here and for your shower issues. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. We are currently updating our channels for our guests’ viewing pleasure.  We hope that you will stay with us again and enjoy this amenity on your next visit.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Perfectly Located
review: Stayed here for a few days in July.  Found the staff to be friendly, welcoming and helpful.  Being visitors to the city, we found the lack of free wifi to be restricting, limiting access to information prior to our walking around the city.  To have pay for this kind of service is a rarity these days. The hotel premises is a little dated and our room, whilst clean and comfortable, could have done with an uplift.  We did experience a strange "hum" sound, I think the aircon.  Breakfast is a standard help yourself buffet, in comparison, we found breakfast at the hotel across the road to be a nicer experience with freshly cooked and presented food at comparable price.  The hotel is conveniently located for the shopping on Boylston and Newberry streets, but there is only so much…

title: Well-located hotel in Back Bay district - comfortable
review: We appreciate the time you took to rate your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. It is unfortunate that your stay with us was not exemplary as reflected in the rating. Our priority is to create positive, memorable, guest service experiences and strive to continue to do so through feedback provided by our guests. I would love to hear what room you were in so that we can determine what the sound was as well as fix the issue so that this doesn't happen again. We hope that you will stay with us again and address any issues, concerns, or requests so that we can fully accommodate your needs and exceed your expectations. Your business and loyalty is important to us. Lastly I would like to also apologize for the cost and service of our Wi-Fi.  For your next stay with us, please enjoy the excellent coverage of our complimentary Wi-Fi located throughout our lobby, Starbucks, and restaurant, Forty Dalton.  We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards programs, which offers amazing perks such complimentary Wi-Fi.  Your business and loyalty is appreciated, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Couldn't be much better
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: red sox fans
review: Five nights here we're great. The hotel facilities suited us well. While we arrived late and nearly got a pretty average room despite our booking requests, persistence paid and Pamela gave us a great room on 24th floor. Thomas in the bar also made our stay very enjoyable with his honest advice about food and drinks. The gym is great. Try the Summer Shack nearby for lovely seafood. Areas for improvement - work on the attitudes of some staff and give more attention to cleaning shower areas in the gym / pool. This was a very comfortable and relaxing place to stay.

title: excellent stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! I am sorry to hear that our entire staff didn't show you what we pride ourselves in which is great customer service. I hope you decide to stay with us again so that we can show you true hospitality. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Weird roar
review: absolutly fabulous for fenway park 5 minute walk in what appears as a safe area. lots of people coming and going to ball park. 5 star hotel within 5 minute walk. hotel was first class with great bar room and restaurant there. right next to shopping district also and many local restaurants also right next to my sons college Burklee School of Music.

title: Meets expectations
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great service makes the difference.

title: Excellent Location and Staff!
review: The hotel is very nice. Great location. The pool is nice and the gym is good. Great service made a big difference. Emely at the front desk made sure we got the rate we wanted. We left a pillow in the room and Tommie looked for it right away and made sure it was returned. Overall, the staff was friendly and attentive. We will return.

title: Won't Repeat
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members,Tommie and Emely, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you.  We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great place to stay in Boston!
review: This was our second (2nd) stay at The Hilton Back Bay, Boston. We had a King Deluxe Panoramic Room. It was extremely spacious, clean and meticulously appointed. The staff is great! Very responsive 24/7. Great Back Bay location. Within walking distance of many downtown attractions.  Highly recommend!

title: Excellent Service Good Location
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend our entire staff for their efforts. Our entire staff take pride in living our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again for your 3rd time at the Hilton Boston Back Bay!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great Customer Service
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Hilton Backbay hotel at Boston
review: The staff in the lobby was very friendly.  The front desk employees were very informative and helpful.  The rooms were nice and clean for the most part.  The hotel needs to check linens for stains and discard them.  I had to ask for new sheets twice.

title: 18th floor corner room
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our Front Office team will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  I do apologize for the stained sheets, I spoke directly to our Housekeeping Director and he is looking into the matter diligently. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Good not Great
review: Apart from an awful check-in experience - our room was not ready for nearly 1.5 hours  (for which the hotel management provided full complimentary breakfasts for all of our 3 days of stay), this hotel and facilities are first class. We recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent Service!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  Please accept my sincerest apologies for your room not being ready on time. It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you to stay with us again so we can make it right and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Great location
review: My husband and I stayed at the Hilton for a long weekend recently. We had excellent service from the start (from Pamela at the service desk). Our flight arrived early in the day, and we were able to have our luggage held until later in the day when are room was ready. We had a beautiful panoramic-view room up on the 20th floor overlooking the Prudential building and the Charles River. The room was spacious and modern, with an incredibly comfortable bed. Loved the tile in the bathroom shower. The location was perfect for sightseeing. Because it's so close to the convention center (across the street), we were able to take advantage of the $5 Logan Express bus to & from the airport. Also one block away is Boylston Street with all the restaurants & shops. We walked to Fenway for a…

title: Clean and comfortable
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us with your husband for the weekend, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Business Trip
review: For our purposes, the location was the strength.  We walk a lot, so for us, lots of things were available and we did not have a car.   The staff here are friendly and accommodating. The room was large with a great view. The refrigerator came in handy, as we were there for 5 nights.  We got very good value, but that was because we were part of a conference block of rooms.

title: Pretty good stay
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests especially when they are here for 5 nights is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location again.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Only stay there if purpose is business/convention
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Great location!!
review: Rooms are spacious, beds are very comfortable and view is great. Feels a bit old though. Especially, the bathroom seems to be a bit dated. Definitely needs refurbishing. Staff is friendly and helpful. Location is good for convention. Breakfast restaurant has good quality hot items. A very nice Food Court is also within walking distance (5-10 mins) in the nearby mall. And a Starbucks is located at the lobby level. What you get is, however, not worth the price you pay (350-400 USD per night). If this location is very important for business/convention then this would be a good option but for a private stay, I would consider something cheaper and newer and perhaps better located for exploring the city (near metro stop or near downtown Boston).

title: Good location - needs some upgrades
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.We will also be sure to inform our chef, along with his culinary team, know that the food you had was amazing. I am very sorry that you didn't find our location to your liking. We do hope you decide to give us another chance to to show you how wonderful our location is in the city of Boston. Our knowledgeable Concierge staff would be able to inform you of two different Subway stops as well as numerous Buses that are less than a 5 minute walk from our hotel, not to mention Fenway Park and Newbury St. within walking distance too. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon.   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Highly recommend, fabulous service!!!
review: My family stayed here while attending a sox game. from the moment we walked in the service was A++++. We had a room with a great view. the room was a decent size for a family of 4. the beds were comfortable.there are plenty of things to do within walking distance. Fenway is only a 15min walk. Will stay again.

title: Convention hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations and will be sure to commend my staff for their efforts.Our team prides themselves for showing our Hilton Values and culture.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Attended a Conference & Spent the Night
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle.
