title: Great service, great location and terrific spot to stay for a Red Sox game.
review: The conference I attended was at the Hilton and we received a reduced rate for attending.  The property was easy to get to off the Turnpike.  My room was a decent size, for the city, very clean and comfortable.  I called for a regular blanket, as I despise duvet covers, and housekeeping brought one up right away.  I can't think of a single thing that I didn't like about my stay.  The conference facility was just fine too, except the air conditioning was too cool for my liking.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  I would stay here again.

title: Great experience
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a positive review about your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are glad you chose to stay with us for your conference, as there are a great number of hotels to choose from in Boston.  Our team members will enjoy hearing about this detailed account of your wonderful experience with us and will be more than happy to welcome you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Simple
review: Check in was a breeze. Arrived at the hotel 3 hours before the check in time and was granted early check in. Hotel and room were clean. Parking at the hotel is a bit expensive but highly recommended instead of parking else where (hotel lot gives you easy access and ability to come & go as you please). Also on day of check out, the car can stay in the lot until 5pm which is great for walking around Boston. The walk to Fenway is about 20 min and only 5 min walk from Boylston st. I will definitely book my next trip to Boston at this hotel.

title: Great location and staff.
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Just Average
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay is an ideal location for any Boston stay and here's why....
review: The hotel was very busy the day we checked in. Arrived 11:00 AM to see about early check in. was told to come back in a couple of hours. At that time was told it would be 3:00 (normal check in) and then at that time was still not ready. They paid for drinks in the lobby bar but ,we never checked in until almost 5:00. I don't believe I received the room I reserved either. The room was nice enough but pretty small and we didn't have a great view. Besides the hiccup, the staff is pretty helpful and the location is really good for the restaurant area as well as Fenway and location for walking to Boston common etc. I loved Boston. Great city.

title: a few issues
review: Thank you for taking the time and effort to send us your feedback. We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience. Secondly, we would like to apologize for the issues that arose concerning your check in and room reservation. This review has been brought to the attention of our Revenue Analyst and Front Office Director to ensure that this doesn’t happen again. We are happy to hear that the staff did take care of you after your slight hiccup upon check in. We would love for you to stay with us again and I would be happy to work with modifying your reservation so that it is perfect for your needs the next time you stay with us. Please call our hotel directly at 617-867-6154.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great hotel with great location!
review: I walked into the hotel to check-in about 15 minutes before a Sox game.  Check-in was a breeze and was able drop my luggage off in my room within 2 minutes and was walking to Fenway from there.    The staff was very helpful in assisting me for most anything I was in need of such as ideas for places to dine, sight see or tour. One person that made my visit that much more special and was extremely helpful was, Journey Ambassador, Tayla.  Late one evening after normal business hours, I was trying to locate the nearest bike rental shop and having some difficulty.  Tayla was busy with her typical duties and saw that I needed help.  She proceeded to help me by prioritizing my needs for the search and was able quickly and efficiently locate several bike rental places for me.  Rather…

title: Extremely friendly
review: Dear Doug,  Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, especially Tayla , will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that she was instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel. As you said our location is amazing and gives all our guests a opportunity to explore Boston for all it has to offer!  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: One of the best Hiltons in the US
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Noise from the elevators
review: The Hilton Boston Back Bay has a much newer feeling than many Hilton properties which are showing their age.  The staff is excellent--Emely Almonte was able to find me a room even when the hotel was full and my reservation was somehow not in the system.  The rooms still have fridges and coffeemakers, both of which I care about a lot, and the fitness center is one of the best.  The hotel's location is superb whether you are in town for business or pleasure--close to the tow-path for running, close to Commonwealth for walking, to Newbury and the Prudential Center for shopping, and walkable to the Financial and business areas.  If you arrive by train it is walkable from the Back Bay station.  I did notice that the daily room cleaning service had been cut back--which I understand…

title: Outdated hotel in need of refurbishment
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, Emely for her dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed at check in. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it. I did speak to our  Director of Housekeeping regarding your concern with the rooms and he will look into what happened staff wise during your stay. Thank you again and I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon!   Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good base for Fenway visit
review: Nice breakfast, great swimming pool and friendly staff - but (possibly depending on what room you get) it sounds like living under a roller coaster, with the noise made by the elevator. That was most unpleasant.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a response on Tripadvisor. I appreciate your kind comments regarding our excellent breakfast, swimming pool and friendly staff. I do understand your expectations for a quiet night’s sleep and want to sincerely apologize for the elevator noise. We aim to provide you, as a loyal guest, with the best experience possible so we appreciate the feedback you have provided us. Please call our hotel directly at 617-867-6154 so that I can personally assign you to a room of your liking. We look forward to your continued business and loyalty on your next visit.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Great Stay!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Another great Hilton hotel
review: This is a nice, clean hotel. The beds were comfortable.  They had a very helpful staff. It is an excellent location. It was just a short walk to Fenway Park. There were plenty of places to eat and sights to see near by.  We would definitely stay here again!

title: Great location, not great for families.
review: It is such a pleasure to read such a positive review about your stay with us. Our directors look forward to complimenting their respective departments for upholding our Hilton Values and culture. We appreciate your praise and feedback, as well as your choice to stay at our hotel. We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: When I go back to Boston, I'm staying here!
review: I'm becoming a big fan of Hilton hotels. We stayed here for two nights. Great big room for a city centre hotel. Staff very friendly & helpful. Good food in their Forty Dalton restaurant. Great location for shops, restaurants & the trolley tour bus stops right across the street. Only downside is $43 a night to park & $14.95 a night for wifi, but Boston isn't cheap. Beautiful city though & overall a good choice of place to stay

title: Wow, Wow, Wow!
review: We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to compliment our team members. The next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask our guest service agents about the Parking Packages we offer at our hotel. We would also love to sign you up as a member of our Hilton HHonors rewards program, which offers amazing perks such as compliments Wi-Fi. We appreciate your business and loyalty and hope to welcome you back soon.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Nice surprises awaited us!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Great spot from which to explore Boston
review: I selected this hotel to be near a convention I was attending later in the week. Though I've been a Hilton Honors member for several years, I was pleasantly surprised to find a fruit and cheese plate, bottled water, and a mini-fridge in our room when we got in there. Our internet connection was fast and easy to access.  All of the staff was fabulous, and the room was spacious, well appointed, and very comfortable. We had a lot more room at the Hilton than we had at the convention hotel we moved to later on.   Whenever possible, I choose Hilton properties. This Hilton Back Bay experience confirmed that approach.

title: Courtesy before, during and after
review: We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. It is our priority that we uphold our Hilton Values and culture so we are excited to inform our team members that they did so during your stay. For that reason, thank you for taking note of our team members’ hard work and dedication as well as posting a 5 star review. We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to continue building on the trust we have with you.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Software beats hardware
review: OK - it's a Hilton - so it's focused on the business traveler on expense account and folks in higher income brackets.  This means it is not inexpensive and they nickel and dime you for wifi and breakfast unless you're a gold or diamond HHonors member.  Even the parking is expensive ($43 per night) although you may be able to get a package deal online.  That said, my wife and I really enjoyed  our two night stay.  Our room (#1805) was comfy, updated, and spacious, with a gorgeous view of the Back Bay, the Charles, and MIT across the way (and even a peekaboo view of Fenway).  Very comfortable king bed.  Air conditioning worked well and was reasonably quiet.  Staff was friendly.  Common areas were well appointed and well maintained.  The Diamond Club is a nice touch for HHonors…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Thank you for reviewing your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We always appreciate guest feedback and continuously take comments into consideration as we strive to improve our guest service experience.  It is important that we accommodate all your needs and would love for you and your wife to stay with us again so that we can exceed your expectations and your next review on us will be 5 stars.  Sincerely, Dominique Marty

title: Great place to stay in Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Boston Visit
review: Check in was easy & staff were very friendly. We stayed on the 25th floor in the panoramic room. Room was immaculate upon arrival.  Parking was easy here but expensive at $43..00 per day in parking garage. I have to say although expensive they allowed us to keep our car there for the day after check out so we could tour the city, no extra charge. The hotel is convenient to trolleys & cabs.  Overall experience was excellent would & plan to stay here again the next time we are in Boston. Great job Hilton!

title: An all star team....
review: We are thrilled to read that your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay fulfilled your expectations and warranted us a 5 star rating. Thank you for taking the time to share such compliments about our team and property. Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to your next stay with us.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Great central location
review: Loved the hotel and the staff.  They work endlessly to make sure you are comfortable and all completely satisfied.  Great doormen who are so knowledgeable and most friendly. Benjamin at front desk is the go to guy who will go out of his way to accommodate you. Wonderful disposition and lovely attitude.

title: Great location!
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members, Benjamin and all of our Doormen, will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great location for Fenway and more in Back Bay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Excellent service.
review: Great location for walking to Fenway, Boylston, Symphony and other attractions.  Reasonably priced.  Long lines at check in due to an intern checking people in by herself. The corner rooms have great views of Boston.  Parking at $43 that is not even valet is ridiculous. I don't even want to hear that it is on par with the rest of Boston, because everyone else has valet for that price. The breakfast area is nice, especially the lounge for diamond members.

title: Very crowded with an odd common area
review: Thank you very much for your positive feedback. We hope that you will stay with us again so that you could reevaluate our property and service. Please do not hesitate to call us directly at 617-867-6154 so we can accommodate all your needs on your next visit. We appreciate your business and loyalty and look forward to the next opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Best Regards, Dominique Marty

title: No complaints
review: Everyone has been so pleasant, but especially Vernon, who works outside the main entrance.  Each time we left the hotel and asked him for directions, he went out of his way to be helpful - giving tips on the best places to walk, and how to get there.  Housekeeping staff provided extra linens, fixed a slow bathtub, etc...with a smile.  Your staff members really seem to enjoy their jobs - even heard one woman singing on her way into work for the day.  We are diamond members, and especially enjoyed having access to the refreshments after a long, hot day.

title: Great location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Service!
review: Hilton Back Bay is my first pick whenever I travel to Boston. It is located close to T stations, ballpark, awesome restaurants and shopping. If you are into jogging, you can get to Charles river esplanade from Mass ave.

title: You can count on Hilton Hotels
review: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoy your stay time and again at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and the convenience our location afforded you.  Providing positive and memorable experiences for our guests is the reason for our success along with our excellent location. We are absolutely thrilled you took the time and effort to share your experience at our property with you. We hope you will stay with us on your next visit to our beautiful city and take full advantage of our prime location.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Best,  Dominique Marty

title: Great location but not worth the price.
review: Had a great experience!  Excellent service!  Benjamin and Linda were superb!  Excellent restaurant!  Close to Newbury St and Boylston St shopping! Close to poublice transportation and walking distance to the Public Garden and Boston Common!

title: Great Location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. Our team members,Linda and Ben will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Benjamin- At the front desk at the Back Bay Hilton
review: Great hotel for families and business travels alike with good location; across the street from the upscale shopping mall (connects to other hotels around so you don't have to walk outside at night). Hop on bus stopped right in front of the hotel. We stayed on the 12th floor. Room was very nice, clean, spacious, and absolutely quite. Loved our housekeepers, they kept our room spotless. Bartender was also very nice and courteous, food was good too. Gym facilities were up to date, very well air-conditioned, TVs on the machines worked well, which I appreciated because I was able to watch the world cup while working out. In overall, we had an excellent experience and would definitely return in the future.

title: Amazing location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. All of our Team Members from Housekeeping to the Bar staff will be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: A good location
review: I recently stayed at this Hotel and there was a mix up with the room reservation. I had an emailed confirmation of what type of room was reserved and showed it from my phone to Benjamin at the front desk.. He said "no problem" and took care of all my needs! He was fantastic!!!

title: A complete disappointment
review: Thank you for posting such a considerate review.  Our guest service agents, Ben, will greatly appreciate your wonderful feedback as he continues to proudly uphold our Hilton Values.  Your business and loyalty is important to us, and we look forward to the next time you stay with us.  Sincerely, Dominique Marty

title: Great location for Fenway Park
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: I slept quite well and the free breakfast was good, rooms a bit dated
review: Probably stayed here at least 5 times for Red Sox games and it is a quick walk to the park so you don't need to use the T.  Take a walk thru Fens Park on the way to the ball park - it's a community garden where people manage individual plots.  If you are a gold or beyond at Hilton, they recently remodeled (2013) the lounge for breakfast and it is much nicer than it used to be. The rooms are always clean and the parkling garage is attached to the hotel - coldnt be easier.  Around the corner from the hotel is Bukowski's, a bar with an intersting selection of beers - I think they still only take cash though so if you plan on going be prepared.

title: Great place, good location
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. We are always pleased to read guests’ comments about the convenience of our hotel’s location. Your satisfaction about the cleanliness of our rooms has been addressed to our Director of Housekeeping and his room attendants, which they were happy to hear. We hope that you will continue to stay with us and address any additional feedback so that we can provide a 5 star experience for you. Your business and loyalty is important to us and always appreciated.  Sincerely, Dominique Marty

title: I was looking forward to staying here until...
review: The night didn't start off great since my request for a quiet room put me next to the ice machine.  Even the next room was somewhat near the elevator - I don't think the staff pays attention to my consistent request for far away from the elevator and ice machines.  In any case, I did sleep great, which is most important.  Also, the free breakfast in the lounge was very good, although the chic layout is not well thought out or helpful.

title: Great Back Bay location, comfortable stay!
review: We would first like to thank you for choosing to stay with us and giving us valuable feedback. All of your comments have been addressed to the appropriate directors. Our Director of Front Office is discussing this review with his front office team in order to avoid issues with guest request.  We hope and would love for you to stay with us again to provide exceptional guest service and ultimately inspire you to reevaluate your stay with us to 5 stars.  Best, Dominique Marty

title: Great value
review: The hotel service was prompt, amenities were easy to access and use, the facility was clean and well maintained.  The location was convenient for leisure, but not for the conference center.  You are within walking distance of Fenway and many restaurants.

title: Nicer than the Nearby Sheraton
review: Thank you for taking the time to commend our team members for providing you with excellent guest service.  We are thrilled to hear that our location provided you with great leisure convenience, although the hotel was not as close to the conference center as you liked.  We greatly appreciate your business and loyalty, and hope to welcome you again.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Couples celebrating 36 years of marriage
review: Perfect location to Berklee College of Music, Fenway Park, and close to the T. Parking was easily available right on site. Staff were helpful & went out of their way to be friendly. Bellhop even got us a limo to take to Cirque de Solei.  The hotel is beautiful and absolutely spotless. It was quiet, especially considering it's location.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Nice Stay / Great Location
review: Thank you for sharing such kind words about your stay at our hotel. We are enjoyed reading about your stay and how much you took advantage of our location.  Our team members will also be informed of this review and will be pleased to hear that they were instrumental in providing an exceptional experience for you. We greatly appreciate such high praise as well as your choice to stay at our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit when we will have the opportunity to build on the trust and loyalty that we have with you.  Warm Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Good location

title: Excellent Location
review: Close to train and walking to Prudential Tower great base for seeing Boston.  Nice rooms not much of a view.  We had a corner room with a balcony that was covered would be nice in spring when not raining.

title: Was hoping to stay here but........
review: Thank your for your amazing comments about our location in Boston! The team and I look forward to serving you on your next trip to Boston. Have a wonderful rest of your week!  Warm Regards,  Dominique Marty

title: Great Room, Great Hotel, Great Location
review: Just returned from our first visit to Boston. This location was perfect. Walked to Fenway, Boston Public Library, restaurants. Not a fancy hotel, but our room was clean and the front desk and employees were extremely accommodating. Expensive to have a drink in the lounge though, and no continental breakfast, but having never stayed in Boston before that may be the norm.

title: Great Location to Back Bay
review: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and great service provided to you during your most recent stay with us. We always try to do everything we can to ensure that our guests receive enhanced amenities and services while we keep our prices low. We appreciate your comments and will use them in an effort to better our hotel for the future. We hope you'll come back and stay with us again the next time you're in town.  Sincerely,  Dominique Marty

title: Probably will stay somewhere else next time
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Great visit
review: This property is in a good location, but there are number of aspects that made my most recent experience less than expected.  The building is old and there are simply some things that can't be changed easily.  The bathroom is small and the elevators are really slow.  The surprisingly disappointing aspects are manageable.  The WIFI is expensive (if you don't have Hhonors status), and the service is spotty.  The hotel does not have WIFI in the fitness room.  The hotel's website indicates it offers HBO, but the TV channel selections are quite limited and they have HBO Family ... not the real thing.  Perhaps the most perplexing thing was our multiple attempts to reserve a private meeting room for a team breakfast meeting prior to our business conference.  The hotel failed to respond…

title: excellent staff
review: First of all, thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent experience with us. I'm sorry to hear that you did not enjoy a positive stay. We always try to do everything we can to ensure that our guests receive enhanced amenities and services while we keep our prices low. We're currently doing a revamp of our channel listings which will provide more options for our guests in the near future. I would like to also thank you for bringing your Sales issues to my attention. I have brought this review to our Director of Sale's attention. She would love the opportunity to make this right for you. Please contact me at your earliest convenience, and I will personally make this up to you. I hope that you decide to give the Hilton Boston Back Bay another try in your future travels.   Warm Regards.  Dominique Marty

title: Good Location, mediocre hotel
review: This hotel was clean, modern, and pleasant staff. Very comfortable beds.  Great location for sightseeing and shopping (easy access to subway Green line).  It's across the street from the Prudential Tower.  A bit pricey, but worth it.

title: Friendliest staff
review: We were thrilled to hear that you loved our location for so many reasons and location is so critical in Boston while visiting. Our team takes tremendous pride on our guest comments so I will be able to share it with our entire team! Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Boston Back and I we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: Very nice stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. title: Hilton in Boston
review: I recently stayed at the Hilton Boston Back Bay for a conference.  I attended the same conference last year at this hotel as well.  I am a loyal Hilton customer and this stay did not disappoint.  The staff were helpful and very accommodating (I requested and got a late check out, I needed some utensils for my food, lost my parking ticket, etc etc).  My room on the 19th floor had an excellent view and although it was close to the elevators, I did not hear any noise at all.  I can't comment on the restaurant or the pool, as I did not use them, but the conference facilities were fine.  The location of this hotel is great as it is close to the green line and within walking distance of many sights.  The Back Bay neighborhood is picturesque and a great area in which to stay.  My only…

title: Amazing Staff (apart from one)
review: Thank you for your excellent review and sharing so many great things about our hotel and area to so many others! Thank you for bringing up the topic of Recycling. All Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. ! We look forward to seeing you again for another conference or maybe even to see the Red Sox win another World Series! If there is anything you need for future reservations or accommodations, please let us know!   Sincerely Dominique Marty.

title: Could Be Better
review: When I checked in I was given 2 key cards and not told anything about the hotel.  I had to ask where the elevators were and if there was a bar.  Then when I got to my room neither key worked.  hotel clerk forgot to activate them.

title: I was disappointed...
review: Thank you so much for providing me with some insight of your stay.  Please accept my sincerest apologies about your keys not working properly. I can see how frustrating it could be to not have been provided information upon arrival as well. I have taken the matter up with our Front Office Director to ensure these issues are fixed. Please don't hesitate to contact me by  phone at your earliest convenience should you be willing to discuss your stay any further.  Sincerely,

title: Great hotel for conference attendees
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Nice hotel in Back Bay
review: Ideal location for Hynes conference attendees - just across the street.  Many restaurants as well as shopping steps away.  Also, no need to take taxi to and from airport - the BackBay Express picks and drops off at Hynes Convention Centre and Copley Square for only $5!!!

title: Fantastic Loction and Easy parking On Site
review: Thank you for the great review. I am glad you found our location to your liking and you enjoyed your time at the conference. We hope to welcome you back to Boston soon!

title: Favorite Boston hotel
review: Great experience from check-in to check out. I reserved a corner room because we have older kids and it was worth it because there was considerably more room. The room also had a mini fridge. When we checked in the concierge was offering small cups of orange juice. The lobby also has a Starbucks where you can sit and use the free WI-FI (in room $14.95) or use their computers and print out boarding passes. It's a short walk to Newbury and Boyston Streets and to the Prudential Center and Copley Plaza. Kids liked the heated pool. Only downside...$43 for overnight parking which is less than NYC but still adds a cost to the weekend.

title: Comfort and Excellent Location
review: We are delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. Your many wonderful compliments for our hotel and staff are sincerely appreciated. I did see that the cost of parking was a bit of an issue with you. We do offer Parking Packages with our hotel that will cut the cost down significantly. I thank you again for your post and I hope to welcome you back soon!

title: OK, but better choices nearby
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Great stay in Boston
review: The best part by far about the Hilton Back Bay is the location.  I had booked a King room but upon checking in they didn't have one so got a double/double on a higher floor.  The room was ok, small like other Boston rooms and typical amenities.  I will say my room had a very strong cleaning spray smell...were they hiding something?  The lobby area also was meh...no real ambiance.  I'd stay here again if I had to, but there really isn't anything special that would make me seek this place out.  It is very convenient to shopping, eating, etc.

title: staff helpfull
review: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review following your stay with us. It is through such feedback that we are able to continually improve our on property experience to meet and exceed the needs of our guests. I am very happy to see you enjoyed our amazing location however I am sincerely sorry that we were unable to accommodate your reserved room type. Our front desk department goes through a lengthy process each day to ensure that our Guests receive exactly the room expected, however at times we do not have the same availability due to guests extending their stays with us. We hope the next time you're in Boston you decide to give us another try!

title: Great hotel in the path of trolleys and guided tours
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Our room was comfortable with a lovely view.  There was a mini fridge which was nice for keeping our water bottles chilled.  At various times in the lobby, I was offered free cups of orange juice etc.  The staff seemed happy working there and tried hard to please. When we checked out and requested a bellman from the front desk, one arrived in less than 5 mins and made sure we got right into a taxi.  It was a relaxing hotel to stay in. It is in a great neighborhood near Newberry Street, Copley and Prudential, so all the shopping and dining in walking distance, also a starbucks in the lobby.  This hotel is also very convenient to Boston University and many other colleges and universities and close to a T stop. I was very…

title: Just like home!
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment our staff for their dedication to our guests! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston!

title: How to have a stress free stay without even trying
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Comfortable we'll-run hotel in ideal situation
review: If you are looking for a hotel in Boston that keeps the needs of the guests in mind 24/7 you would do well to stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  My journey to Boston on business was filled with drama but the stage was reset once I arrived here.  Everyone was caring, considerate and welcoming.  The room always was clean and well appointed and, at the end of a long day walking all of the corridors of the Boston Convention Center, a welcome respite.   A few evenings I had to stay at the convention center after our meeting's shuttle hours.  The subway instructions given by the front desk were perfect.  Room service was prompt, accurate and the food hot, even when I had special requests.  The hotel is a short walk (1 - 3 blocks) to restaurants, a grocery, pharmacy, shops and the…

title: Unbelievable Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate you taking the time to compliment our staff! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon!

title: Good location but don't expect much
review: Another winner from Hilton.  We wanted a nice hotel close to everything and especially near Fenway Park.  We were given a 25th floor room with great views of the city and everything was just right.     Comfy beds, small compact bathroom but we'll-appointed with good toiletries.  Restaurant is very good and nice bar.  Lots of great bars and restaurants close by.   Next to Prudential Centre and Boylston street so shopaholics will be happy.

title: Great "alternative"
review: I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room and that our staff took such great care of you! I am glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston in the future!

title: Hilton-Back Bay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Blah in Boston
review: Excellent location for the Boston Marathon!  Loved the restaurant and healthy options on the menu.  The only complaint we had was that the Starbucks was a little pricey and does not accept using the App to earn points.  Other than that, if you are willing to splurge on a hotel, this is the place to be!

title: Nice stay in Back Bay
review: We appreciate your business and are thrilled to hear that you loved our amentiies and were able to participate in the Boston Marathon!  We are here to serve and be at your service every waking moment! We all look forward to seeing you back soon!  Best Regards, Dominique Marty

title: Don't stay here!!
review: Not the best Hilton experience. Below average. Slightly dingy. Small bathrooms. Trash not emptied each day. Towels not replaced. Dirty wash cloth left in shower. Dirty floors in lobby.   Meeting F&B not accurate to order

title: Some challenges that need work
review: Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for the cleanliness mistakes our team during your stay. I have personally addressed this with our entire Housekeeping team and can assure you that we are here to make a difference and take your feedback to heart and continue to improve our products and services for you and all future visits. Thank you again for sharing your experience and my team and I would love the opportunity to make this right and create an extraordinary experience on your next visit to Boston

title: Love my Hilton's
review: I have stayed in the property for 4 nights in February 2014. The hotel is fantastic the rooms are big and with a very nice view. The staff is really warm and they welcome you with the best way. Every day there was fresh lemon and orange flavored water as a refreshment for all the guests at the lobby. It was a really fantastic experience...recommended for sure!!

title: Great Location for a Visit to Northeastern University
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience here at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and the fruit infused water in our lobby.We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Nice place
review: I rarely stay anywhere else.  I ended up with an end room, very good size for Boston hotel.  Great location to "T" and plenty of restaurants within walking distance.  As HiltonHHonors member I had access to lounge so I didn't use the restaurant.  I will stay here again, even on personal dollar.

title: Beautiful Hotel in a perfect location!
review: Thank you for writing a great review. As you stated making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. I look forward to welcoming you  back to the Hilton Boston Back Bay!

title: great people

title: excellent location but ...
review: i had such an unbleievable stay here everyone from the front desk to the restaurant was delightfull! i especially wold like to thank Hannah at the front desk as she was very polite and sincere. she listned to all of my issues and made me feel more welcome and cared for. She turned my day around!

title: Great Stay for Birthday Trip to Boston
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, Hannah.I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it!

title: exceptional staff
review: On the positive side, an excellent location in downtown Boston, clean room, very comfortable bed, and great staff, especially the concierge. On the negative side, the breakfasts suffered from minimalist selection, lukewarm coffee, and dour staff.

title: Great staff
review: Thank you for your feedback. We regret we were not able to provide you with the dining experience you expected. We are constantly innovating our menu offerings and your comments will help us improve in this area. We hope you will consider staying with us the next time you are in the area.

title: Wonderful Service

title: Great Hotel
review: We had to share the exceptional experience provided by the food service folks in the "Diamond Lounge" at Forty Dalton, within the hotel. Ms. Jasoda Ramcharan, was amazing in that she catered to our every need and question without hesitation. We later found out that she actually has a host of regulars who seek her out, whenever they are at the hotel.  It is rare to find an individual  who takes  their job this seriously and has such a perfect attitude while doing it.

title: What a Weekend!!!
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular Jasoda, her dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed in the lounge. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you and your friends back to Boston soon!

title: Great Stay!
review: We stayed here 4/24-4/27/14 and loved this hotel and location. Staff was extremely nice and in my opion, the best location in the city. We really enjoyed Backbay but hit the entire city. It's only 90 minutes but take the Duck Tour, it's very good. Enjoy!

title: Great Location and Concierge Services
review: Thank you for the great review. I am glad you found our location to your liking and that you were able to enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer! We hope to welcome you back to Boston soon!

title: A Great Hotel for Business Travel

title: Exceptional Service, Outstanding Room, Wonderful Staff
review: While traveling for work, I enjoy staying at this hotel, where the service is great, the staff make me feel at home, and the rooms are quite, comfortable, and clean.  My long term stay at this hotel has been my home away from home.

title: A good hotel
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – having this place be a sencond home! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: LOVE THIS HOTEL
review: This particular stay at the Hilton (Boston Back Bay) has been extraordinary.  The room was extremely clean, the elevators are fast and convenient.  Moving and traveling along, this location is right in the heart of the city.  One particular staff team member Tayla Cavaleri (Journey Ambassador), went out of her way to ensure office needs were facilitated without any hassle.  I would definitely recommend this location to anyone traveling to Boston.

title: Dependable. Great Staff. Great Location.
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team and, in particular, Tayla for her dedication to our guests and making sure you had everything you needed during your stay. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you back to our Hilton Back Bay soon!

title: Time for An Upgrade.

title: Amazing!
review: I think with the outrageous $$$ for each room, I hope they are saving for an multi multi million dollar renovation.  Likes: Top notch customer service Meeting rooms very nice  Needs improvement:  -rooms are mediocre at best -scuffed base boards - 20% of channel are sports related. Can we have one Bravo channel please. -remote faulty - temp gauge didn't work in rooms. -no one (except Av Chad) checked on us in the meeting room to see if we needed anything ie: the refreshments we ordered. -Diamond lounge evening choices needs improvement.  When you come here expect to pay for the location only because if you are anything other than Diamond (which I am), I think you may be getting ripped off.   THANK goodness I didn't pay for this room. Let me know when/if the Reno is finished and I…

title: 1st class customer service
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with some aspects of our hotel. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you, if your travels bring you back to our area.

title: Excellent staff, especially Jasoda Ramcharran in Diamond lounge.
review: We came to Boston to visit the college that our daughter will be attending in the fall.  There was no hassle when we booked our room, and were always greeted with happy smiles.  We frequently had questions about the city, places to eat, and directions and there was always someone there with a quick kind response.  For example, we wanted to take a tour and John at the desk in front of the business center recommended the perfect trolly service and recommended what ticket to buy based on the experience we were hoping to receive.  There was wonderful service all around and we recommend this hotel to anyone planning to visit Boston!

title: Great Hotel in the Heart of Boston
review: On behalf of my team, thank you very much for your very gracious review. We will print and post on our Team Member bulletin board so all can read your kind comments. I consider myself very fortunate to work with a bunch of true professionals. We hope to see you in the Fall when you move your daughter in!

title: Thanks to JASODA RAMCHARRAN Hilton Back Bay has been our most pleasant stay in Boston yet.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good hotel, but lacking Elite amenities
review: Every year my husband and I travel from the Deep South to Boston for the marathon. This is his 8th run here in Boston and we've always tried to find hotels that fit us and our needs. This year were were fortunate enough to book our hotel on points! Our room on the 21st floor was clean and spacious with a gorgeous view to the left, right, and middle except for one roof top being roofed. It was easy enough to crop this out for pictures. I can't say enough for the hotel staff and for JASODA RAMCHARRAN  who help us every morning in the Diamond Lounge. She and her staff were on there toes on the busiest and most demanding weekend of the year serving up a wonderful breakfast buffet to a hungry bunch of runners and their biggest fans. Thank you, Jasoda, you are my shining star. Keep…

title: Good option for business traveler
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment the team, and in particular our Diamond Lounge Attendant Jasoda. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you and your husband next year to the Boston Marathon.

title: Hotel Rocks, Conference Center needs improvement
review: The hotel is in a great location in Boston close to a myriad of shopping, eateries and pubs. About a 10 minute walk from the Boston Back Bay Amtrak station. It’s about a 15 minute walk to Fenway Park as well.  For the most part, the staff is great. They were very helpful with requests and suggestions. However, I’d nitpick a bit in adaptability. This hotel has no true suites. As a Hilton Diamond member, that is a little disappointing as being upgraded is one of our perks. We were offered either a room with 2 beds and a rollaway to accommodate 3 guys or a Parlor Suite that was 3 times bigger than the room but only has a couch pullout bed and the need for 2 rollaways. We chose the 2 beds just to find that a parlor suite is not only next door to our room, but has an actual entrance…

title: Friendly staff but rooms lacking
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you, if your travels bring you back to our area.

title: It Nice quiet location, close to the action
review: Hotel is clean and well maintained. Ventilation in rooms only works for heat in winter, AC in summer, so rooms get stuffy. Can't just have the fan going. Breakfast is either in the restaurant $$ or at the lobby cafe which doesn't have fresh goods. Staff is helpful and very nice.

title: Perfect location
review: We are thrilled to hear that the Hilton Boston Back Bay lived up to your expectations on your recent business trip to Boston.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next trip, during which we hope to exceed your expectations!

title: redesign the hotel
review: Clean and quiet hotel. Decent rooms with nice linens. The front desk staff were very helpful. The pool is ok, but the gym is above average. Easy walk to the nearby shops and restaurants. The rooms are quiet and bust transportation is easy.

title: Great location
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our excellent gym! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: good hotel

title: Great Location, Clean and Good service
review: Clean and quiet hotel.  Decent rooms with nice linens.  The front desk staff were very helpful.  The pool is a bit charmless, but the gym is above average.  Easy walk to the nearby shops and restaurants.  Breakfast buffet in the hotel was underwhelming and expensive, but the staff was excellent.

title: Not what I expected
review: I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room and that our staff took such great care of you!  I am glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient location as well! We do offer many breakfast packages within our hotel that will help cut the cost of breakfast for the next time you stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston in the future!

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: I stayed there for 4 days. It is centrally located. A few minutes walk from the prudential mall, boston commons and the hynes convention centre. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The lobby is not very special. Some of the ice machines did not work. Overall good a hotel.

title: Breakfast in the Executive Lounge was AWFUL.
review: We are thrilled to hear you were able to take advantage of our location and explore Boston!  Our guests are our first priority so even feedback about little things like the ice machines will help us improve the overall experience for future guests.  We sincerely appreciate it and would love to have you again!

title: Friendly, Efficient and follow through

title: Front Desk Help
review: Great engagement by total hotel team.  Double checked my honors status at check-in.  Follow up Make it Right phone call.  Housekeeping verified my Do Not Disturb Service to ensure I was OK.  Management engaged in the dining room during peak business for breakfast.

title: Solid Hilton fare, good views from the upper floors
review: On behalf of my team, thank you very much for your very gracious review. We will print and post on our Team Member bulletin board so all can read your kind comments.. I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I hope to see you again the next time you decide to travel to Boston!

title: Excellent location right across the street from the conference center
review: Sophia at the front desk was amazing.  She went above and beyond.  She got us checked in promptly, helped up chose a restaurant for dinner for my wife and I's 10th anniversary.  Then she helped us make reservation and even sent over a congratulations desert.  She did more than any other front desk attendant has ever done at any hotel I have ever stayed at.  If we stayed again at this hotel it will be because of the impression that she left with my wife and I.

title: 10 Days in Boston Back Bay
review: I appreciate you taking the time to compliment Sophia for her dedication to our guests in making sure you had everything you needed during such a special occasion! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I hope you had an amazing anniversary and look forward to welcoming you and your wife back to Boston soon!

title: Great Hotel

title: Super Hotel!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The room was very clean and had everything that we required.  Only issue is that to use Wi-Fi in the rooms you had to pay for this.  However, there is a business centre beside the lobby that has free Wi-Fi and also computers available for you to use.  We enjoyed the location of the hotel as there was plenty of bars, food places and shops right next door pretty much.

title: Family Stay
review: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Boston Back Bay for your recent trip to our city!  It is always a pleasure to hear when our hotel meets and exceeds guest expectations, we would love to host you again should you return to the area!

title: Prime location for shopping
review: My husband and I stayed in the Hilton Back Bay last June to celebrate our wedding anniv and it was beyond our expectations. The hotel is beautiful and the room that we had on one of the top floors was gorgeous. We got one of the panoramic rooms and a complimentary bottle of champagne and choc strawberrys to celebrate the anniv. This was such a lovely lovely suprise and it added so much to our holiday and helped make it a holiday to remember. The rooms are spacious and very very well appointed. The staff are so lovely and welcoming and always ready to impart valuable information on local sights etc. The location of this hotel is excellent and you are literally in the best location there possibly could be. It is right across the road from the prudential centre and lots of…

title: Hotel Makeover a huge success
review: We are overjoyed to hear that you and your husband had such a memorable anniversary with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Everyday we make it a point to try and exceed guest expectations so it is an honor to have had the opportunity to host you and we certainly hope to see you again!

title: Great hotel, great location

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: Just returned from a five-night trip to Boston, our first visit to this lovely city. After checking various reviews, we knew we wanted to stay in the Back Bay area and we weren't disappointed.  This hotel was extremely comfortable, the staff friendly and knowledgeable; nothing was too much trouble for them. They suggested areas where would find good restaurants, and they were spot on. Our room on the 16th floor [Hilton hhonors floor] was large and well-furnished and we wanted for nothing.  The location of the hotel in Back Bay was perfect for exploring this beautiful city. Only two minutes walk to the nearest Subway station which took us everywhere we wanted to go without any fuss.  I would recommend this hotel without any hesitation. Stay here and you won't be disappointed.

title: super view
review: We are thrilled to hear that you and your party had such an enjoyable stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is always a pleasure to hear that our staff made such an impact on a guest and were able to exceed their expectations.  It would be our honor to host you again should you return to the Boston area for a second visit and to explore our city some more!

title: Hilton Stay
review: Great hotel and excellent location for going to a ball game at Fenway. Stayed here for two nights in July 2013 and close to lots of shopping and restaurants. On site parking was a bonus as well. Close enough to walk to see the July 4th fireworks which were spectacular!! Boston is a great city.

title: I would stay again
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience and were able to take advantage of our convenient location.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to Boston in the future!

title: Super hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Very nice
review: We had a long weekend in Boston  at the Back Bay Hilton.   Superb hotel with a fantastic convenient locatioon near the T, shopping, restaurants, and places to visit.  Very helpful  staff.  Nice gym, pool, and buffet breakfast.

title: Boston in the snow!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and were able to take advantage of our convenient location.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to the Boston area!

title: Convenient, quiet, good service
review: This hotel is very nice to stay in if you want to be close to most of the sights in Boston. It was very clean and the staff were all very helpful! The dining room was quiet and the food was very good. The fitness center was top notch, although you tend to walk a lot in this city so extra workouts aren't that necessary

title: F for customer service
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff so friendly.  We would love to host you again should you return to Boston in the future!

title: Customer service atrocious.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Choice
review: Firstly, I chose to stay at the Hilton because it's a standard hotel chain and a company I previously hadn't had any problems with. It should be noted that the door staff were very polite and amiable, as were the cleaning staff and the rooms were immaculate. Where my issue lies is with the reception staff.   On arrival to the Back Bay hotel we were informed that only half of our party had booked rooms, despite booking confirmations that we provided proving otherwise and an eventual phone call to the travel agency who booked itnon out behalf. This was a minor inconvenience, but what really infuriated me was that the reception staff were entirely unhelpful in this matter.   The lady who we were unfortunate enough to be 'helped' by was more interested in filing her nails than…

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during check-in and that you found your interactions with our staff so unhelpful.  We truly appreciate your comments and feedback and will be sure to utilize them to improve service for future guests.  We would love another opportunity to host you and display our true Hilton hospitality!

title: Nice place to stay.
review: Have stayed at a variety of hotels in Boston area, and this one is a good choice...room ample size for city hotel...good bedding, clean (windows could be cleaned, but it is middle of winter...), well-maintained...a bit  disappointing though, the bathroom, which was relatively speaking rather tiny and the mildew on the shower tiles and on the perimeter of the floor remained across our three-night stay...we didn't report it, but it was disappointing that the quality oversight isn't naturally occurring...not a lot of mildew, so wasn't glaringly distracting,but totally unnecessary, Hilton...easily avoided w/just a bit more attention...was lots of hot water in sink, but must be a throttle on the shower -- would have been nice to have it hotter...good location...front desk staff…

title: Excellent place to stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We sincerely appreciate your detailed feedback and comments and will utilize them in the future to improve guest experiences.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to the Boston area in the future!

title: Convenient for Conventions and more

title: Big Hotel!
review: Stayed here in November as I was attending a conference across the street in the Sheraton and Convention Center.  It was very convenient to the conference, just a walk across the street into the Sheraton which connects to the Convention Center and a large mall with shopping and restaurants.  The rooms were well-appointed and comfortable, with a nice size tv.  The hotel was clean throughout and has an interesting layout.  I did not use the restaurant though I did have room service twice, which was quick and tasty.  There is  a Starbucks and small business center in the lobby.  There is no valet parking, which was odd, but the parking lot is connected to the hotel, with an elevator right to the lobby.  Commonwealth Ave and Newberry St are short walks and you can actually walk…

title: anniversary
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and share such a detailed description.  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and were able to take advantage of our convenient location just steps from some amazing Boston sites.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to Boston in the future!

title: Good, but some heating issues
review: We stayed here for a two night period over christmas 2013. Rooms were very clean and good size, Staff very helpful.  We didn't eat in the hotel so can't comment on the food. Overall a good hotel for the price for a couple of nights stay.

title: A very comfortable stay with a very caring entire staff!!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be so helpful.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to Boston in the future!

title: they don't seem to care

title: Better than most!
review: I am a serious coffee addict and selected this hotel in large part for the Starbucks in the lobby.   Unfortunately it is not open for a substantial # of the hrs posted (the Sheraton across the street has one that is open)

title: Felt like a star!
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  Our guests are the number one priority and we apologize that your stay did not live up to your expectations.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and comments and will utilize that information to improve our service for future guests.  We would love another opportunity to host you and show you our true Hilton hospitality!

title: Good location for business traveler, but so so for anything else
review: I have been staying at the Hilton almost every year now for a Spring anime convention and have enjoyed every minute! It is not super cheap to stay, but the staff is great and if the price for the room gets lowered they are more than happy to change the price on your reservation! The first year I went to the anime convention I stayed at the Sheraton across the street, and was less than amused when I was presented with an outdated, small, dark room for almost 400 a night.  The rooms at the Hilton are always a good size and come at a price I am willing to pay for their service and amenities!  I think the only complaint I've ever had that was in the hotel's control was when I stayed in 2012.  We applied for early check in, and even though we figured we couldn't get it because of the…

title: One night in Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed and generous review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed your stays at our hotel and are looking forward to welcoming you back in March!

title: Hilton Back Bay

title: Hilton Back Bay
review: My experience at Hilton Back Bay for an event at the Hynes Conference Center for business was very good to excellent.  I would stay at this hotel whenever I am in that area of Boston and would recommend this hotel to business colleagues and friends.

title: Friendly, Price competitive, good location in Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, it was our pleasure serving you.  We certainly hope to see you again should you return to Boston in the future!

title: Renovated Hotel with OUTSTANDING Service
review: I recently spent several days in Boston staying at the Boston Back Bay Hilton. It was the fourth time that I have stayed there over a number of years. The service was fine and the rooms were both clean and quiet. It is a typical Hilton and that is what I like.

title: Typical Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are very happy to hear that you found our hotel to meet the high Hilton standard, it is very important to us that we live up to our guests expectations.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you return to the Boston area in the future!

title: Great Location, Great Price!

title: Great Location, Friendly Staff
review: Very good hotel with excellent location next to prudential centre and easy to walk to all areas of central Boston! Didn't have breakfast due to abundance of restaurants and cafés nearby. Boston is a great city with so much to do!  One small thing for Hilton to work on for me is a common theme on here - free wifi is a must for a Hilton as there is so much free wifi nearby! Come on Hilton!! Charging $18 a day for wifi is ridiculous particularly when there is free wifi 50 yards away! If you add this in I think you'll find your business will increase and people will spend more time in the hotel and subsequently spend more dollars with you rather than in the prudential centre!

title: Very Disappointed
review: Thank you for writing a detailed review of your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We sincerely appreciate your feeback and are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  We would love to host you again should you return to the Boston area!

title: Great location. . . but hotel is just - eh
review: Packages and promotions here can be a great deal, one includes parking (otherwise $41 nightly.) Next to Prudential Center, Hynes Center and Christian Science Church. Breakfast Buffet is extensive and there is a Starbucks as well.

title: Great Location, Clean room, Friendly Staff, Great View
review: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and would love to welcome you again should you return to the Boston area!

title: Business hotel
review: Just spent a Saturday night with my husband for a birthday getaway. I am a gold honors member and was treated as such, with a corner room on the 22nd floor. Night time views were beautiful. The room was ok, decor could use some sprucing... Ugly walls and carpet with a really old sofa against the wall. Bedding was great, typical Hilton. Mattress just ok. Bathroom is tiny! What surprised me the most was no movie rentals on the TV! We wanted to watch a movie before bed. I have never stayed at a nice hotel that doesn't offer movies. With that being said, the staff and service were outstanding... Bartenders, desk, and housekeeping too. They even sent up some cheesecake with a card for my birthday! Diamond lounge for members had a great breakfast. Though the voucher says continental,…

title: Great hotel for Business personals and Professionals
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you decided to spend your birthday with us and that you found our staff to be so accommodating.  It would be our pleasure to host you again should you decide to return to the Boston area!

title: Great place!
review: Is ok for a business trip, I spent just four nights just few year ago, for an international exhibition during March. Great options for breakfast and fast breakfast, clean, spacious room, good location, even if using taxi, everywhere is " good location "

title: My stay at Hilton,Back Bay
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is a pleasure to hear that we were able to satisfy your needs during your business trip and that you found our location to be so convenient.  We would be thrilled to host you again should you decide to return to the Boston area!

title: Short stay in Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent, well situated hotel
review: I picked the Hilton to stay in Boston for one night, as I found a very good deal online. The location was easily accessible but I was very disappointed with the choice. The room was clean and tidy BUT it was at a low floor, overlooking a small roof area with heating plant (its noise could also be heard inside the room). The room furniture was also quite dated. Most importantly, to me at least, I find it unacceptable that there is no free Wi-Fi (they charge around 15$ per day!) whilst I could pick up free Wi-Fi almost anywhere else I went in Boston (cafés, restaurants, train station, museums, airport...).

title: Great location, but the staff don't seem to know it.
review: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Boston Back Bay for your recent trip to the area.  We appreciate you taking the time to review your experience and all of the feedback you provided.  It is a pleasure to learn that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location but we do apologize for the discomfort you experienced due to noise.  We certainly hope that should you and your family return to the area that we will get another opportunity to host you again!

title: good deal
review: We were on the 25th floor with great views over the Charles river. Room spacious and very comfortable. Hotel appeared spotlessly clean in all areas. Our only problem with this hotel was lack of free internet access - not acceptable in hotel of this standard.  Rooms are far from cheap and it's hard to imagine that any guests are prepared to pay for internet when the Prudential Centre 2 minutes walk away offers it free. We stayed in a variety of hotels, motels and B&B's in New England in the  previous 3 weeks and all provided free wifi. Wake up Hilton!

title: Fabulous hotel for New Year's Eve
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are very sorry to hear that you experienced some inconvenience due to the wifi.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and were able to take advantage of all of the amenities close by.  We hope we get the chance to host you again should you return to the Boston area!

title: Great experience at Hilton
