title: Can't beat the location
review: Had to stay 2 nights in Boston at the Hilton Back Bay due to a storm.  The room, service and dining at this hotel were exceptional.  Great professional staff. The doorman was very kind and sociable.  He helped me with my bags and walked me to the taxi because of the ice.  The restaurant quality food was excellent.  Room service was quick and the food was still nice and hot.  Great to have a Starbucks within the facility that was open late for us coffee drinkers.  Easy access to shopping and other great restaurants.

title: No free wifi
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so happy to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with us even during that kind of weather!  It is a pleasure to hear that you found our hotel so accommodating and our staff so friendly and we would absolutely love to host again should you return to the area!

title: Get what you pay for?
review: Stayed one night (new years eve). Our room was clean with a very comfortable bed. check in/out  was smooth. Location is fantastic. Walk across the street to Sheraton and you can access Prudential & Copley mall without getting out in case the weather is cold. Plenty of places to eat and shop.  You can even get to subway station directly  from prudential. We had appetizers and drinks in the restaurant and it was all good, no complain.  Parking is expensive, but then again Boston parking prices are a rip off any  where you stay.

title: A really nice Back Bay hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to thoroughly review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is a pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay and found our hotel to be so accommodating.  We are thrilled to hear you were able to take advantage of our convenient location and got to explore the heart of Boston and we would love to host you again should you return to the area!

title: Convenience & comfort in back bay
review: Hilton Boston-Back Bay has everything going for it.  Not content to rest on its outstanding location alone, this place goes all out with a wonderful front desk staff, amazing housekeeping personnel, and its friendly and knowledgeageble door men  They're fabulous!  Thank you for everything, Hilton Boston-Back Bay. We look forward to returning again and again.

title: Great Location & Great Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We truly appreciate your generous review and are so happy to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations.  We would love to host you again should you return to the Boston area in the future!

title: great location; okay hotel
review: Very comfortable accommodations. We have stayed before and find the staff helpful and the hotel pleasant. This time there was a blizzard in Boston so we really appreciated the access to indoor malls. You walk across the street and connect thru the Sheraton to prudential, Copley malls all the way to Clarendon st. Numerous eateries and shopping - in bad weather this is just great.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so glad that during the blizzard we had you were able to take advantage of our convenient location and still get to experience Boston.  It is a pleasure to hear that you found your room comfortable and the staff accommodating and we hope to get the chance to host you again should you return to the area!

title: Another Superb Stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Location
review: I love this hotel's location in the heart of Boston, just steps from the Prudential Center and all the great restuarants and shops in the area.  Spent the weekend before Christmas w/ my two young adult daughters and we had a blast.  The Hotel is well maintained with an excellent gym and in door pool.  The private Honors breakfast area was another plus as was the exceptional service we received there each morning.  Everyone on staff was polite and professional and I truly had no complaints.  As a Diamond member I stay often in Hilton properties and this is easily one of the best. Well Done!

title: Christmas in Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so happy to hear that your recent stay and visit with your daughters was a memorable one.  It is always a pleasure to hear that our convenient location and friendly staff helped make your stay an enjoyable one and that you were able to take advantage of all of the amenities our hotel has to offer.  We certainly hope that should you return to the Boston area in the future you will return to our hotel!

title: It's the little touches!
review: This hotel is pretty close to the airport, but is also in a very central location.  We were within walking distance of Fenway Park, great shopping, the bay and tons of restaurants.  The staff were very accommodating.  Given the price to stay there, I was pleasantly surprised to find that the hotel beds had real feather blankets, not those gross comforters you often get in hotels.  The only downside was that there was no free wifi in the rooms.  There was free wifi in the lobby, so we had to sit in the lobby in order to get on the internet.  That is pretty much the only thing I would have to complain about with this particular hotel.  All in all, I was impressed with this hotel and would definitely stay here again.

title: Wonderful Location
review: Thank you for taking the time to share such a detailed review of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is always a pleasure to learn that a guest has had such a wonderful experience thanks to our convenient location and our friendly staff.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and apologize for any inconvenience the wifi caused you but we would be thrilled to get the chance to host you again should you return to the Boston area!

title: Excellent Stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great hilton
review: Surprisingly good stay.  Staff all very polite and helpful (a big plus following a bad experience of the staff at Edinburgh Airport Hilton recently.) Everyone from doormen to reception to housekeeping. Even the morning restaurant staff were very pleasant – though a couple of them were hopeless re etiquette. (They reminded me of Manuel in Fawlty Towers!)  Room clean, comfortable, modern and kept well stocked.   Right now, the only downside is the work being done on the parking garage. That meant unanticipated valet parking and the unexpected need to grab everything needed.  The location - just one street to the west of the whole Copley complex of interconnecting malls and plazas  - and all the surrounding streets and shops of the Back Bay - is perfect.

title: Call before arrival
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are very happy to hear that you had an excellent stay and found your room to be spacious and comfortable. We certainly hope that should you return to Boston in the future that we get that chance to host you again!

title: First stay - everything was excellent!
review: Hotel was in a perfect location. It was pouring rain but the hotel was in a great location where we could walk to everything Boston has to offer. Facilities were perfect for the kids, all the restaurants were right near us. Will stay there again.

title: Nice hotel, bad fire alarm system
review: Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate the opportunity to welcome you and your family and appreciate your business. If there is anything we can do to enhance our services please let us know. We are always listening to our Guests. Thanks  again for choosing the Hilton Boston Back Bay.

title: Great Hospitality

title: Nice Experience
review: Second year in which we stay at the property for my b-day. We live about an hour north, so once could argue we could just go home. But spending time in Boston, walking around the city, and 'crossing over' for dinner at the Top of the Hub with only the need to walk back to the room, can't be beat.  Everyone we met at the hotel was courteous, kind, understanding and really made our time special. Thank you, all of you.   Last year Ms. Antonina Radetska sent us a note to thank us. This year, she was kind enough to arrange for a great surprise when we arrived. What can I tell you, some people are born for the Hospitality business, and we thank her for her kindness. Spasebo.  Eli and Luis Figarella

title: Nice location, B hotel
review: Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and I personally will let Antonia know that she helped you have a great stay with us! All of us at Hilton are passionate about hospitality and we hope to see you again soon.

title: Good location and good value in Boston
review: Our family had an appointment at a local hospital and we decided to stay at the Hilton Back Bay for our one night visit.  We arrived late, and were offered an upgrade as it was available.  We enjoyed the pool, hot tub, and the hotel employees were most accommodating.

title: Great location with access to train, city and attractions
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience. I am very happy to hear that our Team Members took such good care of you and you found the amenities of our property to your liking. Hope to see you return soon! Safe travels.

title: Only one issue
review: stayed here towards end of our 17 day trip of America the location is brill just 5 min walk from Prudential Center and The Cheesecake Factory brill lol the hotel was nice inside clean and busy although it is prone to fire alarms there was 2 while we where there for 5 days our room had nice view over the city we were on 26th floor   , one night my fiance ordered drinks from room service while he watched the football on tv when it arrived the bill was added incorrectly the waiter quickly apologised and cancelled the service charge which was nice , would recommend this hotel its location is everything

title: Highly satisfied
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay and found both our facilities and our staff to be so accommodating. We would love to host you again and give you a chance to explore the rest of what Boston has to offer from our convenient location, should you return to the Boston area!

title: Excellent
review: Last weekend I spent a Saturday night at the Hilton Back Bay. Check in was no issue at all. I got upgraded to a superior room on the 24th floor as I am a Hilton Honors Gold elite. I also got access to the Honors lounge. Which is very small but good for a cup of coffee or a water or soda, they also had your normal bar mix type snacks. The room was great well maintained and had a great view.  Now for my only issue:  When I got into the room it was 84F degrees. I was able to tell this by pushing the “room” button on the hvac control. I then pushed the “cool” button and turned it down to 65. Nothing happened. As I was on my way out I called the front desk and asked if someone could check it. They told me that they would. About two hours later I got back to the hotel and noticed that…

title: Thanksgiving week
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with our guest rooms. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

title: Really nice
review: Excellent Hospitality Good location Modern facility  I enjoyed the location as it was within walking or driving distance to many attractions. The facility is very well kept. The staff are hospitable and they take care of their customers. Rooms are very well appointed. My room was a corner room with a nice view.

title: Great location in Boston's Backbay
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay and found both our facilities and our staff to be so accommodating.  We would love to host you again and give you a chance to explore the rest of what Boston has to offer from our convenient location, should you return to the Boston area!

title: Terrific hotel
review: This is nice hotel with very friendly staff. Good restaurant with Sam Winter on draught (really tasty!). Rooms are spacious, beds really good, bathroom a little bit smallish, though. Breakfast buffet not cheap, but well worth the cost. I can certainly recommend this hotel if you plan a shorter or longer (in my case one week) stay in central Boston.

title: Good, but...
review: We appreciate that you've taken the time to review your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff and restaurant were able to exceed your expectations.  We would love to have you again should you return to the Boston area in the future!

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Hotel, DO NOT PARK OUTSIDE
review: We spent a week at the Hilton in November for my mom's birthday, and it is truly a wonderful hotel.  The breakfast in the Diamond Lounge was delicious and the evening snacks were very good.  It was always well stocked with drinks and fruit.  The fitness center was also very good.  We had a twin room which was large and spacious, the bathroom was a bit small, but that isn't the end of the world.  We had room service one night which was a bit on the pricey side.  The staff in the hotel were friendly and very helpful.  The hotel is very well located and you can easily walk to the transport links.  Just across the road is the Sheraton which links to the Prudential Center.  The Prudential Center has a wide range of shops and a Shaws supermarket.  This is a superb hotel and I would…

title: Hotel Hilton
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful time during your trip and we hope your mother enjoyed her birthday!  We are thrilled to hear that our staff was so accommodating and that you were able to take advantage of our room, service, gym and convenient location next to the prudential.  Should you return to the Boston area in the future we would absolutely love to host you again!

title: Great staff and location, pricey old hotel
review: We arrived on a Saturday afternoon and booked on the spot, price was OK, not to expensive. Parking was incredibly expensive (over $40 per night). You can park on the street for on Saturday evenings and Sundays. We were told it was OK. We were driving our week old 2013 Pilot and decided that the lighted street was OK. We walked around until night and visited the car before going to bed. I should have known better, because I saw glass on the sidewalk on the other side of the street, but my family was teasing me for "visiting" the baby so I did not say anything. Next morning, we found the front passenger window broken, glass everywhere and a dent on the door rail. There was nothing to take. An Acura parked behind our car had damage on the door frame, they could not break the glass.…

title: Nice Hotel and location
review: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are very happy that your experience with us was a pleasant one.  We do however sincerely apologize for the unfortunate events that occurred regarding your vehicle and we are glad to hear that our staff helped you and hopefully did everything they could for you.  We would love to host you again should you return to the Boston area and hopefully give you a more stress-free trip!

title: Nice Accommodations for a Couple
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Not Impressed
review: My husband and I were here for one night and it was a nice stay. We have not stayed in a Hilton in years, but it is what I remember. You get a decent room, clean bed, and good service. The room was not outdated and it was very clean. The staff at the Desk always was helpful and friendly, albeit appearing overwhelmed. The only thing I had trouble with was the noise from the neighbors. My husband sleeps through a storm, but I kept waking up by the people using the bathroom next door. Overall, we liked the hotel. It's a solid choice, but it won't knock your socks off.

title: Boston Lowes
review: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are very happy to hear that our front desk staff was friendly and helpful during your check-in experience, we will be sure to share that with their team!  We apologize for any incovenience you experienced due to the noise next door and hope it didn't effect your experience too severely.  We would love to host you again should you return to the area and have the chance to provide an experience that will knock your socks off!

title: Great
review: Stay at lots of Hilton properties and this one is on the low end. The executive lounge requires that you use coupons for breakfast and have zero bar service. The room was dated and subpar. The location was good but this felt much more like a low end hotel than a flagship named. Will not be returning.

title: Poorly Managed Front Desk
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We apologize that you felt your experience did not live up to the Hilton standards and we were not able to meet your expectations.  Our guests are our first priority and we strive to provide the best service and stay possible, so we take your feedback to heart and will share it with our team.  We hope you will give us a second chance should you return to the Boston area so we can show you the true Hilton hospitality!

title: First Trip to New England
review: This overall was a nice place to stay. I did have a little trouble with the hours of the coffee shop in the lobby. It was not open late enough for my needs. I would stay again if I had the chance and utilize the shopping nearby. The room was clean, fresh and comfortable. I really enjoyed the panoramic window.

title: Good for one night
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay, we greatly appreciate all of your comments.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your room and the view of Boston from the window, we apologize that our Starbucks couldn't accomodate your needs but we appreciate your feedback.  Should you return to the area we would love to host you again so you can take advantage of the views and the great location in the heart of Boston!

title: Checked Out Early
review: The Location, and the staff, of this hotel are both simply outstanding. Each was always there to provide whatever service was necessary with a smile and, made my wife and I feel as if we were a regular guest within the hotel.

title: Nice Hotel, Great Location
review: We are thrilled to hear that you and your wife felt at home during your recent stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and the convenient location and that our staff went out of their way to exceed your expectations.  It was our pleasure to host you during your first trip to New England and we certainly hope you will come back for a second visit!

title: Great Employees
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Excellent downtown location
review: The hotel was very nice, we had a high floor with a good view and the room itself was very nice. I did find that there were a lot of things you had to pay extra for however such as WiFi (16 dollars a day) and parking which would have been nice to have been included.  What really made the stay "excellent" was the service. While I was there I celebrated my birthday in which my mother ordered a cake to the room. She told me everyone there (especially Antonina and Samantha) were very helpful and easy to deal with for the request. As well as that I had a lovely card under the door from Antonina wishing me a happy birthday which I thought was lovely. Everyone else behind the front desk and the concierge were also lovely and made the stay very pleasant.

title: Great location - Very nice service
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and that you found the staff, especially Antonina and Samantha so helpful.  It was a pleasure having you for you birthday and we hope it was a good one!  Should you return to Boston in the future we would love to host you again!

title: Good Location and Decent Rooms
review: I stayed there for a week. It has great downtown location. You have access to prudential center just cross the street. It s one block from restaurants and shopping of different levels and qualities.  It does not have a restaurant, but there is a Starbucks where you can have breakfast or snacks.  Room was ok as a Hilton one.

title: Hotel stay
review: We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  It's terrific to learn that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location in the heart of Boston.  We apologize if there was any confusion about our restaurant 40 Dalton which is located on the first floor and we hope that should you return to the area you will come back and get a chance to try it!

title: Good hotel, good location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Place
review: Our family of 6 persons stayed here late October 2013. We had room only so I cannot comment on food. The hotel room was clean, a good size and had everything the average family would require. We had no complaints with check in or check out and the staff were very helpful. It is located across the road from the Prudential shopping centre which means that you can always get out and about whatever the weather. We had breakfast in Au Bon Pain in the Prudential Centre which was accessible through the Sheraton Hotel. There are 2 excellent restaurants in the PC, Cheesecake Factory and Legal Seafood as well as lots of good shops. The location of the Hilton is just off Boylston St and since we walked most places during our stay it was fine but some people might prefer to be a little…

title: Did not feel like I was staying in a $400/night a hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you and your family were able to take advantage of our convenient location and really explore the heart of Boston.  It is always a pleasure to hear that our staff has shown guests the real Hilton Hospitality as that is somethine we continuously strive for.  We hope to get the chance to welcome you back to Boston should you choose to travel to the area in the future!

title: A relatively good hotel
review: It was a good hotel stay overall. Great staff and who were very efficient. It is is a great location city-wise where you have easy access to good restaurants, shopping, etc in walking distance. They are good hosts with light refreshments in the lobby and staff around the clock. There were noisy points, such as hearing showers/bathroom uses through the wall but if your a deep sleeper then that's not a problem.

title: Oasis Away from Hynes convention center /mall hubub,
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and had positive experiences in our lobby including the amenities and our staff!  We apologize for the noise problems you encountered but we certainly appreciate your feedback.  We hope that we get the chance to welcome you back to Boston should you return to the area in the future!

title: Not bad for a one night / two night stay

title: A gem in Back Bay
review: Hotel was very central and across the road from two excellent malls which you can access through the Marriott hotel.   Bit on the pricey side but guess that's what you get when you stay at a hilton in central Boston.   Rooms were nice, spacious with very comfortable beds. Toilets great as well and room service was tasty.

title: Great location, expected better service
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Back Bay.  We appreciate all of your comments and are happy to hear you were able to take advantage of our convenient location and enjoyed the room service!  We certainly hope you will come back and see us should you return to the Boston area!

title: Nice hotel; great location
review: This hotel is spectacular.  The staff members are exceptional and go out of their way to make your stay one to remember.   My family and extended family were all treated so well.  Location is fantastic as well.

title: JUST A FANTASTIC PLACE
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We are so grateful for your kind words and are ecstatic we were able to exceed you and your family's expectations!  We hope you will return should you visit the Boston area again!

title: very happy with our choice.
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Underwhelming for the price, but still a solid choice
review: sorry, but I have to start with a negative.  When we booked this hotel via their website it recommended GoBoston shuttle to get us from Logan International to the hotel.  Unfortunately we, and a few others waited 1.25 hours for the shuttle to arrive and this was after several calls to them. All we got as an explanation was that they thought the flight had been cancelled.  I mentioned this to Hilton Back Bay at check in but I'm sure GoBoston will continue to be their recommended shuttle service - so beware! Apart from this, we were very happy with rhe hotel. In advance we had asked for a room on a high floor with some good views and that is exactly what we got.  The room was big, very well furnished and maintained.  The fridge and safety deposit box were very handy and…

title: Great place to stay in Boston
review: We appreciate you taking the time to write such a detailed review of your stay with our hotel.  We apologize you were inconvenienced at the beginning of your travels and are grateful for your feedback.  We are thrilled you enjoyed the view from your room and were able to take advantage of our convenient location.  Please come back to see us should you return to the Boston area!

title: Great break
review: I guess I expected more given the price.  Don't get me wrong, it's still a solid choice and a great location (easy walk to Newburry Street, Copley Place, Prudential, Northeastern University, Museums etc. T and Subway), but the hotel rooms and amenities where underwhelming.  e.g. the Lounge for Gold/Diamond members was small and poorly stocked compared to other similar lounges I've been to at other hotels.  It was on the main level, and off in a corner.  There was only one window and it felt small and cramped -- no real room to spread out and relax, TV's where set to scroll mood, so you couldn't really watch easily.  Also, no free alcoholic beverages were served in the evening which was surprising.   In contrast to the Diamond Lounge, the Business center was large and offered…

title: Pleasant stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed response about your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay.  We apologize that you were underwhelmed with your experience and we greatly appreciate the feedback which we will use to continuously improve our guests experiences.  We hope you will give us a second chance should you return to the Boston area!

title: Visiting College

title: Very good hotel and well situation in Boston
review: We stay at this hotel everytime we visit our son at Northeastern.  It is withing walking distance to the school and the service and accomodations are wonderful.  Everyone is very helpful and they always try to accomodate our needs for early check in or late check out.

title: Great location for marathon
review: Thank you so much for your review! We are truly grateful for your kind words and are so glad you continue to return to stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay!

title: Nice overall.
review: The hotel was in a good location and easy to get to all the sights and right next to the Prudential Centre which had lovely shops and the Skywalk at the top had wonderful views too and worth a visit.    Our room in the hotel on the 10th floor was very spacious and beds comfortable and room and bathroom were clean.  The restaurant and bar were expensive as was breakfast but there was a Starbucks in the hotel which served a light breakfast which was good and a little less pricey.    Our room was quite near the lifts and there seemed to be a constant noise from the lift shafts but we soon got used to it.   Staff seemed very helpful when we requested anything.  We did have a problem with our toilet on the first night but this was very quickly sorted.

title: A terrific Hotel and superbly placed for sightseeing Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay, we sincerely appreciate all of your feedback as we continuously strive to improve our guest experiences.  We apologize for any inconvenience cause by the elevator noise but we are very glad to hear you were able to take advantage of our great location in the heart of Boston.  We hope to see you in the future should you return to the Boston area!

title: Great location, especially for the Convention Center and Prudential Center
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good location
review: I was in Boston for a conference, and the Hilton was my only choice because there were several big events going on.  It's in a great location only about 15 minutes from the airport.  It's across the street from the Sheraton which has direct access to the Hynes Convention Center and the Prudential Center.  It's a little more intimate than the Sheraton.  I had a room with two double beds; it was a little small as was the bathroom, but the room was clean and appears to have been recently renovated.  I ate lunch at 40 Dalton, the hotel's bar and restaurant.  The lobster roll was just adequate, so skip that.  The front desk and concierge staff were warm and welcoming.

title: Convenient to Back Bay, Symphony Hall, and shopping
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: A Perfect Place
review: The location of the hotel was very convenient to the baseball stadium and the Hynes convention center. The service was very good. The diamond lounge was a little small, as were the rooms. I enjoyed the proximity to many great restaurants, shopping and the train system. It was very easy to get around.

title: friendly and convenient
review: Thank you for your review! We appreciate you taking the time to comment on your stay at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and we hope to see you again in the future!

title: Perfect for Sox game!
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Good standard chain hotel
review: In a pinch I scored Sox playoff tickets and needed a hotel. Hilton was $$$ but a great locale walking to Fenway. Close to the Pru. Starbucks and DD nearby. Self parking $41 a night. Rooms were nice, Hanna at the front desk was great and gave us the room we requested,  us being Hilton Honors members even though the hotel was overbooked and we had only reserved a day prior. Thanks again Hanna!  Overall we'd stay here again! Go Sox!!

title: Lovely hotel in the middle of everything:  calm oasis
review: Thank you so much for your review of your experience with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay. We are very glad to hear that our staff was so accomodating and that you were able to get the room you wanted and more importantly - tickets to the game!  We certainly hope to see you again should you return to the Boston area.

title: Excellent hotel & great location
review: The hotel was very comfortable and not badly situated, if a little bit of a walk to central Boston and the Freedom Trail, but quite a pleasant walk through an interesting area particularly if you veer off the main road a bit.  Friendly bar and the food looked good, although we only had one buffet breakfast in the hotel which was good and set us up for the whole day.  There were plenty of bars and restaurants within easy walking distance, mainly on Boylston Street which were mainly very busy and quite vibrant (i.e. loud!) but by walking one block further back to Newbury Street (parallel to Boylston) there are some smaller and arguably more interesting cafes and restaurants which had a much nicer feel (and probably better food) than on the ‘main drag’.  All in all, a good base for…

title: Good but not great for Business
review: I am so glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location in the heart of Boston and got to do a little exploring! We appreciate you taking the time to review your experience here with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and we look forward to hosting you in the future!

title: Handy for the City Centre
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Romantic getaway
review: We stayed here for 3 nights in early October.  The hotel is nicely central, just on the edge of the 'tourist' area, with a very handy trolley bus stop opposite (you can get tickets for the trolley bus from the neighbouring Sheraton hotel). Don't expect stunning vista's from your room though - the hotel is in a very built up area, so traffic noise can be an issue.  However, the beds are comfortable, and we weren't there to stay in the hotel but for sightseeing. Staff were friendly and efficient, and sorted out my query regarding wi-fi/HHonors speedily and with no fuss. We didn't dine in the hotel so can't comment on the food - there are eateries aplenty in Boston so we ate out all the time we were there. We found the hotel excellent value, although as we were on a fly-drive…

title: Convenient location in Boston
review: I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that allowed you to appreciate our Hotel and the city of Boston. Your many gracious compliments are sincerely appreciated and I am thrilled that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality with our Staff! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.

title: A good way to complete a holiday
review: We stayed in a king panoramic suite. The view was awesome. We had extremely soft cotton robes and the most comfortable bed with pillows of clouds. The walk in shower with dual heads was an added feature.

title: Great Boston Hotel
review: The views in our panoramic suite are pretty impressive, we are so glad to hear you enjoyed it!  It makes us very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay and we hope to see you again in the future!

title: Ok, but nothing to write home about
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Fab Hotel & Location
review: My husband and I stayed here for one night before joining our New England Tour.  The room had a standard Hilton layout and was clean and well presented. The front desk service was professional and we were checked in promptly with our luggage arriving with us in a timely manner.  The one niggle we did have was the noisy lifts. Although we were some 3 or 4 rooms from them the noise was incredible. At first we thought it was the trains at Back Bay Station but soon realised that unfortunately it was the lifts. If we had been staying any longer we would have asked to change rooms.  A stay at this hotel is ok, but not value for money in my opinion. You can find a more up to date hotel out there for a much cheaper price.

title: As you'd expect from this type of hotel
review: I’m sorry we were not able to provide you with a completely satisfactory experience during your recent stay.  Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback about noise. Your comments will help us to correct these issues. We hope you will consider staying with us the next time you are in Boston

title: Good standard Hilton, just very expensive with Columbus weekend and the Red Sox in the playoffs, and the International Bar Assoc
review: Had fantastic stay at this hotel!!  Gorgeous room, comfy beds & a great coffee maker.   The pool was lovely & opened at 5am in the morning. This enabled me to swim some lengths in the morning which was a great start to each morning there.  The lemon & orange infused water in the reception area was a lovely touch.  Would highly recommend this hotel & will definately return.

title: Choose a different Boston hotel
review: We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us at the Hilton Boston Back Bay exceeded your expectations! Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us and we are very glad you were able to take advantage of our facilities and enjoyed the fruit-infused water in the lobby.  We hope to see you again in the future should you return to the Boston area!

title: Clean and Good Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Nice, but don't be so tight with t'internet
review: The hotel was clean and quiet. I enjoyed the toiletries provided and they were restocked sufficiently, which at some hotels is a problem. Would stay here again, and loved that Starbucks was in the lobby! Hotel is within walking distance to famous Newbury Street and many shops and restaurants on Boylston. The common is a fifteen minute walk, approx. and the T is pretty close as well.

title: Business Trip
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: A Good hotel but....
review: We stayed in this hotel for two nights at the start of a New England tour. I have no real complaints.It was clean,they did a nice breakfast and the staff were pleasant.Just a couple of gripes, I would prefer once decent sized bed rather than two that were neither single or decent doubles.Also you had to pay for wifi, which is a bit mean.It is well placed to access the rest of the city and was close to the Prudential Centre, over the road through the Sheraton Hotel and you are there, which is great for a spot of retail therapy.Would consider it if we made a return trip.

title: Mixed bag
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton.  Making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. We appreciate all of your comments and will keep them in mind for the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon!

title: Very good location

title: Good Experience
review: Very good location. Very near to Prudential tower and Boston Common. Everything is accessible - mall, restaurants, transportation, etc. Very helpful reception staff. However, wifi is not free in the room.

title: Fun football weekend
review: I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and experienced the true hospitality of the staff here at the Hilton Boston Back Bay! We hope very much to see you again at our hotel if you come back to Boston!

title: Fab end to fab holiday
review: The Hilton Boston Back Bay offered a fantastic experience. The hotel was very classy, the staff was very nice and overall it was very clean. We found a good deal for it as well so it was not very expensive. The location was in a good location and was able to explore the neighboring bars in the area as well. However, I did expect it to be a little fancier because it was a Hilton but overall great experience.

title: A Basic Hilton, Secure, Clean
review: I am delighted that your recent stay at the Back Bay Hilton was one that exceeded your expectations. Your many wonderful compliments of the hotel are sincerely appreciated and I am thrilled that you experienced true Hilton Hospitality with our Staff! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.

title: Very good location, good rooms, walking distance to other conf. hotels
review: I had quite a great time in this hotel, since it had comfortable rooms, the best location for me (closest from Sheraton facilities, in which I had business to deal with) and great service. Less than five minutes to walk wherever and whenever I wanted. I'd strongly recommend anyone to go to this hotel.

title: Nice hotel
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed your trip with your friends! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Nice Hotel
review: The location of the hotel is very convenient as it is less than 5 mins walk from the Prudential train station, and the prudential building (you can find a mall with many shops and a number of restaurants there). The hotel is next to Copley park, 15 mins walk from the historic part of the city and about 20-25 mins from the aquarium/harbor (worth doing the cruise tour). It is also worth walking towards the other direction to the museum of fine arts (an attraction worth visiting) and MIT. There is also a bit of nightlife around Kenmore station a 15 mins walking distance form the hotel.    The area around the hotel is relatively quiet, the rooms are spacious and the beds very comfortable. There is a Starbucks in the lobby of the hotel with free wifi, and the hotel has a 24 hrs small…

title: Very friendly
review: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your positive experience with the Hilton Boston Back Bay!  We are very glad that our convenient location allowed you to really explore Boston and all it has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: Perfect Spot to discovery History
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: OK but Overpriced
review: We visited Boston to soak up the History and a trip to Fenway Park.  Hilton Back Back was the perfect area of town, we were able to walk to all our destinations and felt like we were pro's after we road the "T" a couple of times.  The Staff at the desk, the bell service were all very friendly and helpful.  We arrived at about 12noon and our room wasn't ready but the bell service held our bags for us so we could spend that time discovering Boston instead of waiting in the lobby.  This was a very enjoyable trip partially because Hilton Back Bay.  Check-in / Check-out was easy experience.

title: Close to MIT and Harvard
review: Thank you for the positive review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed exploring the wonderful history of Boston! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Nice stay - no complaints
review: We spent one week in September at this hotel and when comparing the price and facility this hotel does not hit the quality mark for the expensive price charged.  I would compliment management on the initiative of introducing excellent pillows. This makes a positive difference. The rooms could do with an upgrade and having travelled around the world on this trip I would suggest that management take a trip to Honk Kong hotels to see the high standard being achieved over there.  The location of this hotel is excellent and it's a sort walk to some good restaurants and bars.  The restaurant staff were very good indeed being attentive to all clients but the food could be improved.  Overall this hotel is ok but overpriced for what is on offer

title: Diamond in the Sky.
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at the HIlton Back Bay. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you, if your travels bring you back to our area.

title: Very nice hotel

title: Nice Hilton
review: After a rough start where we arrived after midnight to find they were overbooked and had to "walk" us a 30 minute cab ride away to Quincy, the hotel was very accommodating and comfortable  We loved the location - walking distance to some great restaurants and convenient to the T, and the room was comfortable and nicely appointed I thought the bed was extremely comfortable.   I worked from the hotel on several days and the wifi was fast and reliable.  We were up high and the views were great.  The minifridge worked great so that we had some cereal and milk in our room.  After being walked, our invoice was also wrong, but it was quickly corrected at the front desk.  I am still waiting for the actual charges to come through.

title: Better than first impression
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Awesome Location - wonderful bed - great bartender
review: Have stayed here many times and the room was a bit of a disappointment after the grand description. Lobby is unimpressive but lots of shopping within a stone's throw, Bathrooms typically disappointing Hilton type...very small with no shower stall.

title: Great location and excellent  staff.
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience here at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and our location. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Great hotel

title: Not quite the quality and service you expect in a Hilton
review: Well kept property.  Wonderful hhonors lounge, nice beds and kind staff.  Within walking distance to subway and so many attractions.  Would recommend and would stay here again.  Very nice hilton property.

title: Weekend Away
review: Thank you for the great review. I am glad you found our location to your liking. We hope to welcome you back to Boston soon!

title: Great Location
review: My husband and I stayed at this Hilton while in Boston to see a game at historic Fenway Park, a bucket list destination of his.  The hotel is ideally situated for anyone in town to see a game:  it’s within comfortable walking distance of Fenway, and it’s also close to the Prudential Center – with shopping, sit-down chain restaurants, and a food court for quick dining.  Unfortunately, I had an underwhelmed feeling for the two nights that we stayed there, which was only strengthened after we stayed at another, far superior Hilton during our return trip.    The lobby is small and cramped, which was further exacerbated by the fact that there were large tour groups staying at the hotel that would assemble there every morning, making us feel like we were navigating the crowds in Times…

title: Everything went great after a rough start
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay. I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with hotel.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Stay Here! Great location, service, and hotel!

title: Average US Hilton, great location
review: My husband and I recently stayed here during our trip to Boston. While it was a little pricey, it was WELL WORTH EVERY PENNY (Especially when comparing other prices nearby as well)!! We arrived very early and they held our bags in a secure locked room. They offered to call my cell when our room was available so we could walk through Back Bay area and get our vacation started. This was wonderful!!! They called shortly after and offered to check us in over the phone so we didn't have to come right back. They knew we wanted on a high floor and even let us know they moved us up from the 22nd to the 25th to ensure the best view possible. Rooms were clean, sheets were clean (I ALWAYS CHECK IMMEDIATELY), bathroom toilet and shower...all clean as well. Elevators were always available…

title: Computer Consultant - Domain Architect
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with hotel. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Nice Hotel, Great Location
review: Stayed here for 3 nights on business. The front desk staff seemed disinterested during check in. I don't expect red carpet service, but as a mid-tier Hilton Honors Gold member, I'm usually used to a quick run down of the benefits. I had to ask about the lounge and he seemed annoyed that I asked. The lounge was ok...surprisingly had some hot offerings (scrambled eggs/sausage/bacon/oatmeal) that is very rare in the US based Hilton's. The lounge also had an automated Starbucks dispenser. The afternoon snack was also something hot (egg rolls), chips/salsa, cheese and fruit. No alcohol, but I think there may be some antiquated Massachusetts law prohibiting it...or I'm just making excuses for them because they did have free wine pouring in the lobby. The room felt very dated. The…

title: Anxiety over the storage of medication
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience here at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and the fruit infused water in our lobby. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Comfortable hotel in great location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: GREAT LOCATION AND FRIENDLY STAFF BUT SMALL ROOMS
review: Spent six nights here while visiting Boston. Read many of the other comments with interest, I would agree that hotels in Boston generally seem expensive, so that needs to be factored into your budget. My room was clean and comfortable, and a good size. Possibly the TV channels could have offered more choice. The hotel is well situated and I was able to walk to most places such as Fenway, Boston Common and the Freedom Trail. Boylston Street and surrounding area offers a good choice of bars and restaurants. Specially mention to the Concierge who was excellent recommending restaurants and tours.

title: Just okay.
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Great location, quiet and comfortable
review: I usually try  to stay at a Hilton property for service and you can count on a decent room.  This location is perfect and the front desk staff went out of their way to help us with an issue.  Rooms are on the small side but it is a city hotel.  Fine for a short stay.  The bar area was cozy with friendly staff.

title: Nothing to be too picky about, but not 4 star yet.
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Caring staff helped us feel better

title: Freindly clean good service good location
review: We arrived at the hotel with the beginnings of a cold.  The Concierge, Michelangelo,  was so kind to send tea to our room.  He continued to greet us and inquire how we were feeling and offering any assistance.  Patricia was another kind person who delivered the tea, and she was very thoughtful and welcoming to our son.    We thankfully didn't miss the Red Sox game and we managed the explore a few other nearby places (Maparium, John Hancock Tower observation deck, etc) before we succumbed entirely to an upper-respiratory illness.  For a couple days, we only left the hotel for some fresh air and to pick up food.  Overall, very caring staff and well maintained property.  The room was clean and the housekeeping staff flexible and pleasant.    The hotel was walking distance to many…

title: Great location, best bellman ever! But hotel just okay
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with the hotel.  Our staff does everything they can to ensure an enjoyable stay and I'm glad they were able to assist you during your illness. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: Hilton Back Bay
review: Had a great time in Boston came to see the Yankees & the Red Socks the Hilton Back Bay was a great location and the service was great clean very accommodating had a great veie of the city lots of restaurants close by we will return

title: OK location, but loud and old
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed the game at Fenway! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Great Location
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. Its most identifiable skyscrapers, the Prudential Center and John Hancock Tower, are highlights of the city skyline. Visit Newbury street to explore unique and trendy boutiques – as well as every other kind of store imaginable – all housed in beautiful brownstone buildings. In nice weather, restaurant patio seating is packed with Bostonians and tourists alike soaking up the sunshine and enjoying the food. Commonwealth Ave offers a beautiful stroll down residential tree-lined streets. Keep walking towards the Charles River and enjoy a beautiful view by the water. In warmer months, people run and bike on paths running along the esplanade, and sail and kayak on the Charles River. Boylston street, also full of shops, bars, and restaurants, is the finish line of the Boston Marathon. Head towards Copley Square and check out the Boston Public Library, which is particularly beautiful from the Dartmouth street entrance.

title: Boston Back Bay Hilton
review: I was recently in Boston for a wedding and stayed at this hotel for two nights.  It is a bit pricey, but all hotels in the Back Bay/Copley area are.  I booked a king room and the hotel upgraded me to a higher level floor for free with a view of the city.  We were on the 20th floor and could see Fenway Park and the Charles River.  We did not have get a chance to see the pool, but they do have an indoor pool.  The location is convenient too.  We did the duck tour and took the shortcut by walking into the Sheraton right across the street and through the Prudential shopping center (took about 7 minutes).  The room was clean and the staff was nice.  Whenever we needed a taxi, the doorman was able to hail us a taxi within 2 minutes as there's a stand not far away.  This hotel is about…

title: Nice stay and soooo relaxing.
review: We appreciate you taking time to write a detailed response about your stay with us at the Hilton Back Bay.  We are very glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that you liked the view of  your upgraded room! We do hope you will stay with us again should you be back in the Boston area!

title: Nice hotel.  Don't pre pay!
review: This hotel is clean, safe and close to shopping, stadium, and all the sites. Staff are very friendly and eager to help. Great views from the rooms. I love the lemon and orange water in the lobby. Breakfast buffet is very complete with full service.

title: Great location and value
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience here at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and the fruit infused water in our lobby. We appreciate your comments and hope that you will stay with us in the future if you are ever in the Boston area again!

title: Relaxing

title: Good, well-located hotel.
review: Nice hotel, had easy parking,  friendly staff. Enjoyed my HHonors breakfast, very nice layout snd food, recognized I was a Diamond member.  Room was a good size , clean with comfortable bed.  Hotel was not noisey, quick easy check out with late check out given.  Very close to Fenway and across the street from Prudential Center/mall.

title: Convenient to Fenway Park
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: Hilton hotel Back bay Boston
review: We stayed at the Hilton Back Bay the night before moving our daughter into her college room. I picked the hotel based on general location. It turned out to be the closest hotel to the move-in spot, which ended up being quite fortuitous.   The hotel is a pretty basic convention hotel. No frills. Everything fine, nothing special. I was a little annoyed upon arrival because, rather than the connecting rooms the front desk had indicated to me on the phone, we had rooms across the hall from one another, and ours was a corner king "accessible" room. Our other room, a double, was more conventionally shaped and more roomy, presumably because the bathroom didn't take up half the room. The shape of the accessible room had the TV far from the bed, which was not ideal. The coffeemaker…

title: That's one noisy hotel
review: First of all, thank you for your candid feedback of your stay with us. I apologize that we did not meet all of your expectations and we are actively working with all hotel staff to ensure our standards are consistently met. I am always looking for reviews to provide insight into our guest experience and I will keep your review in mind as we look towards fresh options. Thank you again for your feedback and I invite you back to stay with us the next time your travels bring you to Boston!

title: Great hotel
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Not an especially 'Elevating' experience
review: Was in town to take in a redsox game and stayed here. The location was great for me as the hotel is a ten minute walk from the Amtrak Back Bay station and a 15 minute walk to Fenway.  The hotel staff was very helpful and upgraded my room upon arrival due to my gold member status.  All in all I would recommend this Hilton to anyone visiting.  Especially for a sox game

title: Comfy Beds & Great Location
review: Thank you for the great review. I am glad you found our location to your liking. We hope to welcome you back to Boston soon!

title: Hotel with good location
review: For the $$ this place charges you'd think they'd actually be trying, but by and large they try to make do with flash and reputation.  Don't go with the idea that you're going to rest and recharge your batteries, cos that's not likely - the hotel is built around an elevator structure that shakes the entire tower as the cars whiz (they are fast, i'll give them that!) up and down.  Elevator induced 'Sleepus Interruptus' was a topic of conversation between myself and other guests whilst waiting. Most ha resorted to pills or booze to get themselves to the land of nod. Dinner was so-so but expensive, Breakfast was WONDERFUL - honestly - but even more pricey.....even for the location and brand. Finally DO NOT park a car here. The deck is above the rooms...and not all floors are…

title: Nice hotel, but the staff weren't up to the mark
review: I’m sorry we were not able to provide you with a satisfactory experience during your recent stay.  Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback about noise. Your comments will help us to correct these issues. We hope you will consider staying with us the next time you are in Boston.

title: Nice staff, central location, but long in the tooth
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Fantastic Fish and chips
review: The hotel is a walkable distance to many business, tourist and entertainment venues. Our encounters with the staff were generally typical of this class of hotel. However, our room had a persistent and strong odor of stale cigarette smoke. Though we requested assistance on this, we were not offered a different room nor was there any evidence the staff followed through with attempting to mitigate the odor. The drain lever on our sink pulled straight out on first use. Overall, quite a disappointment and rather damaging to the Hilton brand.

title: A perfect base to explore Boston
review: Thank you for your feedback.  We are glad you chose the Hilton Boston Back Bay during your stay in our area and we apologize for the problems you encountered. We have fixed the guestroom issues and have addressed the other issues with our housekeepers. We assure you that if you give us another opportunity, you won't be disappointed in the future.

title: Location alone, renovation long overdue!!
review: Stopped here for 1 night the front desk staff were very friendly and helpful along with the concierge.Lots of information on restaurants and help from the concierge on close by restaurants, however we decided to eat in the hotel, the Fish and chips were superb,my wife had the Salmon which was also very good. not a lot of atmosphere probably due to the amount of eating places available in Boston.

title: As others have said...."LOCATION"
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment Forty Dalton on their amazing fish! I am fortunate to have a great team that focuses on taking care of our guests, and I thank you for noting it! I look forward to welcoming you back to Boston!

title: Perfect location, nice stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Great Location - - Just off Boylston!!
review: We spent 2 days in Boston with our 2 boys, ages 11 and 8.  We were booked at a Marriott in Copley Square, but when we decided to change our reservation from 2 nights to 1, the Marriott insisted it was a 2 night minimum stay (which was not on the original paperwork). We cancelled that reservation and made a last minute decision to stay at this Hilton.  The room was clean and quiet, plenty of room for the 4 of us, and we could see Fenway Park from our window.  We were in town to see the Yankees play at Fenway.  John, the concierge, really helped us out booking a trolley tour and gave us info about a tour at Fenway.  The pool was small, but served its purpose, it had a well appointed workout facility as well.  The price I felt was for being in the heart of Boston, one block from…

title: Hilton, not quite luxury as intended
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed the view from your room! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again when the Yankees are in town!

title: Trip for Training
review: Great location - just a block off Boylston!  Nice room - I could see Fenway Park from my hotel room.  Given an upgrade to a larger, river view room.  Within walking distance to many of the sights of Boston - Commons, Freedom Trail, etc A few miles to most tourist places.  Close to subway & commuter trains.  I would gladly stay here again!  **I did much research for a Hilton property in the Boston area.  I kept coming back to this hotel for the location.  The cost was high (Boston is), so I used HHonors to stay 3 nights.  I happened to see where other Hiltons & Doubletree was & was so HAPPY I choose the Back Bay hotel.

title: Bed Bugs 9th floor, do they pay for the room rental too?
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton.  Making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay just steps away from some of the best eateries, shopping and transportation in Boston. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston soon.

title: Great hotel and location

title: Such a gem!
review: We stayed at this Hilton for five days...absolutely no complaints! Staff were terrific and location was great! Room was cleaned impeccably and our stay was perfect. Would definitely stay again.  Taxis are readily available and walking distance to shopping and restaurants. We enjoyed a lot of activities while in Boston so this was a great home base.

title: Lovely downtown hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: Great Location
review: Absolutely loved our stay at The Hilton Boston Back Bay. The Hilton never disappoints us, and the Hilton Back Bay was no exception.   The location was perfect. Close to all of the main attractions. We walked everywhere. It was also very easy to navigate to and from the airport from this hotel. We also felt very safe in Back Bay.   Check-in was wonderful, we were greeted by a staff member who was giving out coffee from Starbucks. The gentleman that checked us in upgraded us from King Room to a room on the very top floor. The room had two double beds, but the view was completely worth sleeping in a double bed with a bed hog. The building is one of the tallest in the area, so it offers an unobstructed view of the Back Bay area.   The room was modern, clean and the bathroom was so…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and the fruit infused water in our lobby. I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with hotel.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Excellent location
review: love boston so much to see and do everyone i have meet so nice  and helpful if you cant find something to do here not sure what to say something for everyone from the harbor ,to the end of the city so much history

title: We will come back
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and the pictures you took are just beautiful! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Excellent location
review: Location is just great. Standard rooms are ok but location is great.Right across prudential and walking distance from Copley and newburry street. Staff is very friendly. Concierge was very helpful.  Easier to get a taxi if you cross the street and get 1 from the Sheraton that is right across the street.

title: Not up to the usual standard associated with Hilton
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience at the Hilton Boston Back Bay! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Great Location - Friendly Staff
review: Location was great, we were there with family for a redsox game and sight seeing.  staff was friendly, rooms where clean.  beds were only doubles, too small, bathrooms where small, the breakfast buffet was cold and steal.  the lobby coffe shop was closed at 4:00 in the afternoon, and the bar was closed early.  seemed to be of a business hotel than a family hotel.  pool area was clean.

title: Mediocre for a Hilton
review: Thank you for the great review. I'm so glad that you had a great time here at the Back Bay Hilton and more importantly – enjoyed your family vacation! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Great Location
review: Had a 3 night family stay here earlier this week, up to the normal high standard of Hilton hotels.  Great location with friendly staff. Lots of nearby places to eat and drink.  Would highly recommend to any family visiting Boston.  Great selections for breakfast and the coffee shop was always well stocked, shame it closes at 6pm, should be open a little longer, but that is the only downside.

title: Great Hilton and location
review: Thank you for taking the time to post about your experience here at the Back Bay Hilton! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Didn't get requested room on check in.

title: Good Location
review: Even though I rang the hotel in the morning to tell them I would be there but late in the evening we arrive to check in to discover management's policy to overbook the hotel so we had to settle for a king room with a cot instead of a double room as booked. Disappointed to say the least after a long days travel.

title: Location location location
review: I appreciate your candid review of your recent stay with at The Back Bay Hilton. I apologize for the room assignment not meeting your expectations as comfort and safety is my highest priority for our guests. While room type requests cannot be met every time, I have reviewed your comments with our front desk team. I invite you to stay with us the next time your travels bring you to Boston!

title: Great location, great beds, clean!
review: I am a Hilton Honors member and was able to stay here on vacation by using my points. We were on the HHonors floor. However, this hotel doesn't have the usual perks you expect on the HHonors floor- like a private lounge with snacks in the evening.  The location is great. It's close to Fenway and across the street from the Prudential Center and its mall. It is also easy to get to the T (Green Line).  Negatives are that they try to charge for WiFi access. I complained and offered them a choice: Free WiFi or I Iet 2 teenage boys run loose on the "business center" computers. The other negative is that the "business center" is in the lobby coffee shop and does not have the usual pens, paper, etc. that you'd expect.  I did not use the exercise room or pool. The pool is a little small,…

title: Hilton Back Bay Stinks
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton.  Making the most out of our convenient location is easy, with our hotel being in the heart of the Back Bay. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Good Stay
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: Good Trip
review: No complaints with hotel, comfortable room, excellent location.  Tourist trolley stops right out front, 5 minute walk to Hynes T Stop, easy walk to Fenway.  Avoid the hotel restaurant for breakfast, $21 for hot buffet.  Starbucks in the hotel is a kiosk type, more expensive, no s-bux cards.  There is a Sbux  store, Dunkin, Wendys, and numerous sit down restaurants right around the property.  Much cheaper to walk and do those.  Room was expensive but  average rate for in town stays.  Worth the convenience. No noise in room, stayed on a game night with no problems.  Good stay overall, research the T and buy a pass, the best way to get around.

title: 4 Days in Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Great hospitality
review: Great Hotel great location -  only drawback was 41 parking fee per night was a little steep - - We had room on 23rd floor and the view was amazing - -Lots of interesting things within walking distance - Fenway, etc.

title: Service
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

title: Hilton Back Bay Is the BEST!

title: Hilton Boston Back Bay
review: The hotel staff is the best! The location is perfect for dining, shopping and very close to everything. The hotel is clean and the food is good too! It is very difficult to please 70 people but everyone in my group was pleased with the hotel and spoke of extending their stay if it were possible.

title: Friendly Business
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a response of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton! I appreciate your very kind comments and I will be sure to share your feedback with the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back next year!

title: Quick Fenway visit,
review: Superbly located hotel, close to Newbury Street, a metro station and some great restaurants. All the members of the staff were focused and helpful. The room and the bathroom were both very clean. Recommended

title: Credit card guarantee means nothing at Hilton
review: I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room and that our staff took such great care of you! I am glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston in the future!

title: Quick trip to Boston
review: Wander around this quintessential neighborhood in the heart of Boston for high-end shops, restaurants, and the feeling of city bustle. title: My stay at Hilton Backbay
review: Just one night at the Hilton Back Bay. Reserved a corner King bed room, thought by getting a corner room we would have views from 2 walls, not the case as our room 2417 had only one bank of small windows and the window/door to a small patio was bolted shut. Bed was very comfortable but the pillows were not, very hard. The 3.00 price for a 16oz bottle of Sprite at the lobby shop was pretty high. The bathroom was small and for the price we paid we have gotten better from Hilton in the past. Room was clean and decorated nicely. Ice machine close by the elevators. We were there to see a ball game at Fenway Park. The hotel states the ball park is STEPS away, not true, as it is a good half mile to a mile away. Overall the location was fine with a lot of local eateries to go into…

title: Service was Outstanding!
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of your experience at the Back Bay Hilton. WI am glad you enjoyed Fenway and  look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!

title: Room with a view!
review: Ease of access by taxi and subway. Outstanding price for the services received. Outstanding location, since Hilton backbay is located next to the Copley and the Prudential shopping centers. The Hotel has outstanding staff and great service.

title: Trip to Boston
review: Thank you for taking the time to post a detailed account of your experience! I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our convenient location! We look forward to welcoming you back to Boston again soon!
